translation.source: Where stated, watches will come with a mechanical warranty.
translation.medium: 在需要的情况下，手表会附带机械保修。
translation.reference: 凡有注明的，手表附有机械装置保修服务。

translation.en: Warranty does not cover misuse or abuse of watches and it is advised that all vintage watches should be tested for water resistance before any immersion.
translation.zh: 保修范围不包括误用或滥用手表，建议所有古董表在浸入水之前都应测试防水性能。
translation.source: Warranty does not cover misuse or abuse of watches and it is advised that all vintage watches should be tested for water resistance before any immersion.
translation.medium: 保修不包括腕表的误用或滥用，建议所有的旧腕表在浸入前都要进行水压测试。
translation.reference: 保修范围不包括误用或滥用手表，建议所有古董表在浸入水之前都应测试防水性能。

translation.en: If you wish to contact us, you may do so by using the contact seller button on the listing.
translation.zh: 如果要与我们联系，请使用清单上的“联系卖家”按钮。
translation.source: If you wish to contact us, you may do so by using the contact seller button on the listing.
translation.medium: 如果您想联系我们，您可以使用列表中的联系卖家按钮。
translation.reference: 如果要与我们联系，请使用清单上的“联系卖家”按钮。

translation.en: We are always interested to hear from new suppliers and we can also supply wholesale pricing on some items we sell other than watches.
translation.zh: 欢迎新供应商与我们联系，我们也以批发价格供应除手表外的其他商品。
translation.source: We are always interested to hear from new suppliers and we can also supply wholesale pricing on some items we sell other than watches.
translation.medium: 我们总是愿意听取新供应商的意见，我们也可以提供一些我们不是手表的其他商品的批发价格。
translation.reference: 欢迎新供应商与我们联系，我们也以批发价格供应除手表外的其他商品。

translation.en: We are proud to be independant and we are not sponsored, approved nor endorsed by any of the brands that we sell, including Rolex.
translation.zh: 我们是独立的商店，没有得到任何品牌的赞助、批准或认可，包括劳力士。
translation.source: We are proud to be independant and we are not sponsored, approved nor endorsed by any of the brands that we sell, including Rolex.
translation.medium: 我们很自豪能够独立经营，我们并不受任何我们销售的品牌的赞助、批准或推荐，包括罗杰杜彼。
translation.reference: 我们是独立的商店，没有得到任何品牌的赞助、批准或认可，包括劳力士。

translation.en: We value our feedback as we believe it says a lot about how we look after customers.
translation.zh: 我们重视顾客的评价，因为顾客的反馈可以反映我们的服务水平。
translation.source: We value our feedback as we believe it says a lot about how we look after customers.
translation.medium: 我们非常重视客户的反馈意见，因为我们认为这反映了我们如何照顾客户。
translation.reference: 我们重视顾客的评价，因为顾客的反馈可以反映我们的服务水平。

translation.en: We always leave feedback for our customers after we have received feedback ourselves for an item, as this lets us know that the item purchased has been received and that the customer is happy with it.
translation.zh: 我们在收到顾客的评价后，也会回应顾客，因为这说明顾客已经收到商品并对商品感到满意。
translation.source: We always leave feedback for our customers after we have received feedback ourselves for an item, as this lets us know that the item purchased has been received and that the customer is happy with it.
translation.medium: 当我们收到客户的反馈之后，我们也会给客户反馈，这样我们就知道客户收到了商品，并且对商品满意。
translation.reference: 我们在收到顾客的评价后，也会回应顾客，因为这说明顾客已经收到商品并对商品感到满意。

translation.en: If, however, you are not satisfied in any way, please let us know before leaving feedback so that we can try to rectify any issues
translation.zh: 不过，如果您有不满意之处，请在评价前联系我们，我们会尽力解决您的问题
translation.source: If, however, you are not satisfied in any way, please let us know before leaving feedback so that we can try to rectify any issues
translation.medium: 但是，如果您对任何方面不满意，请在留下反馈之前告诉我们，我们将尽力纠正任何问题
translation.reference: 不过，如果您有不满意之处，请在评价前联系我们，我们会尽力解决您的问题

translation.en: Get Supersized Images & Free Image Hosting
translation.zh: 获取超大尺寸图像和免费的图像托管
translation.source: Get Supersized Images & Free Image Hosting
translation.medium: 获得超大图像和免费图像托管
translation.reference: 获取超大尺寸图像和免费的图像托管

translation.en: Attention Sellers - Get Templates Image Hosting, Scheduling at Auctiva.com.
translation.zh: 卖家注意 - 从 Auctiva.com 获得模板图像托管。
translation.source: Attention Sellers - Get Templates Image Hosting, Scheduling at Auctiva.com.
translation.medium: 注意卖家：Auctiva.com 为您提供模板图片存储和排期服务。
translation.reference: 卖家注意 - 从 Auctiva.com 获得模板图像托管。

translation.en: Track Page Views With Auctiva's FREE Count
translation.zh: 使用 Auctiva 的免费计数跟踪页面浏览量
translation.source: Track Page Views With Auctiva's FREE Count
translation.medium: 使用 Auctiva 免费计数器跟踪页面浏览量
translation.reference: 使用 Auctiva 的免费计数跟踪页面浏览量

translation.en: Dive into an immersive story encased in Black Desert's expansive world that's just waiting to be explored.
translation.zh: 《黑色沙漠》的广阔世界中有许多精彩的故事等着人们去探索。
translation.source: Dive into an immersive story encased in Black Desert's expansive world that's just waiting to be explored.
translation.medium: 沉浸在《黑色沙漠》的广阔世界中，体验充满沉浸感的故事。
translation.reference: 《黑色沙漠》的广阔世界中有许多精彩的故事等着人们去探索。

translation.en: Accompanied by a Black Spirit, a companion whose destiny is intertwined with their own, players will discover the secret of the Black Stones and the history of their corrupting effects.
translation.zh: 在游戏中，玩家们与黑精灵的命运相互交织，相互陪伴着去探索黑石的秘密和充满腐败的历史。
translation.source: Accompanied by a Black Spirit, a companion whose destiny is intertwined with their own, players will discover the secret of the Black Stones and the history of their corrupting effects.
translation.medium: 陪伴着黑灵，一位命运与自己纠缠不清的伙伴，玩家将发现黑石的秘密和它们的腐蚀历史。
translation.reference: 在游戏中，玩家们与黑精灵的命运相互交织，相互陪伴着去探索黑石的秘密和充满腐败的历史。

translation.en: Players will enjoy jaw-dropping graphics with an insane level of character customization across 19 character classes.
translation.zh: 令人叹为观止的画面，19 个角色职业和角色高度定制功能，将让玩家们爱不释手。
translation.source: Players will enjoy jaw-dropping graphics with an insane level of character customization across 19 character classes.
translation.medium: 玩家可以享受令人惊叹的游戏画面，并在 19 个角色类别中体验疯狂的角色定制。
translation.reference: 令人叹为观止的画面，19 个角色职业和角色高度定制功能，将让玩家们爱不释手。

translation.en: Each class offers intuitive skill-based combat, equipped with set of unique skills which can be freely combined into exciting and effective combos, always keeping you on your toes.
translation.zh: 每个职业都提供直观的基于技能的战斗，配备了一套独特的技能，可以自由组合为令人向往且有效果的连击，让人不忍错眼。
translation.source: Each class offers intuitive skill-based combat, equipped with set of unique skills which can be freely combined into exciting and effective combos, always keeping you on your toes.
translation.medium: 每个级别都提供直观的技能基础战斗，配备了一套独特的技能，可以自由组合成令人兴奋和有效的组合，让你始终保持警惕。
translation.reference: 每个职业都提供直观的基于技能的战斗，配备了一套独特的技能，可以自由组合为令人向往且有效果的连击，让人不忍错眼。

translation.en: Black Desert Prestige Edition is a living-world MMORPG with $140 worth of bonus content.
translation.zh: 《黑色沙漠》尊贵版是动态世界的 MMORPG，含有价值 140 美元的奖励内容。
translation.source: Black Desert Prestige Edition is a living-world MMORPG with $140 worth of bonus content.
translation.medium: 《黑色沙漠：荣耀版》是一款具有 140 美元奖励内容的生活世界 MMORPG。
translation.reference: 《黑色沙漠》尊贵版是动态世界的 MMORPG，含有价值 140 美元的奖励内容。

translation.en: Experience fast-paced, action-packed combat, hunt monsters and huge bosses, fight with friends in a guild to siege nodes and castles, and train in a variety of life skills such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, sailing, and much more!
translation.zh: 体验快节奏、动作场面多的战斗、猎杀怪物和大型头目，与朋友在公会中搏斗，围攻节点和城堡，并训练各种生活技能，如钓鱼、贸易、手工制作、烹饪、航海等等！
translation.source: Experience fast-paced, action-packed combat, hunt monsters and huge bosses, fight with friends in a guild to siege nodes and castles, and train in a variety of life skills such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, sailing, and much more!
translation.medium: 体验快节奏、刺激的战斗，狩猎怪物和巨型BOSS，与朋友组队围攻节点和城堡，并学习各种生活技能，如钓鱼、交易、制作、烹饪、航海等等！
translation.reference: 体验快节奏、动作场面多的战斗、猎杀怪物和大型头目，与朋友在公会中搏斗，围攻节点和城堡，并训练各种生活技能，如钓鱼、贸易、手工制作、烹饪、航海等等！

translation.en: Robust Character Creation Tools - Make the character YOU want to play.
translation.zh: 强大的角色创造工具 - 创造你想玩的角色。
translation.source: Robust Character Creation Tools - Make the character YOU want to play.
translation.medium: 强大的角色创建工具 - 创建您想要扮演的角色。
translation.reference: 强大的角色创造工具 - 创造你想玩的角色。

translation.en: Seamless Movement Throughout the World - No loading times necessary as you explore.
translation.zh: 在整个世界无缝移动 - 在你探索的过程中，不需要任何加载时间。
translation.source: Seamless Movement Throughout the World - No loading times necessary as you explore.
translation.medium: 无需等待加载时间，随时随地探索世界。
translation.reference: 在整个世界无缝移动 - 在你探索的过程中，不需要任何加载时间。

translation.en: Combo-Oriented, Non-Targeted Combat - Take part in fast-paced, action-packed combat with skills that can be chained through combos.
translation.zh: 以连击为导向的无定位战斗 - 参与快节奏、动作场面多的战斗，可以通过连击来连接技能。
translation.source: Combo-Oriented, Non-Targeted Combat - Take part in fast-paced, action-packed combat with skills that can be chained through combos.
translation.medium: 以组合为基础的非针对性战斗 - 参与快节奏、刺激的战斗，使用可以串联的技能。
translation.reference: 以连击为导向的无定位战斗 - 参与快节奏、动作场面多的战斗，可以通过连击来连接技能。

translation.en: Unique Weather and Climate - The weather and climate will have various effects on different zones that players can adapt to.
translation.zh: 独特的天气和气候 - 天气和气候将对不同的区域产生玩家可以适应的不同影响。
translation.source: Unique Weather and Climate - The weather and climate will have various effects on different zones that players can adapt to.
translation.medium: 独特的气候和气候 - 气候和气候会对不同区域的玩家产生不同的影响，玩家可以适应。
translation.reference: 独特的天气和气候 - 天气和气候将对不同的区域产生玩家可以适应的不同影响。

translation.en: Day/Night Cycle - Along with unique weather and climate changes, the game revolves around a day/night cycle that alters NPC behavior and triggers various events based on the time of day.
translation.zh: 日/夜循环 - 伴随着独特的天气和气候变化，游戏围绕着改变 NPC 行为的日/夜循环进行，并根据一天中的时间触发各种事件。
translation.source: Day/Night Cycle - Along with unique weather and climate changes, the game revolves around a day/night cycle that alters NPC behavior and triggers various events based on the time of day.
translation.medium: 日夜循环 - 与独特的天气和气候变化相结合，游戏以日夜循环为中心，改变 NPC 的行为并根据时间触发各种事件。
translation.reference: 日/夜循环 - 伴随着独特的天气和气候变化，游戏围绕着改变 NPC 行为的日/夜循环进行，并根据一天中的时间触发各种事件。

translation.en: Instanced Player Housing - From tents to palaces and everything in between, players can furnish and customize their own homes and can hire NPCs to keep your place clean or purchase things from the marketplace.
translation.zh: 实例化玩家住房 - 从帐篷到宫殿等等，玩家可以布置和定制自己的房屋，并可以雇佣 NPC 来清洁住所或从市场购买物品。
translation.source: Instanced Player Housing - From tents to palaces and everything in between, players can furnish and customize their own homes and can hire NPCs to keep your place clean or purchase things from the marketplace.
translation.medium: 实例化玩家住宅 - 从帐篷到宫殿，玩家可以根据自己的喜好装饰和定制自己的家园，还可以雇佣 NPC 打扫卫生或从市场购买物品。
translation.reference: 实例化玩家住房 - 从帐篷到宫殿等等，玩家可以布置和定制自己的房屋，并可以雇佣 NPC 来清洁住所或从市场购买物品。

translation.en: Mounted Combat - Utilize your trusted mounts on the battlefield and take advantage of their mobility and effectiveness in combat.
translation.zh: 坐骑战斗 - 在战场上驾乘你信任的坐骑，在战斗中充分利用它们的机动性和有效性。
translation.source: Mounted Combat - Utilize your trusted mounts on the battlefield and take advantage of their mobility and effectiveness in combat.
translation.medium: 骑坐战斗 - 在战场上利用你的信赖的骑坐，利用它们的机动性和战斗力。
translation.reference: 坐骑战斗 - 在战场上驾乘你信任的坐骑，在战斗中充分利用它们的机动性和有效性。

translation.en: Keep in mind, however, that mounts will need to be cared for, housed and protected as they can die in combat.
translation.zh: 不过，请记住，坐骑需要照顾、安置和保护，因为它们可能会在战斗中死去。
translation.source: Keep in mind, however, that mounts will need to be cared for, housed and protected as they can die in combat.
translation.medium: 请记住，坐骑需要照顾、住宿和保护，因为它们在战斗中可能会死亡。
translation.reference: 不过，请记住，坐骑需要照顾、安置和保护，因为它们可能会在战斗中死去。

translation.en: Boss Hunts - Group up with friends or other players to hunt down field bosses and world bosses to get that rare loot.
translation.zh: 猎杀头目 - 与朋友或其他玩家组队追捕野外头目和世界头目以获得稀有战利品。
translation.source: Boss Hunts - Group up with friends or other players to hunt down field bosses and world bosses to get that rare loot.
translation.medium: 老板猎人 - 与朋友或其他玩家组队，一起猎杀野外老板和世界老板，获得稀有的奖励。
translation.reference: 猎杀头目 - 与朋友或其他玩家组队追捕野外头目和世界头目以获得稀有战利品。

translation.en: Siege Warfare - Massive free-for-all guild battles!
translation.zh: 攻城战 - 大规模的自由公会战斗！
translation.source: Siege Warfare - Massive free-for-all guild battles!
translation.medium: 围攻战争 - 大规模免费攻城战!
translation.reference: 攻城战 - 大规模的自由公会战斗！

translation.en: Join a guild and participate in daily node wars or weekly conquest wars against many other competing guilds.
translation.zh: 加入一个公会，并参与每日的节点战争或每周的征服战争，对抗许多其他竞争性的公会。
translation.source: Join a guild and participate in daily node wars or weekly conquest wars against many other competing guilds.
translation.medium: 加入一个团队，参加与其他竞争团队的日常节点战斗或周末征服战斗。
translation.reference: 加入一个公会，并参与每日的节点战争或每周的征服战争，对抗许多其他竞争性的公会。

translation.en: Win the node or castle and claim it for a week to collect taxes to increase your guild funds.
translation.zh: 赢得节点或城堡，可以占领一周，并可收集税收来增加公会资金。
translation.source: Win the node or castle and claim it for a week to collect taxes to increase your guild funds.
translation.medium: 占领节点或城堡，一周内收取税收增加团队资金。
translation.reference: 赢得节点或城堡，可以占领一周，并可收集税收来增加公会资金。

translation.en: Ocean Contents - Craft your boat and make sail to the vast oceans to fish, hunt ocean monsters and bosses, underwater exploring and gathering, quest missions, trade, and so much more.
translation.zh: 海洋内容 - 可以制作船只，航行到广阔的海洋捕鱼，狩猎海洋怪物和头目，进行水下探险和采集，探寻任务，进行贸易，等等。
translation.source: Ocean Contents - Craft your boat and make sail to the vast oceans to fish, hunt ocean monsters and bosses, underwater exploring and gathering, quest missions, trade, and so much more.
translation.medium: 海洋内容 - 制作你的船只，驶向广阔的海洋，捕鱼、猎捕海洋巨兽和老大，探索海底，收集资源，完成任务，交易等等。
translation.reference: 海洋内容 - 可以制作船只，航行到广阔的海洋捕鱼，狩猎海洋怪物和头目，进行水下探险和采集，探寻任务，进行贸易，等等。

translation.en: Taming & Breeding - Catch and tame horses and elephants in the wild to make it your mount.
translation.zh: 驯服和繁殖 - 在野外捕捉和驯服马和大象，使它们成为你的坐骑。
translation.source: Taming & Breeding - Catch and tame horses and elephants in the wild to make it your mount.
translation.medium: 驯养与培育 - 在野外捕捉和驯服马匹和大象，让它们成为你的骑宠。
translation.reference: 驯服和繁殖 - 在野外捕捉和驯服马和大象，使它们成为你的坐骑。

translation.en: You can also breed horses for better offspring with improved mount stats and skills.
translation.zh: 你也可以培育更好的马匹后代，提高坐骑属性和技能。
translation.source: You can also breed horses for better offspring with improved mount stats and skills.
translation.medium: 您还可以通过培育马匹来获得更好的后代，并且提高马匹的骑乘属性和技能。
translation.reference: 你也可以培育更好的马匹后代，提高坐骑属性和技能。

translation.en: Crafting - Enjoy all aspects of crafting in Black Desert from tools, weapons, armor, jewelry, boats, costumes, outfits, and more.
translation.zh: 手工制作 - 在《黑色沙漠》中，可以体验亲手制作工具、武器、盔甲、珠宝、船、服装等的乐趣。
translation.source: Crafting - Enjoy all aspects of crafting in Black Desert from tools, weapons, armor, jewelry, boats, costumes, outfits, and more.
translation.medium: 制作 - 在《黑色沙漠》中体验各种制作工艺，包括工具、武器、盔甲、首饰、船只、服装、服饰等。
translation.reference: 手工制作 - 在《黑色沙漠》中，可以体验亲手制作工具、武器、盔甲、珠宝、船、服装等的乐趣。

translation.en: Just about everything can be crafted in the world of Black Desert.
translation.zh: 在《黑色沙漠》的世界里，几乎可以手工制作一切东西。
translation.source: Just about everything can be crafted in the world of Black Desert.
translation.medium: 在《黑色沙漠》的世界里，几乎所有东西都可以制作。
translation.reference: 在《黑色沙漠》的世界里，几乎可以手工制作一切东西。

translation.en: Professions - Take part and grow your character into a profession that can help your income.
translation.zh: 职业 - 参与其中，让你的角色成长为能增加收入的职业。
translation.source: Professions - Take part and grow your character into a profession that can help your income.
translation.medium: 职业 - 加入并培养自己的职业，帮助你的收入。
translation.reference: 职业 - 参与其中，让你的角色成长为能增加收入的职业。

translation.en: With professions like gathering, processing, cooking, alchemy, training, fishing, hunting, trading, farming, and sailing, you can choose to play Black Desert Online the way you want to.
translation.zh: 你可以选择从事采集、加工、烹饪、炼金术、训练、钓鱼、狩猎、贸易、农耕和航海等职业，按照自己喜欢的方式来玩《黑色沙漠Online》。
translation.source: With professions like gathering, processing, cooking, alchemy, training, fishing, hunting, trading, farming, and sailing, you can choose to play Black Desert Online the way you want to.
translation.medium: 游戏中有采集、加工、烹饪、酿造、训练、捕鱼、狩猎、交易、农耕、航海等多种职业，玩家可以选择自己喜欢的方式玩游戏。
translation.reference: 你可以选择从事采集、加工、烹饪、炼金术、训练、钓鱼、狩猎、贸易、农耕和航海等职业，按照自己喜欢的方式来玩《黑色沙漠Online》。

translation.en: Thank you for the information.
translation.zh: 感谢您提供的信息。
translation.source: Thank you for the information.
translation.medium: 感谢您提供的信息。
translation.reference: 感谢您提供的信息。

translation.en: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。
translation.source: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 我非常乐意帮助你。
translation.reference: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识您。
translation.source: Nice to meet you.
translation.medium: 很高兴认识你。
translation.reference: 很高兴认识您。

translation.en: I hope you are having a great day!
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天！
translation.source: I hope you are having a great day!
translation.medium: 祝你今天好运！
translation.reference: 祝您度过美好的一天！

translation.en: I apologize but I'm unable to find an account under the email provided.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，我找不到您提供的电子邮件帐户。
translation.source: I apologize but I'm unable to find an account under the email provided.
translation.medium: 我向您道歉，但我无法在您提供的电子邮件地址下找到账户。
translation.reference: 很抱歉，我找不到您提供的电子邮件帐户。

translation.en: The other thing you can try is to perform a factory reset to your device and then check if it gets detected by your computer
translation.zh: 另外，您还可以尝试在设备上执行出厂重置，然后检查能否被电脑检测到
translation.source: The other thing you can try is to perform a factory reset to your device and then check if it gets detected by your computer
translation.medium: 另一种可以尝试的方法是对你的设备进行工厂重置，然后检查你的电脑是否可以检测到它。
translation.reference: 另外，您还可以尝试在设备上执行出厂重置，然后检查能否被电脑检测到

translation.en: To do this, please follow these instructions:
translation.zh: 为此，请按照以下说明操作：
translation.source: To do this, please follow these instructions:
translation.medium: 请按以下步骤操作：
translation.reference: 为此，请按照以下说明操作：

translation.en: If possible, back up any books or documents that you added to your eReader using #PRS_ORG#, or that you manually added using your computer.
translation.zh: 如果可以，请备份使用 #PRS_ORG# 添加到电子阅读器中或使用电脑手动添加的所有图书和文档。
translation.source: If possible, back up any books or documents that you added to your eReader using #PRS_ORG#, or that you manually added using your computer.
translation.medium: 如果情况允许，请备份您使用 #PRS_ORG# 添加的书籍或文档，或者使用计算机手动添加的书籍或文档。
translation.reference: 如果可以，请备份使用 #PRS_ORG# 添加到电子阅读器中或使用电脑手动添加的所有图书和文档。

translation.en: You do not need to back up any books you bought from #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 对于从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的图书，则无需备份。
translation.source: You do not need to back up any books you bought from #PRS_ORG#.
translation.medium: 你不需要备份你从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的任何书籍。
translation.reference: 对于从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的图书，则无需备份。

translation.en: Any books you purchased from #PRS_ORG# can be re-downloaded from the #PRS_ORG# #PRS_ORG# after a factory reset.
translation.zh: 执行工厂重置后，从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的图书可从 #PRS_ORG# #PRS_ORG# 重新下载。
translation.source: Any books you purchased from #PRS_ORG# can be re-downloaded from the #PRS_ORG# #PRS_ORG# after a factory reset.
translation.medium: 您从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的任何书籍可以在重置设备后从 #PRS_ORG# #PRS_ORG# 重新下载。
translation.reference: 执行工厂重置后，从 #PRS_ORG# 购买的图书可从 #PRS_ORG# #PRS_ORG# 重新下载。

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 打开主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap Home at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“主页”。
translation.source: Tap Home at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕顶部的 Home。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的“主页”。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 点击设置。
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 点击设备信息。
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Tap Factory reset under Advanced.
translation.zh: 在“高级”下点击“出厂重置”。
translation.source: Tap Factory reset under Advanced.
translation.medium: 选择 Advanced，然后选择 Factory reset。
translation.reference: 在“高级”下点击“出厂重置”。

translation.en: Tap Reset Now.
translation.zh: 点击“立即重置”。
translation.source: Tap Reset Now.
translation.medium: 点击 Reset Now。
translation.reference: 点击“立即重置”。

translation.en: I'm still with you
translation.zh: 我一直在这里
translation.source: I'm still with you
translation.medium: 我还在
translation.reference: 我一直在这里

translation.en: Oh, so glad you asked, I have a lot to say about this.
translation.zh: 很高兴你来问我，我有一肚子的话要说。
translation.source: Oh, so glad you asked, I have a lot to say about this.
translation.medium: 哦，真好，我有很多话想说。
translation.reference: 很高兴你来问我，我有一肚子的话要说。

translation.en: Yes, there’s been a pretty drastic change.
translation.zh: 是的，变化真的很大。
translation.source: Yes, there’s been a pretty drastic change.
translation.medium: 是的，发生了很大的变化。
translation.reference: 是的，变化真的很大。

translation.en: I have been overweight/obese since I was 3 years old, so existing like that is all I ever knew until age 30.
translation.zh: 我从 3 岁开始就超重/肥胖，在 30 岁之前，我一直都这样。
translation.source: I have been overweight/obese since I was 3 years old, so existing like that is all I ever knew until age 30.
translation.medium: 我从 3 岁开始就患有肥胖症/肥胖症，直到 30 岁，我都没有别的选择。
translation.reference: 我从 3 岁开始就超重/肥胖，在 30 岁之前，我一直都这样。

translation.en: The vast majority of my family and friends who knew me before treat me the same and are SO.
translation.zh: 我的大多数家人和以前认识的绝大多数朋友还是像从前一样对我，他们对我
translation.source: The vast majority of my family and friends who knew me before treat me the same and are SO.
translation.medium: 大多数我以前认识的家人和朋友对我的态度没有改变，都很SO。
translation.reference: 我的大多数家人和以前认识的绝大多数朋友还是像从前一样对我，他们对我

translation.en: damn.
translation.zh: 真是太
translation.source: damn.
translation.medium: 哎。
translation.reference: 真是太

translation.en: supportive.
translation.zh: 宽容了。
translation.source: supportive.
translation.medium: 支持。
translation.reference: 宽容了。

translation.en: I do have a select few familial relationships, which were strained to begin with, where it seems that my weight loss has exacerbated the existing problems.
translation.zh: 不过，我跟有些家族成员本来就紧张的关系在我减肥后似乎更严重了。
translation.source: I do have a select few familial relationships, which were strained to begin with, where it seems that my weight loss has exacerbated the existing problems.
translation.medium: 我确实有一些家庭关系，这些关系本来就很紧张，我的体重减轻似乎加剧了原有的问题。
translation.reference: 不过，我跟有些家族成员本来就紧张的关系在我减肥后似乎更严重了。

translation.en: This could be the result of their complexes or mine, because I think they’re used to being able to shit on me and I, in turn, am now even less willing to take their shit.
translation.zh: 这可能是他们的问题，也可能是我的问题，我觉得他们习惯了欺负我，而我不会再默默承受。
translation.source: This could be the result of their complexes or mine, because I think they’re used to being able to shit on me and I, in turn, am now even less willing to take their shit.
translation.medium: 这可能是他们的自卑感或我的原因，因为我觉得他们习惯了把粪便撒在我身上，而我现在更不愿意接受他们的粪便。
translation.reference: 这可能是他们的问题，也可能是我的问题，我觉得他们习惯了欺负我，而我不会再默默承受。

translation.en: One person in particular has, very weirdly, tried to take credit for my weight loss.
translation.zh: 特别是有一个人，他很奇怪，他觉得我减肥成功全靠他。
translation.source: One person in particular has, very weirdly, tried to take credit for my weight loss.
translation.medium: 有一个人很奇怪地试图为我的体重减轻负责。
translation.reference: 特别是有一个人，他很奇怪，他觉得我减肥成功全靠他。

translation.en: Basically, they’ve insinuated that they were the driving force that got me here, under the guise of being supportive, when in reality they didn’t even know I was making these changes until I had already gone through with the RNY and lost well over 100lbs.
translation.zh: 他们会暗示说他们是我减肥的动力，他们打着支持我的幌子招摇过市，但直到我做完 RNY，并瘦了 100 多磅，他们才知道我减肥了。
translation.source: Basically, they’ve insinuated that they were the driving force that got me here, under the guise of being supportive, when in reality they didn’t even know I was making these changes until I had already gone through with the RNY and lost well over 100lbs.
translation.medium: 基本上，他们暗示自己是我来到这里的驱动力，借口支持，但实际上他们甚至不知道我在做这些改变，直到我已经完成了RNY手术，丢掉了100多磅。
translation.reference: 他们会暗示说他们是我减肥的动力，他们打着支持我的幌子招摇过市，但直到我做完 RNY，并瘦了 100 多磅，他们才知道我减肥了。

translation.en: In fact, they were the last to know, intentionally, because I just didn’t want them to try to take control and bully me into things like I used to let them.
translation.zh: 事实上，他们是最后才知道的，我故意瞒着他们，因为我不想让他们还像从前那样控制我，对我为所欲为。
translation.source: In fact, they were the last to know, intentionally, because I just didn’t want them to try to take control and bully me into things like I used to let them.
translation.medium: 事实上，他们是最后一批知道的人，因为我故意这样做，因为我不想让他们试图控制我，强迫我做一些以前我曾让他们做的事情。
translation.reference: 事实上，他们是最后才知道的，我故意瞒着他们，因为我不想让他们还像从前那样控制我，对我为所欲为。

translation.en: Unsurprisingly, now they’ve taken to insulting my other features, like telling me my nose and forehead look too big since I lost weight and that I need a nose job and bangs to fix it - this is typical behavior from them.
translation.zh: 不出所料，现在他们开始侮辱我的其他特征，比如说我减肥后鼻子和额头看起来太大了，我需要做鼻子整形手术，用刘海来遮着额头——他们一贯如此。
translation.source: Unsurprisingly, now they’ve taken to insulting my other features, like telling me my nose and forehead look too big since I lost weight and that I need a nose job and bangs to fix it - this is typical behavior from them.
translation.medium: 不出所料，现在他们又开始辱骂我的其他特征，比如说我因为减肥，鼻子和额头看起来太大了，需要做鼻部整形手术和修额头，这是他们的典型行为。
translation.reference: 不出所料，现在他们开始侮辱我的其他特征，比如说我减肥后鼻子和额头看起来太大了，我需要做鼻子整形手术，用刘海来遮着额头——他们一贯如此。

translation.en: At first, they just private messaged me these things but when I didn’t respond, they took to commenting about it publicly on social media, with no shame.
translation.zh: 一开始，他们只是私下给我发这些信息，看到我没有回复，他们就开始在社交媒体上公开评论，肆无忌惮。
translation.source: At first, they just private messaged me these things but when I didn’t respond, they took to commenting about it publicly on social media, with no shame.
translation.medium: 起初，他们只是通过私信告诉我这些事情，但当我没有回应时，他们就开始在社交媒体上公开评论，没有一点顾忌。
translation.reference: 一开始，他们只是私下给我发这些信息，看到我没有回复，他们就开始在社交媒体上公开评论，肆无忌惮。

translation.en: When I was bigger, that would have destroyed me and I would have listened but now I just ignore it.
translation.zh: 以前，我很在意这些，所以会听他们的，但现在我听耳不闻。
translation.source: When I was bigger, that would have destroyed me and I would have listened but now I just ignore it.
translation.medium: 当我还小的时候，这会毁掉我，但现在我只是忽略它。
translation.reference: 以前，我很在意这些，所以会听他们的，但现在我听耳不闻。

translation.en: Luckily, my skin is thicker now (not just cause it’s in excess these days).
translation.zh: 幸运的是，现在我脸皮变厚了（不是这些天才变厚的）。
translation.source: Luckily, my skin is thicker now (not just cause it’s in excess these days).
translation.medium: 幸运的是，我的皮肤现在比以前更厚（不仅仅是因为这些日子太多了）。
translation.reference: 幸运的是，现在我脸皮变厚了（不是这些天才变厚的）。

translation.en: The attention from strangers is by far the weirdest part for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说，陌生人的注意是我最难适应的。
translation.source: The attention from strangers is by far the weirdest part for me.
translation.medium: 对我来说，最奇怪的还是陌生人的关注。
translation.reference: 对我来说，陌生人的注意是我最难适应的。

translation.en: When I was bigger, people really didn’t pay me any attention.
translation.zh: 以前，没有人注意过我。
translation.source: When I was bigger, people really didn’t pay me any attention.
translation.medium: 当我长大的时候，人们真的不在乎我。
translation.reference: 以前，没有人注意过我。

translation.en: Like, little to no eye contact.
translation.zh: 我跟陌生人之间几乎没有眼神交流。
translation.source: Like, little to no eye contact.
translation.medium: 例如，几乎没有眼神交流。
translation.reference: 我跟陌生人之间几乎没有眼神交流。

translation.en: No saying hello or smiling at me as we pass on the street unless they knew me.
translation.zh: 我在街上走过时，除非是认识的人，否则没有人会对我打招呼或微笑。
translation.source: No saying hello or smiling at me as we pass on the street unless they knew me.
translation.medium: 除非他们认识我，否则他们不会在街上打招呼或微笑。
translation.reference: 我在街上走过时，除非是认识的人，否则没有人会对我打招呼或微笑。

translation.en: Definitely no going out of their way to help or compliment me.
translation.zh: 他们绝对不会特意帮助我或赞美我。
translation.source: Definitely no going out of their way to help or compliment me.
translation.medium: 绝对不会主动帮助或赞美我。
translation.reference: 他们绝对不会特意帮助我或赞美我。

translation.en: It was more isolating than I realized because it’s what I was used to.
translation.zh: 如今想来，这种孤立感比我想像的更甚，但我以前早就习惯了。
translation.source: It was more isolating than I realized because it’s what I was used to.
translation.medium: 它比我想象的要更孤独，因为它是我熟悉的。
translation.reference: 如今想来，这种孤立感比我想像的更甚，但我以前早就习惯了。

translation.en: I knew people could be judgmental of my size - with many doing so openly - but I never realized, until I lost weight, the micro-level of it and just how subtle it can come about.
translation.zh: 我以前就知道人们会对我的身材指指点点，甚至很多人当着我的面说我如何如何，但直到我减肥后，我才意识到这其中的微妙之处。
translation.source: I knew people could be judgmental of my size - with many doing so openly - but I never realized, until I lost weight, the micro-level of it and just how subtle it can come about.
translation.medium: 我知道人们会对我的身材产生偏见，但直到我减肥之后，我才意识到微观层面的偏见，以及它的微妙程度。
translation.reference: 我以前就知道人们会对我的身材指指点点，甚至很多人当着我的面说我如何如何，但直到我减肥后，我才意识到这其中的微妙之处。

translation.en: Not only was I unaware of it, simply because it’s what I was used to, but I also don’t think those who perpetuate it are actively aware they’re doing it.
translation.zh: 我早就习惯了，所以我没有意识到这一点，但我认为那些一直这么做的人也从未主动意识到这一点。
translation.source: Not only was I unaware of it, simply because it’s what I was used to, but I also don’t think those who perpetuate it are actively aware they’re doing it.
translation.medium: 不仅仅是因为我没有意识到这一点，而且我认为那些继续这样做的人并不意识到他们正在这样做。
translation.reference: 我早就习惯了，所以我没有意识到这一点，但我认为那些一直这么做的人也从未主动意识到这一点。

translation.en: I really believe it is a subconscious bias, bred and exacerbated by the portrayal and treatment of overweight people in media, that many people just don’t realize they project.
translation.zh: 我真的认为这是一种潜意识的偏见，而媒体对超重人群的描述和对待则滋生并加剧了这一偏见，许多人根本没有意识到他们在将这种意识投射到了行为上。
translation.source: I really believe it is a subconscious bias, bred and exacerbated by the portrayal and treatment of overweight people in media, that many people just don’t realize they project.
translation.medium: 我真的相信这是一种潜意识的偏见，这种偏见由媒体对肥胖人群的描绘和对待而产生和加剧的。许多人根本不知道自己有这种偏见。
translation.reference: 我真的认为这是一种潜意识的偏见，而媒体对超重人群的描述和对待则滋生并加剧了这一偏见，许多人根本没有意识到他们在将这种意识投射到了行为上。

translation.en: Now, it feels like everyone everywhere looks at me, smiles at me, talks to me, etc.
translation.zh: 现在，我感觉每个人都在看我，对我微笑，找机会和我说话，等等。
translation.source: Now, it feels like everyone everywhere looks at me, smiles at me, talks to me, etc.
translation.medium: 现在感觉每个人每个地方都在看着我，笑着对我说话。
translation.reference: 现在，我感觉每个人都在看我，对我微笑，找机会和我说话，等等。

translation.en: Both men and women engage with me differently, making more efforts to talk to/get to know me - and that’s just platonically.
translation.zh: 不管是男人还是女人，对我都不一样了，他们更乐于与我交谈/了解我——当然只是柏拉图式的。
translation.source: Both men and women engage with me differently, making more efforts to talk to/get to know me - and that’s just platonically.
translation.medium: 男性和女性对我的互动方式不同，他们更努力地和我聊天/认识我 - 这只是朋友关系。
translation.reference: 不管是男人还是女人，对我都不一样了，他们更乐于与我交谈/了解我——当然只是柏拉图式的。

translation.en: Romantically, my dating pool has expanded from what few were willing to be seen with me to what feels like… everyone lol.
translation.zh: 在爱情方面，我的约会对象已经从“很少有人愿意和我走在一起”扩大到了“感觉所有人都对我有意思”，哈哈。
translation.source: Romantically, my dating pool has expanded from what few were willing to be seen with me to what feels like… everyone lol.
translation.medium: 浪漫的是，我的约会池扩大到了几乎所有人都愿意和我约会，哈哈。
translation.reference: 在爱情方面，我的约会对象已经从“很少有人愿意和我走在一起”扩大到了“感觉所有人都对我有意思”，哈哈。

translation.en: It is DAUNTING.
translation.zh: 我会感到害怕。
translation.source: It is DAUNTING.
translation.medium: 它令人恐惧。
translation.reference: 我会感到害怕。

translation.en: I assumed that, at the very least, the fact that I was morbidly obese, have lost all this weight and now have excess skin would deter some people, but despite the fact that I put my weight loss and excess skin right at the forefront (because I don’t want it to be a secret), it has bothered/deterred approximately no one in my experience.
translation.zh: 因为我以为，过去病态般肥胖的我减肥后松弛的皮肤会让人望而却步，但是尽管我并未隐瞒我减肥和皮肤松弛的事实（因为我不想让它成为秘密）,但在我的记忆里，几乎没有人因此对我丧失兴趣。
translation.source: I assumed that, at the very least, the fact that I was morbidly obese, have lost all this weight and now have excess skin would deter some people, but despite the fact that I put my weight loss and excess skin right at the forefront (because I don’t want it to be a secret), it has bothered/deterred approximately no one in my experience.
translation.medium: 我认为，至少，因为我患有严重的肥胖症，已经减掉了这么多体重，现在还有多余的皮肤，会让一些人感到厌恶，但尽管我把我的体重减轻和多余的皮肤放在最前面（因为我不想让它成为一个秘密），但在我的经历中，它对大多数人来说并没有产生任何影响。
translation.reference: 因为我以为，过去病态般肥胖的我减肥后松弛的皮肤会让人望而却步，但是尽管我并未隐瞒我减肥和皮肤松弛的事实（因为我不想让它成为秘密）,但在我的记忆里，几乎没有人因此对我丧失兴趣。

translation.en: It seems to have done the opposite and made them more interested, actually.
translation.zh: 实际上，似乎还起到了相反的作用，这让他们更感兴趣。
translation.source: It seems to have done the opposite and made them more interested, actually.
translation.medium: 似乎做了相反的事情，让他们更加感兴趣。
translation.reference: 实际上，似乎还起到了相反的作用，这让他们更感兴趣。

translation.en: Huge shock to me.
translation.zh: 真是让我震惊。
translation.source: Huge shock to me.
translation.medium: 对我来说是一个巨大的冲击。
translation.reference: 真是让我震惊。

translation.en: I do have to put a little PSA here, though, for men who are newly talking to/dating a woman who has lost weight: comments like “I am so happy you lost the weight, you clearly haven’t realized how gorgeous you are yet” is NOT the way to go.
translation.zh: 不过，我必须忠告那些刚刚和减肥的女性交谈或约会的男性，不要说类似“看到你减肥了，我真高兴，很显然你不知道你有多漂亮”这样的话。
translation.source: I do have to put a little PSA here, though, for men who are newly talking to/dating a woman who has lost weight: comments like “I am so happy you lost the weight, you clearly haven’t realized how gorgeous you are yet” is NOT the way to go.
translation.medium: 尽管如此，我还是要提醒一下那些刚刚开始和一个体重减轻的女性谈恋爱或交往的男性：“我很高兴你减轻了体重，你还没有意识到自己多么漂亮”这样的评论是不可取的。
translation.reference: 不过，我必须忠告那些刚刚和减肥的女性交谈或约会的男性，不要说类似“看到你减肥了，我真高兴，很显然你不知道你有多漂亮”这样的话。

translation.en: I have heard some variation of this more times than I care to count and they all thought it was a compliment.
translation.zh: 我已经听过很多很多这样的话了，他们都觉得这是一种赞美。
translation.source: I have heard some variation of this more times than I care to count and they all thought it was a compliment.
translation.medium: 我已经听到过这种说法多次，他们都认为这是一种赞美。
translation.reference: 我已经听过很多很多这样的话了，他们都觉得这是一种赞美。

translation.en: Hey r/Military!
translation.zh: 军事发烧友们，你们好！
translation.source: Hey r/Military!
translation.medium: Hey r/Military!
translation.reference: 军事发烧友们，你们好！

translation.en: I am from a country where military duty is mandatory and I am just wondering how's it like for other countries.
translation.zh: 我来自一个强制服兵役的国家，我想知道其他国家对服兵役有什么要求。
translation.source: I am from a country where military duty is mandatory and I am just wondering how's it like for other countries.
translation.medium: 我来自一个征兵制国家，我只是想知道其他国家的情况。
translation.reference: 我来自一个强制服兵役的国家，我想知道其他国家对服兵役有什么要求。

translation.en: Hello everyone!
translation.zh: 大家好！
translation.source: Hello everyone!
translation.medium: 大家好！
translation.reference: 大家好！

translation.en: I am from Estonia, where I am part of the National Defense Force.
translation.zh: 我来自爱沙尼亚，是爱沙尼亚国防军的军人。
translation.source: I am from Estonia, where I am part of the National Defense Force.
translation.medium: 我来自爱沙尼亚，在国防部服役。
translation.reference: 我来自爱沙尼亚，是爱沙尼亚国防军的军人。

translation.en: Here military service is mandatory for all men from the ages of 16-29.
translation.zh: 在爱沙尼亚，所有 16-29 岁的男性都必须服兵役。
translation.source: Here military service is mandatory for all men from the ages of 16-29.
translation.medium: 从 16 岁到 29 岁，所有男性都必须服兵役。
translation.reference: 在爱沙尼亚，所有 16-29 岁的男性都必须服兵役。

translation.en: You have to complete either 8 or 11 months of training after which you are sent to the "reserve" unit until you turn 60.
translation.zh: 我们需要完成 8 或 11 个月的训练，然后进入“预备役”部队，直到 60 岁。
translation.source: You have to complete either 8 or 11 months of training after which you are sent to the "reserve" unit until you turn 60.
translation.medium: 你必须完成 8 个月或 11 个月的训练，然后被分配到“储备”部队，直到 60 岁。
translation.reference: 我们需要完成 8 或 11 个月的训练，然后进入“预备役”部队，直到 60 岁。

translation.en: In that time, the Defense Force is eligible to demand you take part in some military exercises once or twice a year for approx 2 weeks per year.
translation.zh: 在此期间，国防军有资格要求我们每年参加一次或两次军事演习，每年大约 2 周。
translation.source: In that time, the Defense Force is eligible to demand you take part in some military exercises once or twice a year for approx 2 weeks per year.
translation.medium: 在此期间，国防部队有权要求你每年参加一次或两次军事演习，每年约 2 周。
translation.reference: 在此期间，国防军有资格要求我们每年参加一次或两次军事演习，每年大约 2 周。

translation.en: However, you are not mandated to go on a foreign mission.
translation.zh: 不过，我们不会被送去执行外国任务。
translation.source: However, you are not mandated to go on a foreign mission.
translation.medium: 但是，你并不被委派出国。
translation.reference: 不过，我们不会被送去执行外国任务。

translation.en: If you want to do that, you have to join the "scouts battalion" where you will be a professional military dude with pay and such.
translation.zh: 要想执行外国任务，必须加入“侦察兵营”，成为一名带薪的职业军人。
translation.source: If you want to do that, you have to join the "scouts battalion" where you will be a professional military dude with pay and such.
translation.medium: 如果你想这样做，你必须加入“探险队”，你将成为一名专业的军人，并且有工资。
translation.reference: 要想执行外国任务，必须加入“侦察兵营”，成为一名带薪的职业军人。

translation.en: I am just wondering how is it for other countries?
translation.zh: 我只是想了解一下其他国家在这方面的规定。
translation.source: I am just wondering how is it for other countries?
translation.medium: 其他国家的情况怎么样？
translation.reference: 我只是想了解一下其他国家在这方面的规定。

translation.en: If you join the military in, for example, the USA or the UK, then are you mandated to go fight in another country?
translation.zh: 如果你入伍，比如你在美国或英国，那么你会被授权去另一个国家作战吗？
translation.source: If you join the military in, for example, the USA or the UK, then are you mandated to go fight in another country?
translation.medium: 如果你加入美国或英国的军队，那么你是否有义务去另一个国家战斗？
translation.reference: 如果你入伍，比如你在美国或英国，那么你会被授权去另一个国家作战吗？

translation.en: What do you guys think about mandatory military service?
translation.zh: 你们怎么看待服兵役这件事？
translation.source: What do you guys think about mandatory military service?
translation.medium: 你们怎么看待征兵制？
translation.reference: 你们怎么看待服兵役这件事？

translation.en: During training when I was in Tapa 2018-2019, there were also units from the UK, US, France, Belgium, Denmark and Canada.
translation.zh: 2018-2019 年我在塔帕训练期间，还有来自英国、美国、法国、比利时、丹麦和加拿大的军人。
translation.source: During training when I was in Tapa 2018-2019, there were also units from the UK, US, France, Belgium, Denmark and Canada.
translation.medium: 在我在塔帕 2018-2019 年的训练期间，也有来自英国、美国、法国、比利时、丹麦和加拿大的部队。
translation.reference: 2018-2019 年我在塔帕训练期间，还有来自英国、美国、法国、比利时、丹麦和加拿大的军人。

translation.en: Unfortunately though, we really didn't have much time to socialize and I didn't get to ask those guys in person what it's like for them to serve in their country's military.
translation.zh: 遗憾的是，我们的社交时间不多，我也没有机会亲口问问那些人在他们国家对服役有什么要求。
translation.source: Unfortunately though, we really didn't have much time to socialize and I didn't get to ask those guys in person what it's like for them to serve in their country's military.
translation.medium: 可惜的是，我们真的没有太多时间交流，我没有机会亲自向他们询问他们在自己国家的军队服役的感受。
translation.reference: 遗憾的是，我们的社交时间不多，我也没有机会亲口问问那些人在他们国家对服役有什么要求。

translation.en: I know that there are probably mostly NATO members in this subreddit, but it would be interesting to hear from other (non-NATO) countries as well.
translation.zh: 我知道个版块里的大部分人可能都来自北约成员国，但如果能听到其他非北约国家网友的分享也很有趣。
translation.source: I know that there are probably mostly NATO members in this subreddit, but it would be interesting to hear from other (non-NATO) countries as well.
translation.medium: 我知道这个论坛的大多数成员都是北大西洋公约组织成员国，但也很想听听其他国家的意见。
translation.reference: 我知道个版块里的大部分人可能都来自北约成员国，但如果能听到其他非北约国家网友的分享也很有趣。

translation.en: Sorry for my poor grammar.
translation.zh: 英语是我的第二语言，
translation.source: Sorry for my poor grammar.
translation.medium: 对不起，我的语法不好。
translation.reference: 英语是我的第二语言，

translation.en: English is my second language.
translation.zh: 所有我可能说得有点文法不通，望大家海涵。
translation.source: English is my second language.
translation.medium: 英语是我的第二语言。
translation.reference: 所有我可能说得有点文法不通，望大家海涵。

translation.en: You can also reset it from there.
translation.zh: 您也可以从此处重置。
translation.source: You can also reset it from there.
translation.medium: 你也可以从那里重置它。
translation.reference: 您也可以从此处重置。

translation.en: However I recommend you resetting it from your computer, even if you are logged in on your computer, this is for you to remember your password, as this information is important to know by memory
translation.zh: 不过，即使您从电脑登录，我还是建议您从电脑重置，这是为了让您记住密码，因为这些信息很重要，必须记住
translation.source: However I recommend you resetting it from your computer, even if you are logged in on your computer, this is for you to remember your password, as this information is important to know by memory
translation.medium: 但我建议您从您的电脑重置它，即使您已经登录到您的电脑上，这是为了让您记住您的密码，因为这些信息非常重要
translation.reference: 不过，即使您从电脑登录，我还是建议您从电脑重置，这是为了让您记住密码，因为这些信息很重要，必须记住

translation.en: Once your password is reset from your computer, please try accessing once again on our daughter's e-reader with your new password
translation.zh: 在电脑上重置密码后，请尝试使用新密码从您女儿的电子阅读器再次访问
translation.source: Once your password is reset from your computer, please try accessing once again on our daughter's e-reader with your new password
translation.medium: 一旦您重置了电脑上的密码，请再次使用您的新密码访问我们的女儿的电子阅读器
translation.reference: 在电脑上重置密码后，请尝试使用新密码从您女儿的电子阅读器再次访问

translation.en: please let me know if it works
translation.zh: 请告诉我这个方法是否可行
translation.source: please let me know if it works
translation.medium: 如果有效，请告诉我
translation.reference: 请告诉我这个方法是否可行

translation.en: I enjoy articles like this help untangle the convoluted web of sociopathic megalomaniac men that my dad glorified ad nauseam and the plurality of leaders he decried.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这样的文章，它有助于厘清我父亲令人作呕地美化的反社会自大狂男人和他谴责的多数领导人构成的错综复杂的网络。
translation.source: I enjoy articles like this help untangle the convoluted web of sociopathic megalomaniac men that my dad glorified ad nauseam and the plurality of leaders he decried.
translation.medium: 我喜欢这样的文章能够帮助我解开我父亲崇拜至极的社会人格障碍大男子主义者和他谴责的各种领导人的复杂网络。
translation.reference: 我喜欢这样的文章，它有助于厘清我父亲令人作呕地美化的反社会自大狂男人和他谴责的多数领导人构成的错综复杂的网络。

translation.en: Guess where Nixon and Carter fell, and his golden boy Reagan could do no ills.
translation.zh: 猜猜尼克松和卡特落在了哪里，而他的金童里根却毫发无损。
translation.source: Guess where Nixon and Carter fell, and his golden boy Reagan could do no ills.
translation.medium: 猜猜看，尼克松和卡特跌落谷底，而他的金童雷根也无恶不作。
translation.reference: 猜猜尼克松和卡特落在了哪里，而他的金童里根却毫发无损。

translation.en: While I have long since known that this world view is complete BS and in fact I despise each of those megalomaniacs from Caesar through Bonaparte, Nixon, Reagan, Bush and Trump,
translation.zh: 虽然我早就知道这种世界观完全是胡扯，事实上我鄙视凯撒、波拿巴、尼克松、里根、布什和特朗普等每一个自大狂。
translation.source: While I have long since known that this world view is complete BS and in fact I despise each of those megalomaniacs from Caesar through Bonaparte, Nixon, Reagan, Bush and Trump,
translation.medium: 虽然我已经很早就知道这种世界观是完全的垃圾，但我实际上讨厌了从凯撒到拿破仑、尼克松、里根、布什和特朗普的每一个傲慢的暴君。
translation.reference: 虽然我早就知道这种世界观完全是胡扯，事实上我鄙视凯撒、波拿巴、尼克松、里根、布什和特朗普等每一个自大狂。

translation.en: I can appreciate the historical significance of Caesar or Napoleon, but the quasi-sacred nature of their sanitized histories turned me off them later on in life.
translation.zh: 我能理解凯撒或拿破仑的历史意义，但他们的历史被神话之后，变成了近乎神圣的存在，这让我在后来的生活中对他们失去了兴趣。
translation.source: I can appreciate the historical significance of Caesar or Napoleon, but the quasi-sacred nature of their sanitized histories turned me off them later on in life.
translation.medium: 我可以欣赏凯撒或拿破仑的历史意义，但他们的净化过的历史让我后来对他们失去了兴趣。
translation.reference: 我能理解凯撒或拿破仑的历史意义，但他们的历史被神话之后，变成了近乎神圣的存在，这让我在后来的生活中对他们失去了兴趣。

translation.en: To this day, I still refuse to study the history of Poland as that would just allow the paranoid conspiracies of my dad to bubble forward.
translation.zh: 直到今天，我仍然拒绝学习波兰历史，因为那样只会让我父亲的偏执的阴谋论冒头。
translation.source: To this day, I still refuse to study the history of Poland as that would just allow the paranoid conspiracies of my dad to bubble forward.
translation.medium: 至今为止，我仍然拒绝学习波兰的历史，因为这样做只会让我爸爸那种患有妄想症的阴谋论沸腾起来。
translation.reference: 直到今天，我仍然拒绝学习波兰历史，因为那样只会让我父亲的偏执的阴谋论冒头。

translation.en: Returning to this article, I love the small details that remind you that there actually was one good choice (despite smaller flaws - but mostly acting in good faith) and one side that was not good, did not act in good faith, and where malice was and is the more likely explanation than stupidity.
translation.zh: 回到这篇文章中，我非常喜欢那些小细节，它们提醒你其实有一个不错的选择（尽管略有瑕疵，但主要是出于善意），不好的一方没有采取善意的行动，并且过去和现在，恶意都是比愚蠢更合理的解释。
translation.source: Returning to this article, I love the small details that remind you that there actually was one good choice (despite smaller flaws - but mostly acting in good faith) and one side that was not good, did not act in good faith, and where malice was and is the more likely explanation than stupidity.
translation.medium: 回到这篇文章，我喜欢这些小细节，它们提醒我们，实际上还是有一个好的选择（尽管存在一些小缺陷 - 但大部分都是在善意的基础上行事），还有一方是不好的，没有善意，并且恶意的解释比愚蠢的解释更有可能。
translation.reference: 回到这篇文章中，我非常喜欢那些小细节，它们提醒你其实有一个不错的选择（尽管略有瑕疵，但主要是出于善意），不好的一方没有采取善意的行动，并且过去和现在，恶意都是比愚蠢更合理的解释。

translation.en: That's the thing.
translation.zh: 就是这样的。
translation.source: That's the thing.
translation.medium: 这就是问题所在。
translation.reference: 就是这样的。

translation.en: Republicans love to hide behind stupidity rather than admit malice, but make no mistake if the ideological basis of a party is being under siege.
translation.zh: 共和党人喜欢以愚蠢作为挡箭牌，他们不会承认有恶意，但如果一个政党的意识形态基础受到围攻，那就不容犯错了。
translation.source: Republicans love to hide behind stupidity rather than admit malice, but make no mistake if the ideological basis of a party is being under siege.
translation.medium: 共和党人更喜欢隐藏自己的愚蠢，而不是承认自己的恶意，但如果一个党派的理论基础受到围攻，就不要误会了。
translation.reference: 共和党人喜欢以愚蠢作为挡箭牌，他们不会承认有恶意，但如果一个政党的意识形态基础受到围攻，那就不容犯错了。

translation.en: Then coincidence, serendipity, etc. rarely exist.
translation.zh: 所谓的巧合、意外等很少存在。
translation.source: Then coincidence, serendipity, etc. rarely exist.
translation.medium: 然后巧合、偶然等很少存在。
translation.reference: 所谓的巧合、意外等很少存在。

translation.en: The besieged mentality means that every action must count, or else you are expensing limited energy on frivolous acts.
translation.zh: 被包围的心态意味着每一个行动都必须有意义，否则你有限的精力只能花在琐碎的行为上。
translation.source: The besieged mentality means that every action must count, or else you are expensing limited energy on frivolous acts.
translation.medium: 被围困的心理意味着每一个行动都必须计算得当，否则你就会浪费有限的精力。
translation.reference: 被包围的心态意味着每一个行动都必须有意义，否则你有限的精力只能花在琐碎的行为上。

translation.en: But Republicans love to hide behind our more nuanced understanding of the world and try to throw back the various philosophical razors.
translation.zh: 但共和党人喜欢躲在我们对世界更细致入微的理解背后，并试图抛回各种哲学剃刀。
translation.source: But Republicans love to hide behind our more nuanced understanding of the world and try to throw back the various philosophical razors.
translation.medium: 但是，共和党人喜欢隐藏在我们更复杂的世界观背后，试图把各种各样的哲学剃刀扔回来。
translation.reference: 但共和党人喜欢躲在我们对世界更细致入微的理解背后，并试图抛回各种哲学剃刀。

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to chat to me today.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天联系我。
translation.source: Thank you for taking the time to chat to me today.
translation.medium: 感谢你今天花时间和我聊天。
translation.reference: 感谢您今天联系我。

translation.en: Once this chat has ended you will be sent a 'rate my chat' feedback email.
translation.zh: 本次聊天结束后，您将收到“对我进行评价”的反馈电子邮件。
translation.source: Once this chat has ended you will be sent a 'rate my chat' feedback email.
translation.medium: 聊天结束后，您将收到一封“评价我的聊天”反馈邮件。
translation.reference: 本次聊天结束后，您将收到“对我进行评价”的反馈电子邮件。

translation.en: Please kindly fill this in if you have a moment, however if you don't have time then may I wish you a wonderful day and thank you again.
translation.zh: 请您抽空对我进行评价，如果您没有时间，也没关系，再次感谢您！
translation.source: Please kindly fill this in if you have a moment, however if you don't have time then may I wish you a wonderful day and thank you again.
translation.medium: 如果您有时间，请您填写一下，如果您没有时间，那么我祝您一个美好的日子，再次感谢。
translation.reference: 请您抽空对我进行评价，如果您没有时间，也没关系，再次感谢您！

translation.en: Our concentrated combination of dedication and expertise benefits our customers.
translation.zh: 我们以高度凝结的敬业精神和专业知识为我们服务。
translation.source: Our concentrated combination of dedication and expertise benefits our customers.
translation.medium: 我们的专业知识和执着的结合为我们的客户带来了好处。
translation.reference: 我们以高度凝结的敬业精神和专业知识为我们服务。

translation.en: Norton has been outperforming the competition in many reputable head-to-head tests, and only Norton has won the PC Magazine Editors’ Choice Award 34 times, including 11 years in a row – more than any other security company.
translation.zh: 诺顿在许多信誉良好的直接测试中都胜过了竞争对手，只有诺顿获得过 PC 杂志编辑选择奖 34 次，而且有一次连续 11 年获得此奖，这是任何其他安全公司都无法比拟的。
translation.source: Norton has been outperforming the competition in many reputable head-to-head tests, and only Norton has won the PC Magazine Editors’ Choice Award 34 times, including 11 years in a row – more than any other security company.
translation.medium: 诺顿已经在许多声誉卓著的头对头测试中表现优异，诺顿是唯一一家赢得过 PC 杂志编辑选择奖 34 次的安全公司，包括连续 11 年 – 其他任何安全公司都没有达到这一成绩。
translation.reference: 诺顿在许多信誉良好的直接测试中都胜过了竞争对手，只有诺顿获得过 PC 杂志编辑选择奖 34 次，而且有一次连续 11 年获得此奖，这是任何其他安全公司都无法比拟的。

translation.en: What does that mean for you?
translation.zh: 这对您意味着什么？
translation.source: What does that mean for you?
translation.medium: 这意味着什么呢？
translation.reference: 这对您意味着什么？

translation.en: When you buy Norton Security, you’re getting one of the best security products on the market today.
translation.zh: 这意味着，在您购买 Norton Security 后，您就得到了当今市场上最好的安全产品之一。
translation.source: When you buy Norton Security, you’re getting one of the best security products on the market today.
translation.medium: 当您购买 Norton Security 时，您会得到目前市场上最好的安全产品。
translation.reference: 这意味着，在您购买 Norton Security 后，您就得到了当今市场上最好的安全产品之一。

translation.en: We include a protection promise only Norton can make
translation.zh: 我们提供的保护承诺只有诺顿才能做到
translation.source: We include a protection promise only Norton can make
translation.medium: 我们包含了只有 Norton 才能提供的保护承诺
translation.reference: 我们提供的保护承诺只有诺顿才能做到

translation.en: We’re so confident in our ability to keep you secure, we offer refund assurance: If your PC or Mac gets a virus our Norton experts cannot remove, we’ll give you a refund*
translation.zh: 我们有信心保证您的安全，我们提供退款保证：如果您的电脑或 Mac 电脑感染了诺顿专家无法清除的病毒，我们会给您退款*
translation.source: We’re so confident in our ability to keep you secure, we offer refund assurance: If your PC or Mac gets a virus our Norton experts cannot remove, we’ll give you a refund*
translation.medium: 我们对保护您安全的能力如此自信，我们提供退款保证：如果您的 PC 或 Mac 被病毒感染，我们的 Norton 专家无法删除，我们将为您退款*
translation.reference: 我们有信心保证您的安全，我们提供退款保证：如果您的电脑或 Mac 电脑感染了诺顿专家无法清除的病毒，我们会给您退款*

translation.en: With Norton Security Deluxe, you can secure your device quickly and easily.
translation.zh: 有了 Norton Security Deluxe，您可以快速、方便地保护您的设备。
translation.source: With Norton Security Deluxe, you can secure your device quickly and easily.
translation.medium: 使用 Norton Security Deluxe，您可以快速、轻松地保护您的设备。
translation.reference: 有了 Norton Security Deluxe，您可以快速、方便地保护您的设备。

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe provides a simple view detailing the protection status of your device.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 在一个简单的视图中详述了您的设备的防护状态。
translation.source: Norton Security Deluxe provides a simple view detailing the protection status of your device.
translation.medium: Norton Security Deluxe 提供了一个简单的视图，详细介绍了您的设备的保护状态。
translation.reference: Norton Security Deluxe 在一个简单的视图中详述了您的设备的防护状态。

translation.en: From a single dashboard, you can monitor your security and identity protection settings, and even view the history of files scanned and downloads analyzed.
translation.zh: 您可在一个仪表板上监控安全性和身份保护设置，甚至可以查看扫描文件和分析下载的历史记录。
translation.source: From a single dashboard, you can monitor your security and identity protection settings, and even view the history of files scanned and downloads analyzed.
translation.medium: 从一个面板上，你可以监控你的安全和身份保护设置，甚至可以查看文件扫描和下载分析的历史记录。
translation.reference: 您可在一个仪表板上监控安全性和身份保护设置，甚至可以查看扫描文件和分析下载的历史记录。

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。
translation.source: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.medium: Norton Security Deluxe 包含对 Norton 认证技术人员的在线访问。
translation.reference: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。

translation.en: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.zh: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。
translation.source: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.medium: 如果您在任何时候需要帮助，我们的支持代表随时准备为您提供 24 小时全天候的服务。
translation.reference: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。

translation.en: To activate, sign up online and save your billing information in your Norton account.
translation.zh: 要激活产品，请在线注册，并在诺顿账户中保存您的账单信息。
translation.source: To activate, sign up online and save your billing information in your Norton account.
translation.medium: 要启用，请在线注册并在您的 Norton 帐户中保存付款信息。
translation.reference: 要激活产品，请在线注册，并在诺顿账户中保存您的账单信息。

translation.en: Automatically renews each year, unless the renewal is cancelled before the day you are due to be charged in my.norton.com or by contacting Norton Support.
translation.zh: 每年自动续订，除非您在 my.norton.com 或联系诺顿支持在收费日之前取消续订。
translation.source: Automatically renews each year, unless the renewal is cancelled before the day you are due to be charged in my.norton.com or by contacting Norton Support.
translation.medium: 每年自动续订，除非在 my.norton.com 或通过联系 Norton 支持人员取消续订。
translation.reference: 每年自动续订，除非您在 my.norton.com 或联系诺顿支持在收费日之前取消续订。

translation.en: The subscription renewal is charged at the renewal price found at norton.com/pricing.
translation.zh: 订阅续订按 norton.com/pricing 上的续费收费。
translation.source: The subscription renewal is charged at the renewal price found at norton.com/pricing.
translation.medium: 订阅续费按照 norton.com/pricing 中的续费价格收取。
translation.reference: 订阅续订按 norton.com/pricing 上的续费收费。

translation.en: Price subject to change, but a notification email is sent before billing.
translation.zh: 价格可能会有变化，但计费前会发送通知电子邮件。
translation.source: Price subject to change, but a notification email is sent before billing.
translation.medium: 价格可能会发生变化，但会提前发送通知邮件。
translation.reference: 价格可能会有变化，但计费前会发送通知电子邮件。

translation.en: Under NortonLifeLock Cancellation & Refund Policy once activated, you can cancel your contract and request a full refund within 60 days of the purchase, and for each annual renewal within 60 days of being charged.
translation.zh: 根据《NortonLifeLock 取消和退款政策》，激活产品后，您可以在购买后 60 天内和支付费用后 60 天内（如果是每年续订）取消合同并要求全额退款。
translation.source: Under NortonLifeLock Cancellation & Refund Policy once activated, you can cancel your contract and request a full refund within 60 days of the purchase, and for each annual renewal within 60 days of being charged.
translation.medium: NortonLifeLock 取消和退款政策一旦生效，您可以在购买后 60 天内终止合同并要求全额退款，以及每年续费后 60 天内终止合同并要求全额退款。
translation.reference: 根据《NortonLifeLock 取消和退款政策》，激活产品后，您可以在购买后 60 天内和支付费用后 60 天内（如果是每年续订）取消合同并要求全额退款。

translation.en: Subscription begins upon online activation.
translation.zh: 在线激活时即开始订阅。
translation.source: Subscription begins upon online activation.
translation.medium: 订阅开始于在线激活。
translation.reference: 在线激活时即开始订阅。

translation.en: To launch the service, download/install on each device, and/or complete set-up.
translation.zh: 要启动服务，请在每个设备上下载/安装，并/或完成设置。
translation.source: To launch the service, download/install on each device, and/or complete set-up.
translation.medium: 为了启动服务，需要在每台设备上下载/安装，或者完成设置。
translation.reference: 要启动服务，请在每个设备上下载/安装，并/或完成设置。

translation.en: Updates and features may be added, modified or removed, subject to the License and Services Agreement.
translation.zh: 根据许可证和服务协议的规定，可能会增加、修改或删除更新和功能。
translation.source: Updates and features may be added, modified or removed, subject to the License and Services Agreement.
translation.medium: 根据许可协议和服务协议，可能会添加、修改或删除更新和功能。
translation.reference: 根据许可证和服务协议的规定，可能会增加、修改或删除更新和功能。

translation.en: Data collection, storage and use for subscription management and renewal purposes subject to NortonLifeLock Global Privacy Statement.
translation.zh: 根据《NortonLifeLock 全球隐私声明》，将为订阅管理和续订目的收集、存储和使用数据。
translation.source: Data collection, storage and use for subscription management and renewal purposes subject to NortonLifeLock Global Privacy Statement.
translation.medium: 根据 NortonLifeLock 全球隐私声明收集、存储和使用用于订阅管理和续订目的的数据。
translation.reference: 根据《NortonLifeLock 全球隐私声明》，将为订阅管理和续订目的收集、存储和使用数据。
