translation.reference: 这样您就可以重新下单了。

translation.en: I am really sorry for the inconveniences, you can reply my email and I will gladly continue assisting you personally, or you can open a new interaction with us as you prefer, we are happy to help you.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉给您带来了不便，您可以回复我的邮件，我很乐意继续帮助您，您也可以根据您的喜好与我们开启新的互动，我们愿意帮助您。
translation.source: I am really sorry for the inconveniences, you can reply my email and I will gladly continue assisting you personally, or you can open a new interaction with us as you prefer, we are happy to help you.
translation.medium: 我真的很抱歉给您带来了不便，您可以回复我的邮件，我很乐意继续为您提供帮助，也欢迎您开启与我们的新互动，我们很乐意为您服务。
translation.reference: 非常抱歉给您带来了不便，您可以回复我的邮件，我很乐意继续帮助您，您也可以根据您的喜好与我们开启新的互动，我们愿意帮助您。

translation.en: Remember that our Chat Service is open 24/7 for you.
translation.zh: 请记住，我们的聊天服务 24/7 开放。
translation.source: Remember that our Chat Service is open 24/7 for you.
translation.medium: 请记住，我们的聊天服务24小时为您服务。
translation.reference: 请记住，我们的聊天服务 24/7 开放。

translation.medium: 感谢您联系#PRS_ORG#，我今天很高兴为您服务。
translation.reference: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.

translation.source: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.medium: 祝你今天一切顺利。
translation.reference: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: Gabba's double power failure explained and why it could happen again
translation.zh: 加巴体育馆双重停电事件足以说明以后还会再停电
translation.source: Gabba's double power failure explained and why it could happen again
translation.medium: 加巴的双重电力故障解释以及为什么会再次发生
translation.reference: 加巴体育馆双重停电事件足以说明以后还会再停电

translation.en: Risks of power failure inherent in the Gabba's broadcast compound set-up are unlikely to be improved before the next Ashes series, as cricket authorities await more detail on plans for the stadium's major upgrade to host the 2032 Olympic Games.
translation.zh: 在下一届灰烬杯系列赛之前，加巴广播场地固有的停电风险不太可能得到改善，因为板球管理机构尚在等待这座体育馆为举办 2032 年奥运会而进行的重大升级计划的更多细节。
translation.source: Risks of power failure inherent in the Gabba's broadcast compound set-up are unlikely to be improved before the next Ashes series, as cricket authorities await more detail on plans for the stadium's major upgrade to host the 2032 Olympic Games.
translation.medium: 由于布里斯班的广播设施布局带来的电力故障风险很难在下一届 Ashes 系列赛前得到改善，因为板球权威机构等待更详细的规划布里斯班体育场的主要升级计划，以便在 2032 年举办奥运会。
translation.reference: 在下一届灰烬杯系列赛之前，加巴广播场地固有的停电风险不太可能得到改善，因为板球管理机构尚在等待这座体育馆为举办 2032 年奥运会而进行的重大升级计划的更多细节。

translation.en: Sources have told The Age and The Sydney Morning Herald that the Gabba is the only major stadium in Australian cricket where the mains power supply at the ground is not sufficient to fire up the vast array of broadcast trucks and devices needed to beam pictures around the world.
translation.zh: 有消息人士告诉《时代报》和《悉尼先驱晨报》，加巴体育馆是澳大利亚唯一一个地面电源供应不足的大型板球体育馆，无法让大量的广播车和设备向世界各地传送图片。
translation.source: Sources have told The Age and The Sydney Morning Herald that the Gabba is the only major stadium in Australian cricket where the mains power supply at the ground is not sufficient to fire up the vast array of broadcast trucks and devices needed to beam pictures around the world.
translation.medium: 《澳大利亚时报》和《悉尼先驱晨报》的消息人士透露，布里斯班板球场是澳大利亚板球运动中唯一一个主电力供应不足的大型体育场，无法满足全球直播所需的广播车和设备。
translation.reference: 有消息人士告诉《时代报》和《悉尼先驱晨报》，加巴体育馆是澳大利亚唯一一个地面电源供应不足的大型板球体育馆，无法让大量的广播车和设备向世界各地传送图片。

translation.en: Primary and backup generators powering the global broadcast of the Gabba Test went down for about 25 minutes on day four.
translation.zh: 为加巴体育馆测试赛的全球广播工作供电的主发电机和备用发电机在第四天关闭了大约 25 分钟。
translation.source: Primary and backup generators powering the global broadcast of the Gabba Test went down for about 25 minutes on day four.
translation.medium: 在第四天的比赛中，主要和备用发电机供电的全球直播中断了大约 25 分钟。
translation.reference: 为加巴体育馆测试赛的全球广播工作供电的主发电机和备用发电机在第四天关闭了大约 25 分钟。

translation.en: That's because the base power in the precinct is required to supply the Gabba's light towers - one of which infamously went down during a Big Bash League match in 2019 - and the ground itself.
translation.zh: 这是因为该区域的基础电力系统需要同时为地面和加巴灯塔供电，也就是在 2019 年的一场 Big Bash League 比赛中倒塌的灯塔。
translation.source: That's because the base power in the precinct is required to supply the Gabba's light towers - one of which infamously went down during a Big Bash League match in 2019 - and the ground itself.
translation.medium: 这是因为该区域的基础电力需要为 Gabba 的照明塔供电 - 其中一个在 2019 年的 Big Bash League 比赛中出现故障而闻名 - 以及球场本身供电。
translation.reference: 这是因为该区域的基础电力系统需要同时为地面和加巴灯塔供电，也就是在 2019 年的一场 Big Bash League 比赛中倒塌的灯塔。

translation.en: As a result, broadcasters draw their primary power supply from a huge, diesel-fuelled generator hired for the Test match, with back-up power meant to be derived from a back-up generator.
translation.zh: 因此，广播公司从一台为测试赛租用的大型柴油发电机中获取主要电力供应，而备用电力则来自一台备用发电机。
translation.source: As a result, broadcasters draw their primary power supply from a huge, diesel-fuelled generator hired for the Test match, with back-up power meant to be derived from a back-up generator.
translation.medium: 因此，电视台的主要供电来自一台大型柴油发动机驱动的发电机，备用电力来自备用发电机。
translation.reference: 因此，广播公司从一台为测试赛租用的大型柴油发电机中获取主要电力供应，而备用电力则来自一台备用发电机。

translation.en: However, on day four of the Test match, the failure of the primary generator fused with the back-up generator, causing both to go down simultaneously and resulting in the total or partial loss of broadcast pictures and DRS for nearly 30 minutes.
translation.zh: 但在测试赛的第 4 天，主发电机发生故障，备用发电机保险丝熔断，两台发电机同时关闭，导致广播画面全部或部分丢失，DRS 中断近 30 分钟。
translation.source: However, on day four of the Test match, the failure of the primary generator fused with the back-up generator, causing both to go down simultaneously and resulting in the total or partial loss of broadcast pictures and DRS for nearly 30 minutes.
translation.medium: 然而，在第四天的测试赛中，主发电机与备用发电机的故障导致两台发电机同时停机，造成了近 30 分钟的全部或部分广播图像和 DRS 的丢失。
translation.reference: 但在测试赛的第 4 天，主发电机发生故障，备用发电机保险丝熔断，两台发电机同时关闭，导致广播画面全部或部分丢失，DRS 中断近 30 分钟。

translation.en: NEP, the company that provides the outside broadcast trucks and other facilities to Fox and Seven, has sought an explanation from the company that provided the generators.
translation.zh: 向 Fox 和 Seven 提供外部广播车和其他设施的 NEP 公司要求提供发电机的公司做出解释。
translation.source: NEP, the company that provides the outside broadcast trucks and other facilities to Fox and Seven, has sought an explanation from the company that provided the generators.
translation.medium: NEP 公司为福克斯和七台电视台提供了现场直播卡车和其他设备。NEP 公司已向提供发电机的公司寻求解释。
translation.reference: 向 Fox 和 Seven 提供外部广播车和其他设施的 NEP 公司要求提供发电机的公司做出解释。

translation.en: All other grounds to be used for the Ashes - Adelaide Oval, the MCG, the SCG and Bellerive Oval in Hobart - will provide mains power as the primary supply for broadcasters, leaving a diesel-powered generator as the back-up.
translation.zh: 灰烬杯的其他所有场地——Adelaide Oval、MCG、SCG 和霍巴特的 Bellerive Oval——将为广播公司提供供电网作为主要电源，柴油发电机作为备用电源。
translation.source: All other grounds to be used for the Ashes - Adelaide Oval, the MCG, the SCG and Bellerive Oval in Hobart - will provide mains power as the primary supply for broadcasters, leaving a diesel-powered generator as the back-up.
translation.medium: 除了阿德莱德奥林匹克体育场、墨尔本奥林匹克体育场、悉尼奥林匹克体育场和霍巴特奥林匹克体育场外，所有其他场地都将为电视转播提供主电源，而柴油发电机将作为备用电源。
translation.reference: 灰烬杯的其他所有场地——Adelaide Oval、MCG、SCG 和霍巴特的 Bellerive Oval——将为广播公司提供供电网作为主要电源，柴油发电机作为备用电源。

translation.en: This difference, which has caused considerable anxiety for the host broadcaster Fox Cricket in the past, was exacerbated during the Ashes Test by the vastly reduced crew of production and technical staff able to keep tabs on the myriad metaphorical balls being kept in the air throughout the match.
translation.zh: 这种差异在过去曾让主播机构 Fox Cricket 感到相当焦虑，而在灰烬杯测试赛期间，由于制作人员和技术人员的大幅减少，这种差异更加明显，因为他们能够在比赛期间密切关注在空中盘旋的无数个球。
translation.source: This difference, which has caused considerable anxiety for the host broadcaster Fox Cricket in the past, was exacerbated during the Ashes Test by the vastly reduced crew of production and technical staff able to keep tabs on the myriad metaphorical balls being kept in the air throughout the match.
translation.medium: 这种差异，以前曾给主办电视台 Fox Cricket 带来了很大的焦虑，但在 Ashes 测试赛期间，由于生产和技术人员的大幅减少，这种差异更加严重。
translation.reference: 这种差异在过去曾让主播机构 Fox Cricket 感到相当焦虑，而在灰烬杯测试赛期间，由于制作人员和技术人员的大幅减少，这种差异更加明显，因为他们能够在比赛期间密切关注在空中盘旋的无数个球。

translation.en: Cricket Australia were warned by Fox over several months that on a technical basis it would be safer to play the match elsewhere, but if it remained at the Gabba there would be "huge risks" inherent in the skeleton crew allowed into Queensland.
translation.zh: 几个月来，福克斯一直警告澳大利亚板球协会，从技术角度来看，在其他地方进行比赛会更安全，但如果比赛继续在加巴举行，允许进入昆士兰的主要工作人员将面临“巨大风险”。
translation.source: Cricket Australia were warned by Fox over several months that on a technical basis it would be safer to play the match elsewhere, but if it remained at the Gabba there would be "huge risks" inherent in the skeleton crew allowed into Queensland.
translation.medium: 澳大利亚板球协会 (Cricket Australia) 多次被福克斯 (Fox) 警告，在技术上来说，比赛在其他地方比较安全，但如果继续在 Gabba 举办，将面临“巨大风险”。
translation.reference: 几个月来，福克斯一直警告澳大利亚板球协会，从技术角度来看，在其他地方进行比赛会更安全，但如果比赛继续在加巴举行，允许进入昆士兰的主要工作人员将面临“巨大风险”。

translation.en: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.zh: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。
translation.source: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.medium: 为了您的参考，我将向您发送我们的对话记录。
translation.reference: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。

translation.en: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.zh: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。
translation.source: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.medium: 如果您还有其他问题或担忧，您可以回复该电子邮件，我们将继续为您提供帮助。
translation.reference: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: It was spilled by our rider accidentally.
translation.zh: 我们的骑手不小心把您订的餐弄洒了。
translation.source: It was spilled by our rider accidentally.
translation.medium: 是我们骑手的意外。
translation.reference: 我们的骑手不小心把您订的餐弄洒了。

translation.en: For the re-delivery, we will not charge you twice.
translation.zh: 我们会重新送餐，并且不会收取两次费用。
translation.source: For the re-delivery, we will not charge you twice.
translation.medium: 对于重发货，我们不会再次收取费用。
translation.reference: 我们会重新送餐，并且不会收取两次费用。

translation.en: We will only send you a new order.
translation.zh: 我们已为您重新下单。
translation.source: We will only send you a new order.
translation.medium: 我们只会为您重新发货。
translation.reference: 我们已为您重新下单。

translation.en: Your re-delivery is now being prepared by the restaurant.
translation.zh: 餐厅正在准备重新送餐。
translation.source: Your re-delivery is now being prepared by the restaurant.
translation.medium: 目前，餐厅正在为您重新配送。
translation.reference: 餐厅正在准备重新送餐。

translation.en: I kindly ask for your patience and wait for your order to be delivered within #NUMBER# minutes.
translation.zh: 您的订单将在 #NUMBER# 分钟内送到，请您耐心等候。
translation.source: I kindly ask for your patience and wait for your order to be delivered within #NUMBER# minutes.
translation.medium: 感谢您的耐心等待，您的订单将在#NUMBER#分钟内送达。
translation.reference: 您的订单将在 #NUMBER# 分钟内送到，请您耐心等候。

translation.en: There was nothing Von so long delivery time on your website
translation.zh: 网站显示的送货时间可没这么长
translation.source: There was nothing Von so long delivery time on your website
translation.medium: 在你的网站上，我没有看到关于Von的这么长的交货时间
translation.reference: 网站显示的送货时间可没这么长

translation.en: Upon ordering it is to the lead time quoted.
translation.zh: 订购后才会提供交货期。
translation.source: Upon ordering it is to the lead time quoted.
translation.medium: 订购后按报价的交货期交货。
translation.reference: 订购后才会提供交货期。

translation.en: The lead times are as advertised on the website.
translation.zh: 备货期如网站上所示。
translation.source: The lead times are as advertised on the website.
translation.medium: 交货时间如网站上所宣传的那样。
translation.reference: 备货期如网站上所示。

translation.en: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.zh: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。
translation.source: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.medium: 因为我们不备货，所以所有商品都是根据订单生产的，然后发送到我们这里，再发送给您。
translation.reference: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。

translation.en: The dog that would not stop barking and how I got him to stop.
translation.zh: 犬吠不断，如何止之。
translation.source: The dog that would not stop barking and how I got him to stop.
translation.medium: 一只不停叫的狗和我如何让它停止叫。
translation.reference: 犬吠不断，如何止之。

translation.en: My neighbors got a dog about three years ago.
translation.zh: 我的邻居三年前买了只狗。
translation.source: My neighbors got a dog about three years ago.
translation.medium: 我的邻居三年前买了一只狗。
translation.reference: 我的邻居三年前买了只狗。

translation.en: These neighbors and I share a fence.
translation.zh: 我们的后院挨着，
translation.source: These neighbors and I share a fence.
translation.medium: 这些邻居和我们共用一道围墙。
translation.reference: 我们的后院挨着，

translation.en: It separates our back yards.
translation.zh: 仅一篱笆之隔。
translation.source: It separates our back yards.
translation.medium: 它将我们的后院隔开。
translation.reference: 仅一篱笆之隔。

translation.en: Well, this dog snarls and barks and tries to bite me through the fence the entire time I'm out in the backyard.
translation.zh: 只要我进入后院，这只狗就一直篱笆的那边狂吠，好像想咬我似的。
translation.source: Well, this dog snarls and barks and tries to bite me through the fence the entire time I'm out in the backyard.
translation.medium: 好吧，这只狗一直在狂吠、叫嚷并试图从围栏上咬我。
translation.reference: 只要我进入后院，这只狗就一直篱笆的那边狂吠，好像想咬我似的。

translation.en: I've tried to ignore it, talk softly, etc.
translation.zh: 视若无睹、轻声抚慰，这些我都试过。
translation.source: I've tried to ignore it, talk softly, etc.
translation.medium: 我试着忽视它，轻声说话等等。
translation.reference: 视若无睹、轻声抚慰，这些我都试过。

translation.en: but this dog is insane.
translation.zh: 但这只狗跟疯了似的，这些招数一概没用。
translation.source: but this dog is insane.
translation.medium: 但这只狗疯了。
translation.reference: 但这只狗跟疯了似的，这些招数一概没用。

translation.en: The maintenance guys are afraid of it.
translation.zh: 上门来维修的人都很怕它。
translation.source: The maintenance guys are afraid of it.
translation.medium: 维修人员害怕它。
translation.reference: 上门来维修的人都很怕它。

translation.en: So I went and did the neighborly thing and asked them to help me figure out how to get this dog to chill.
translation.zh: 所以，秉承邻里友好的原则，我去跟邻居交涉，问他们怎样能让狗安静下来。
translation.source: So I went and did the neighborly thing and asked them to help me figure out how to get this dog to chill.
translation.medium: 所以我就去做了邻居该做的事情，请他们帮我想办法让这只狗平静下来。
translation.reference: 所以，秉承邻里友好的原则，我去跟邻居交涉，问他们怎样能让狗安静下来。

translation.en: I can't even use my yard at this point.
translation.zh: 要知道那只狗整天叫个不停，没完没了，
translation.source: I can't even use my yard at this point.
translation.medium: 我现在连自己的院子都用不了。
translation.reference: 要知道那只狗整天叫个不停，没完没了，

translation.en: That dog is outside all day long, snarling and yapping non-stop.
translation.zh: 我都不能进院子了。
translation.source: That dog is outside all day long, snarling and yapping non-stop.
translation.medium: 那只狗整天都在外面，不停地叫嚷着。
translation.reference: 我都不能进院子了。

translation.en: I asked if I could give it healthy treats through the fence.
translation.zh: 我问邻居，我能不能隔着篱笆给它投喂健康的食物，
translation.source: I asked if I could give it healthy treats through the fence.
translation.medium: 我问是否可以通过栅栏给它喂些健康的零食。
translation.reference: 我问邻居，我能不能隔着篱笆给它投喂健康的食物，

translation.en: Owner says no.
translation.zh: 他们说不行。
translation.source: Owner says no.
translation.medium: 业主说不。
translation.reference: 他们说不行。

translation.en: I asked if we could go in halves on a non-shock bark collar.
translation.zh: 我又说，我愿意平摊狗项圈的费用。
translation.source: I asked if we could go in halves on a non-shock bark collar.
translation.medium: 我问他们能不能半价购买一个没有震动功能的狗颈圈。
translation.reference: 我又说，我愿意平摊狗项圈的费用。

translation.en: Owner says no.
translation.zh: 他们说不要。
translation.source: Owner says no.
translation.medium: 业主说不。
translation.reference: 他们说不要。

translation.en: (Edit to say I asked the neighbor at least three times to help her dog.)
translation.zh: （我至少三次请求邻居管管它的狗了。）
translation.source: (Edit to say I asked the neighbor at least three times to help her dog.)
translation.medium: （编辑：我至少三次要求邻居帮助她的狗。）
translation.reference: （我至少三次请求邻居管管它的狗了。）

translation.en: Frustrated but not willing to call animal control or anything yet, I hatched a plan.
translation.zh: 我很沮丧，但还不想打电话给动物控制中心或其他机构，于是我想出了一个计划。
translation.source: Frustrated but not willing to call animal control or anything yet, I hatched a plan.
translation.medium: 我很沮丧，但还没有打算打电话报警或者做任何事情，于是我想出了一个计划。
translation.reference: 我很沮丧，但还不想打电话给动物控制中心或其他机构，于是我想出了一个计划。

translation.en: I bought a very nice portable speaker that is *loud*.
translation.zh: 我买了一个好用的便携式扬声器，声音很*大*。
translation.source: I bought a very nice portable speaker that is *loud*.
translation.medium: 我买了一个很漂亮的便携式音箱，声音很大。
translation.reference: 我买了一个好用的便携式扬声器，声音很*大*。

translation.en: Like, I saved and invested in this.
translation.zh: 为了买这个扬声器，我可是存了一阵子钱的。
translation.source: Like, I saved and invested in this.
translation.medium: 例如，我投资了这个。
translation.reference: 为了买这个扬声器，我可是存了一阵子钱的。

translation.en: Now, every time I go to my backyard, I bring my speaker.
translation.zh: 现在，我每次进后院都会带上它。
translation.source: Now, every time I go to my backyard, I bring my speaker.
translation.medium: 现在，每次我去后院，我都会带上我的扬声器。
translation.reference: 现在，我每次进后院都会带上它。

translation.en: There is no daytime noise ordinance here, I checked.
translation.zh: 我查过了，此地没有日间噪音条例。
translation.source: There is no daytime noise ordinance here, I checked.
translation.medium: 这里没有白天噪音管制，我检查过。
translation.reference: 我查过了，此地没有日间噪音条例。

translation.en: When the dog begins its snarling barking attacking the fence thing, my neighbors (all of them) get to enjoy a little Lamb of God or Rotting Christ or some other great music turned all the way up.
translation.zh: 当狗吠叫着要冲过篱笆的时候，我就给我的邻居们（他们所有人）播放上帝羔羊乐队或腐烂的基督乐队的音乐以及一些其他经典音乐。
translation.source: When the dog begins its snarling barking attacking the fence thing, my neighbors (all of them) get to enjoy a little Lamb of God or Rotting Christ or some other great music turned all the way up.
translation.medium: 当狗开始发出咬牙切齿的叫声袭击围栏的时候，我的邻居们（每一个人）都能享受一下来自 Lamb of God 或 Rotting Christ 或其他优秀乐队的音乐。
translation.reference: 当狗吠叫着要冲过篱笆的时候，我就给我的邻居们（他们所有人）播放上帝羔羊乐队或腐烂的基督乐队的音乐以及一些其他经典音乐。

translation.en: My speaker shakes the table.
translation.zh: 扬声器声音大的把桌子都震的动了起来。
translation.source: My speaker shakes the table.
translation.medium: 我的演讲者抖动了桌子。
translation.reference: 扬声器声音大的把桌子都震的动了起来。

translation.en: It didn't take the neighbors long to put two and two together.
translation.zh: 我的邻居没过多久就明白过来了。
translation.source: It didn't take the neighbors long to put two and two together.
translation.medium: 邻居们很快就把两两相加。
translation.reference: 我的邻居没过多久就明白过来了。

translation.en: The dog is now kept mostly inside and when it does come out, it's quick or the owner goes out with it.
translation.zh: 那只狗现在大部分时间都被关在家里，即使出来，也只是一小会儿，或者有主人陪着。
translation.source: The dog is now kept mostly inside and when it does come out, it's quick or the owner goes out with it.
translation.medium: 现在，这只狗大部分时间都在室内，如果它出去，它会很快就回来，或者它的主人会一起出去。
translation.reference: 那只狗现在大部分时间都被关在家里，即使出来，也只是一小会儿，或者有主人陪着。

translation.en: The neighborhood is wonderfully quiet nowadays.
translation.zh: 现在，附近一带非常安静。
translation.source: The neighborhood is wonderfully quiet nowadays.
translation.medium: 附近现在很安静。
translation.reference: 现在，附近一带非常安静。

translation.en: Edit some grammar errors
translation.zh: 编辑一些语法错误
translation.source: Edit some grammar errors
translation.medium: 修改一些语法错误
translation.reference: 编辑一些语法错误

translation.en: Edit again: PSA DO NOT GIVE DOGS ANY TYPE OF HUMAN MEDICATION, LIKE LAXITIVES OR NYQUIL.
translation.zh: 编后语：不要给狗投喂任何种类的人造药物，如泻药或奈奎尔。
translation.source: Edit again: PSA DO NOT GIVE DOGS ANY TYPE OF HUMAN MEDICATION, LIKE LAXITIVES OR NYQUIL.
translation.medium: 再次编辑：不要给狗狗服用任何类型的人类药物，如催吐剂或尼克维尔。
translation.reference: 编后语：不要给狗投喂任何种类的人造药物，如泻药或奈奎尔。

translation.en: This can seriously harm and even kill an animal.
translation.zh: 这会严重伤害甚至杀死动物。
translation.source: This can seriously harm and even kill an animal.
translation.medium: 这可能会严重伤害甚至杀死动物。
translation.reference: 这会严重伤害甚至杀死动物。

translation.en: Also, the speaker is a portable pa system from JYX, if anyone is interested.
translation.zh: 另外，这个扬声器是 JYX 的便携式 PA 系统，如果有人感兴趣的话。
translation.source: Also, the speaker is a portable pa system from JYX, if anyone is interested.
translation.medium: 此外，演讲者使用的是 JYX 的一款便携式 PA 系统，如果有兴趣的话。
translation.reference: 另外，这个扬声器是 JYX 的便携式 PA 系统，如果有人感兴趣的话。

translation.en: It was under $200, but I'm poor so I had to save for a bit.
translation.zh: 不到 200 美元，但我很穷，所以不得不存上一阵子。
translation.source: It was under $200, but I'm poor so I had to save for a bit.
translation.medium: 它的价格低于 200 美元，但我很穷，所以我必须节省一点。
translation.reference: 不到 200 美元，但我很穷，所以不得不存上一阵子。

translation.en: It sounds great for the money, though.
translation.zh: 虽然听起来很划算。
translation.source: It sounds great for the money, though.
translation.medium: 虽然价格不菲，但听起来还是很不错的。
translation.reference: 虽然听起来很划算。

translation.en: I'm impressed and so are my neighbors.
translation.zh: 这件事让我印象深刻，相信我的邻居也是如此。
translation.source: I'm impressed and so are my neighbors.
translation.medium: 我和我的邻居都很惊讶。
translation.reference: 这件事让我印象深刻，相信我的邻居也是如此。

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 打开主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap the More icon (three horizontal lines) at the bottom of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。
translation.source: Tap the More icon (three horizontal lines) at the bottom of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Settings
translation.zh: 点击“设置”
translation.source: Tap Settings
translation.medium: 打开设置
translation.reference: 点击“设置”

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 点击设备信息。
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside 'Repair your #PRS_ORG# account', tap Repair.
translation.zh: 在“修复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边，点击“修复”。
translation.source: Beside 'Repair your #PRS_ORG# account', tap Repair.
translation.medium: 在“修复你的#PRS_ORG#帐户”下，点击“修复”。
translation.reference: 在“修复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边，点击“修复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now.
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复”。
translation.source: Tap Repair now.
translation.medium: 点击修复。
translation.reference: 点击“立即修复”。

translation.en: The account repair process will begin.
translation.zh: 帐户修复过程将开始。
translation.source: The account repair process will begin.
translation.medium: 账号修复工作将开始。
translation.reference: 帐户修复过程将开始。

translation.en: If you have a lot of books, it may take a while.
translation.zh: 如果您有很多书，可能需要一点时间。
translation.source: If you have a lot of books, it may take a while.
translation.medium: 如果你有很多书，可能需要一段时间。
translation.reference: 如果您有很多书，可能需要一点时间。

translation.en: Checking here again,  I can see here that the rider accidentally marked the order as delivered.
translation.zh: 我这里再检查了一次，发现是骑手不小心把订单标记为已送达了。
translation.source: Checking here again,  I can see here that the rider accidentally marked the order as delivered.
translation.medium: 再次检查，我可以看到骑手误将订单标记为已送达。
translation.reference: 我这里再检查了一次，发现是骑手不小心把订单标记为已送达了。

translation.en: We currently do not have the exact information on what happened to the rider as well as to your order.
translation.zh: 我们现在也不知道骑手和您订的餐发生了什么事。
translation.source: We currently do not have the exact information on what happened to the rider as well as to your order.
translation.medium: 目前我们还不清楚骑手的情况以及你的订单。
translation.reference: 我们现在也不知道骑手和您订的餐发生了什么事。

translation.en: We are now investigating this for you.
translation.zh: 我们正在调查此事。
translation.source: We are now investigating this for you.
translation.medium: 我们正在为您调查此事。
translation.reference: 我们正在调查此事。

translation.en: Here's what I can do.
translation.zh: 请您耐心等待。
translation.source: Here's what I can do.
translation.medium: 这就是我能做的。
translation.reference: 请您耐心等待。

translation.en: Is the screen grayed out and you see a book cover?
translation.zh: 屏幕变灰了吗，您看到书的封面了吗？
translation.source: Is the screen grayed out and you see a book cover?
translation.medium: 屏幕变成了灰色，你看到了一本书的封面吗？
translation.reference: 屏幕变灰了吗，您看到书的封面了吗？

translation.en: To turn the device completely please leave your finger pressing the power button per 30 seconds
translation.zh: 要完全重置设备，请按住电源按钮 30 秒
translation.source: To turn the device completely please leave your finger pressing the power button per 30 seconds
translation.medium: 为了完全启动设备，请按住电源按钮 30 秒。
translation.reference: 要完全重置设备，请按住电源按钮 30 秒

translation.en: Liz Truss pledges another £75m in aid to Afghanistan at G7 meeting
translation.zh: 利兹·特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 在 G7 会议上承诺再向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助
translation.source: Liz Truss pledges another £75m in aid to Afghanistan at G7 meeting
translation.medium: 利兹·特拉斯在 G7 会议上承诺向阿富汗提供另外 7500 万英镑的援助
translation.reference: 利兹·特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 在 G7 会议上承诺再向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助

translation.en: A further £75 million in aid is to be given to Afghanistan by the UK to help address its worsening humanitarian situation, Liz Truss has announced.
translation.zh: 利兹·特拉斯宣布，英国将向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助，以帮助解决该国日益恶化的人道主义局势。
translation.source: A further £75 million in aid is to be given to Afghanistan by the UK to help address its worsening humanitarian situation, Liz Truss has announced.
translation.medium: 英国外交大臣特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 宣布，英国将向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助，以帮助解决阿富汗人道形势的恶化。
translation.reference: 利兹·特拉斯宣布，英国将向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助，以帮助解决该国日益恶化的人道主义局势。

translation.en: The Foreign Secretary said the commitment would help save lives and "support stability in the region."
translation.zh: 这位外交大臣说，这项承诺将有助于挽救生命和“支持该地区的稳定”。
translation.source: The Foreign Secretary said the commitment would help save lives and "support stability in the region."
translation.medium: 外交大臣表示，这一承诺将有助于拯救生命，并“支持地区的稳定”。
translation.reference: 这位外交大臣说，这项承诺将有助于挽救生命和“支持该地区的稳定”。

translation.en: It follows discussions among G7 foreign ministers in Liverpool on Saturday about what co-ordinated action can be taken in Afghanistan, along with how to engage with the Taliban rulers.
translation.zh: 此前，七国集团 (G7) 外长周六在利物浦讨论了在阿富汗可以采取何种协同行动，以及如何与塔利班统治者接触。
translation.source: It follows discussions among G7 foreign ministers in Liverpool on Saturday about what co-ordinated action can be taken in Afghanistan, along with how to engage with the Taliban rulers.
translation.medium: 周六，英国利物浦举行的 G7 外长会议讨论了在阿富汗采取的协调行动以及如何与塔利班当局接触。
translation.reference: 此前，七国集团 (G7) 外长周六在利物浦讨论了在阿富汗可以采取何种协同行动，以及如何与塔利班统治者接触。

translation.en: The militant group stormed Kabul in a lightning advance in August, as 20 years of occupation of the central Asian country was brought to a close with a hurried allied withdrawal.
translation.zh: 今年 8 月，这个激进组织闪电般地袭击了喀布尔，与此同时，随着盟军的匆忙撤离，它们对这个中亚国家长达 20 年的占领宣告结束。
translation.source: The militant group stormed Kabul in a lightning advance in August, as 20 years of occupation of the central Asian country was brought to a close with a hurried allied withdrawal.
translation.medium: 这个武装团体在 8 月份以迅雷不及掩耳之势占领了喀布尔，20 年的中亚国家占领结束后，盟军急速撤离。
translation.reference: 今年 8 月，这个激进组织闪电般地袭击了喀布尔，与此同时，随着盟军的匆忙撤离，它们对这个中亚国家长达 20 年的占领宣告结束。

translation.en: Ms Truss said: "The UK is providing vital humanitarian assistance in Afghanistan this winter.
translation.zh: 特拉斯女士说：“今年冬天，英国将向阿富汗提供至关重要的人道主义援助。
translation.source: Ms Truss said: "The UK is providing vital humanitarian assistance in Afghanistan this winter.
translation.medium: 特鲁斯女士说：“英国正在阿富汗提供重要的人道主义援助。
translation.reference: 特拉斯女士说：“今年冬天，英国将向阿富汗提供至关重要的人道主义援助。

translation.en: The funds announced today will save lives, protect women and girls and support stability in the region.
translation.zh: 今天宣布的援助资金将拯救生命，保护妇女和女孩，并支持该地区的稳定。
translation.source: The funds announced today will save lives, protect women and girls and support stability in the region.
translation.medium: 今天宣布的资金将拯救生命，保护女性和女孩，并支持该地区的稳定。
translation.reference: 今天宣布的援助资金将拯救生命，保护妇女和女孩，并支持该地区的稳定。

translation.en: We are determined to do all we can for the people of Afghanistan."
translation.zh: 我们决心尽我们所能帮助阿富汗人民。”
translation.source: We are determined to do all we can for the people of Afghanistan."
translation.medium: 我们决心为阿富汗人民尽一切努力。”
translation.reference: 我们决心尽我们所能帮助阿富汗人民。”

translation.en: The additional financial support will bring the UK's commitment to Afghanistan to £286 million this year.
translation.zh: 这笔额外的财政支持将使英国今年对阿富汗的承诺达到 2.86 亿英镑。
translation.source: The additional financial support will bring the UK's commitment to Afghanistan to £286 million this year.
translation.medium: 额外的财政支持将使英国今年对阿富汗的承诺达到 2860 万英镑。
translation.reference: 这笔额外的财政支持将使英国今年对阿富汗的承诺达到 2.86 亿英镑。

translation.en: It will be used to provide support for victims of gender-based violence and to fund essential child protection services.
translation.zh: 它将用于向基于性别的暴力受害者提供援助，并资助基本的儿童保护服务。
translation.source: It will be used to provide support for victims of gender-based violence and to fund essential child protection services.
translation.medium: 它将用于为性别暴力受害者提供支持，并为提供必要的儿童保护服务提供资金。
translation.reference: 它将用于向基于性别的暴力受害者提供援助，并资助基本的儿童保护服务。

translation.en: The United Nations and aid agencies will prioritise those most at risk including households headed by women and disabled people, the Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office said (FCDO).
translation.zh: 外交、联邦和发展办公室 (FCDO) 表示，联合国和援助机构将优先考虑那些最危险的家庭，包括以妇女和残疾人为户主的家庭。
translation.source: The United Nations and aid agencies will prioritise those most at risk including households headed by women and disabled people, the Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office said (FCDO).
translation.medium: 联合国和援助机构将优先考虑最容易受到影响的群体，包括由女性担任家长的家庭以及残疾人，外交、英联邦和发展办公室 (FCDO) 表示。
translation.reference: 外交、联邦和发展办公室 (FCDO) 表示，联合国和援助机构将优先考虑那些最危险的家庭，包括以妇女和残疾人为户主的家庭。

translation.en: Officials said no funding would go directly through the Taliban, instead being funnelled through the Afghanistan Humanitarian Fund, World Food Programme (WFP) and other organisations.
translation.zh: 官员们表示，资金不会直接交给塔利班，而是通过阿富汗人道主义基金、世界粮食计划署 (WFP) 和其他组织进行援助。
translation.source: Officials said no funding would go directly through the Taliban, instead being funnelled through the Afghanistan Humanitarian Fund, World Food Programme (WFP) and other organisations.
translation.medium: 官员表示，资金不会直接通过塔利班流动，而是通过阿富汗人道主义基金、世界粮食计划署 (WFP) 等组织。
translation.reference: 官员们表示，资金不会直接交给塔利班，而是通过阿富汗人道主义基金、世界粮食计划署 (WFP) 和其他组织进行援助。

translation.en: The WFP will receive £34 million of the funding announced on Sunday.
translation.zh: 世界粮食计划署将于周日收到宣布的 3400 万英镑资金。
translation.source: The WFP will receive £34 million of the funding announced on Sunday.
translation.medium: 世界粮食计划署将获得周日宣布的 3400 万英镑的资金。
translation.reference: 世界粮食计划署将于周日收到宣布的 3400 万英镑资金。

translation.en: David Beasley, the organisation's executive director, said the donation would "help us save many lives."
translation.zh: 该组织的执行董事大卫·比斯利 (David Beasley) 表示，这笔捐款将“帮助我们拯救许多生命”。
translation.source: David Beasley, the organisation's executive director, said the donation would "help us save many lives."
translation.medium: 该组织执行董事大卫·比斯利表示，这笔捐款“将帮助我们拯救许多生命”。
translation.reference: 该组织的执行董事大卫·比斯利 (David Beasley) 表示，这笔捐款将“帮助我们拯救许多生命”。

translation.en: "What we are seeing on the ground is heart-breaking - 23 million people are facing severe hunger in a country crippled by drought, conflict and an economic crisis," he said.
translation.zh: 他说:“我们在实地看到的情况令人心碎——2300 万人面临严重的饥饿，这个国家因干旱、冲突和经济危机而陷入瘫痪。”
translation.source: "What we are seeing on the ground is heart-breaking - 23 million people are facing severe hunger in a country crippled by drought, conflict and an economic crisis," he said.
translation.medium: “我们看到的情况令人心碎，2300 万人面临着严重的饥饿，在旱灾、冲突和经济危机的影响下，这个国家已经崩溃了，”他说。
translation.reference: 他说:“我们在实地看到的情况令人心碎——2300 万人面临严重的饥饿，这个国家因干旱、冲突和经济危机而陷入瘫痪。”

translation.en: "Women and children are bearing the brunt of this suffering and, as the harsh winter descends, more and more are slipping into malnutrition and starvation each day."
translation.zh: “妇女和儿童首当其冲，随着严冬的到来，每天都有越来越多的人陷入营养不良和饥饿的境地。”
translation.source: "Women and children are bearing the brunt of this suffering and, as the harsh winter descends, more and more are slipping into malnutrition and starvation each day."
translation.medium: “女性和儿童正承受着这种痛苦，随着严寒的到来，每天都有越来越多的人患有营养不良和饥饿。”
translation.reference: “妇女和儿童首当其冲，随着严冬的到来，每天都有越来越多的人陷入营养不良和饥饿的境地。”

translation.en: This week the UN's humanitarian chief warned that Afghanistan's economic collapse was "happening before our eyes" and urged the international community to take action to stop "the freefall" before it leads to more deaths.
translation.zh: 本周，联合国人道主义事务负责人警告说，阿富汗经济的崩溃“正在我们眼前发生”，并敦促国际社会采取行动，防止其“自由落体”，以免造成更多的死亡。
translation.source: This week the UN's humanitarian chief warned that Afghanistan's economic collapse was "happening before our eyes" and urged the international community to take action to stop "the freefall" before it leads to more deaths.
translation.medium: 本周，联合国人道主任警告说，阿富汗的经济崩溃“正在我们的眼前发生”，并呼吁国际社会采取行动，阻止“坠落”，以防更多人死亡。
translation.reference: 本周，联合国人道主义事务负责人警告说，阿富汗经济的崩溃“正在我们眼前发生”，并敦促国际社会采取行动，防止其“自由落体”，以免造成更多的死亡。

translation.en: Martin Griffiths said: "It's getting more and more dire by the week."
translation.zh: 马丁·格里菲思 (Martin Griffiths) 说：“形势一周比一周可怕。”
translation.source: Martin Griffiths said: "It's getting more and more dire by the week."
translation.medium: 马丁·格里菲斯说：“每周情况都在恶化。”
translation.reference: 马丁·格里菲思 (Martin Griffiths) 说：“形势一周比一周可怕。”

translation.en: The funding announcement comes after ministers this week faced awkward questions about the Afghan withdrawal effort following a whistleblower's evidence to MPs.
translation.zh: 本周，在一名举报人向议员们提供证据后，部长们面临着有关从阿富汗撤军的尴尬问题。
translation.source: The funding announcement comes after ministers this week faced awkward questions about the Afghan withdrawal effort following a whistleblower's evidence to MPs.
translation.medium: 此次资金拨款的宣布，发生在本周内阁部长面对议员提出关于阿富汗撤军努力的尴尬问题后。
translation.reference: 本周，在一名举报人向议员们提供证据后，部长们面临着有关从阿富汗撤军的尴尬问题。

translation.en: Raphael Marshall, who worked for the Foreign Office during Operation Pitting, claimed just 5% of Afghan nationals who applied to flee under one UK scheme received help as a result of the "dysfunctional" and "chaotic" handling of the situation.
translation.zh: 在皮廷行动期间为外交部工作的拉斐尔·马歇尔 (Raphael Marshall) 声称，由于对局势的“功能失调”和“混乱”的处理，在根据英国计划申请逃离的阿富汗公民中，只有 5% 得到了帮助。
translation.source: Raphael Marshall, who worked for the Foreign Office during Operation Pitting, claimed just 5% of Afghan nationals who applied to flee under one UK scheme received help as a result of the "dysfunctional" and "chaotic" handling of the situation.
translation.medium: 在“破坏性”和“混乱”的情况下，仅有 5% 的阿富汗国民通过一项英国计划申请避难，结果只有少数人获得了帮助。
translation.reference: 在皮廷行动期间为外交部工作的拉斐尔·马歇尔 (Raphael Marshall) 声称，由于对局势的“功能失调”和“混乱”的处理，在根据英国计划申请逃离的阿富汗公民中，只有 5% 得到了帮助。

translation.en: Mr Marshall told the Commons Foreign Affairs Committee that some of those hoping to escape were murdered after being left behind in Kabul.
translation.zh: 马歇尔告诉下议院外交事务委员会，一些希望逃跑的人被留在喀布尔后被谋杀。
translation.source: Mr Marshall told the Commons Foreign Affairs Committee that some of those hoping to escape were murdered after being left behind in Kabul.
translation.medium: 马歇尔向英国议会外交事务委员会表示，一些想要逃离喀布尔的人在被留下后被杀害。
translation.reference: 马歇尔告诉下议院外交事务委员会，一些希望逃跑的人被留在喀布尔后被谋杀。

translation.en: He also claimed Boris Johnson requested that "considerable capacity" was made available to evacuate animals from a shelter run by former Royal Marine Paul "Pen" Farthing, putting the lives of troops at risk to help aid their departure on a privately funded plane.
translation.zh: 他还声称，鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 要求提供“相当大的能力”，帮助前皇家海军陆战队员保罗·潘·法尔辛 (Paul "Pen" Farthing) 经营的收容所中的动物离开阿富汗，最终帮助这些动物乘坐私人飞机离开，而这是以将士兵的生命置于危险之中为代价。
translation.source: He also claimed Boris Johnson requested that "considerable capacity" was made available to evacuate animals from a shelter run by former Royal Marine Paul "Pen" Farthing, putting the lives of troops at risk to help aid their departure on a privately funded plane.
translation.medium: 他还声称，鲍里斯·约翰逊要求“较大规模”的资源用于从前英国皇家海军陆战队成员保罗·“笔”·法顿 (Paul "Pen" Farthing) 经营的避难所撤离动物，以帮助他们乘坐私人资助的飞机离开。
translation.reference: 他还声称，鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 要求提供“相当大的能力”，帮助前皇家海军陆战队员保罗·潘·法尔辛 (Paul "Pen" Farthing) 经营的收容所中的动物离开阿富汗，最终帮助这些动物乘坐私人飞机离开，而这是以将士兵的生命置于危险之中为代价。

translation.en: The Prime Minister has called the claims "complete nonsense."
translation.zh: 首相称这种说法“完全是无稽之谈”。
translation.source: The Prime Minister has called the claims "complete nonsense."
translation.medium: 首相称这些说法“纯属胡说八道”。
translation.reference: 首相称这种说法“完全是无稽之谈”。

translation.en: At the Museum of Liverpool on Sunday, Ms Truss will have discussions with foreign ministers from the Association of Southeast Asian Nations, who are attending the G7 gathering for the first time - most of them virtually.
translation.zh: 周日，特拉斯将在利物浦博物馆 (Museum of Liverpool) 与东南亚国家联盟 (Association of Southeast Asian Nations) 的外交部长们进行讨论，这些国家是首次参加 G7 峰会，而且大部分通过网络参加会谈。
translation.source: At the Museum of Liverpool on Sunday, Ms Truss will have discussions with foreign ministers from the Association of Southeast Asian Nations, who are attending the G7 gathering for the first time - most of them virtually.
translation.medium: 周日，特鲁斯女士将在利物浦博物馆与东南亚国家联盟外交部长举行会谈，这些外交部长首次参加 G7 峰会，大多数人通过虚拟方式参加。
translation.reference: 周日，特拉斯将在利物浦博物馆 (Museum of Liverpool) 与东南亚国家联盟 (Association of Southeast Asian Nations) 的外交部长们进行讨论，这些国家是首次参加 G7 峰会，而且大部分通过网络参加会谈。

translation.en: The Foreign Secretary will stress the importance of working with south-east Asia's "economies of the future" to tackle the current challenges facing the West, the FCDO said.
translation.zh: FCDO 表示，外交大臣将强调与东南亚“未来经济体”合作以应对西方目前面临的挑战的重要性。
translation.source: The Foreign Secretary will stress the importance of working with south-east Asia's "economies of the future" to tackle the current challenges facing the West, the FCDO said.
translation.medium: 外交大臣将强调与东南亚“未来经济体”合作的重要性，以应对西方目前面临的挑战，FCDO 表示。
translation.reference: FCDO 表示，外交大臣将强调与东南亚“未来经济体”合作以应对西方目前面临的挑战的重要性。

translation.en: The invitation to Asian ministers comes after the UK's integrated review on foreign policy announced in March a "tilt" towards the Indo-Pacific, in a move seen as aiming to counter China's growing influence in the region.
translation.zh: 在邀请亚洲各国部长出席会议之前，英国在 3 月份进行的外交政策综合评估中宣布，英国将向印度-太平洋地区“倾斜”，此举被视为旨在抗衡中国在该地区日益增长的影响力。
translation.source: The invitation to Asian ministers comes after the UK's integrated review on foreign policy announced in March a "tilt" towards the Indo-Pacific, in a move seen as aiming to counter China's growing influence in the region.
translation.medium: 英国3月宣布的外交政策整合评估报告称，英国将“倾向”于印太地区，这一举措被认为是为了对抗中国在该地区的影响力。
translation.reference: 在邀请亚洲各国部长出席会议之前，英国在 3 月份进行的外交政策综合评估中宣布，英国将向印度-太平洋地区“倾斜”，此举被视为旨在抗衡中国在该地区日益增长的影响力。

translation.en: The other thing we need you to try is to reset the USB ports in your computer.
translation.zh: 此外，您还需要重置电脑上的 USB 端口。

translation.medium: 另一件我们需要你尝试的事情是重置你电脑上的 USB 端口。
translation.reference: 此外，您还需要重置电脑上的 USB 端口。

translation.en: Please make sure to try the three methods listed in there.
translation.zh: 请尝试此处列出的三个方法。
translation.source: Please make sure to try the three methods listed in there.
translation.medium: 请务必尝试上面列出的三种方法。
translation.reference: 请尝试此处列出的三个方法。

translation.zh: 如果试完这三个方法后，问题仍然存在，请再联系我们
