translation.reference: 如果试完这三个方法后，问题仍然存在，请再联系我们

translation.en: When it comes to buying quality gear, a sleeping bag needs to be first on the list.
translation.zh: 说到购买高质量的装备，睡袋应该是第一位的。
translation.source: When it comes to buying quality gear, a sleeping bag needs to be first on the list.
translation.medium: 在购买质量优良的装备时，睡袋应该是第一位。
translation.reference: 说到购买高质量的装备，睡袋应该是第一位的。

translation.en: You can scrimp on all manner of kit but not on a sleeping bag.
translation.zh: 你可以在所有装备上省钱，但睡袋不行。
translation.source: You can scrimp on all manner of kit but not on a sleeping bag.
translation.medium: 你可以节省各种装备，但不能节省睡袋。
translation.reference: 你可以在所有装备上省钱，但睡袋不行。

translation.en: A lot of your time when out camping or expeditions will be spent in your sleeping and with Snugpak you are assured quality.
translation.zh: 当你外出野营或探险时，睡觉时间很长，有了 Snugpak，睡觉质量就有保证了。
translation.source: A lot of your time when out camping or expeditions will be spent in your sleeping and with Snugpak you are assured quality.
translation.medium: 当你在野外露营或进行探险时，你的大部分时间都会花在睡觉上，Snugpak 可以保证质量。
translation.reference: 当你外出野营或探险时，睡觉时间很长，有了 Snugpak，睡觉质量就有保证了。

translation.en: A tried and tested favourite, this British made sleeping bag combines micro pack size with serious performance.
translation.zh: 这款英国制造的睡袋是一款久经考验的最受欢迎的睡袋，它体积小，但性能出色。
translation.source: A tried and tested favourite, this British made sleeping bag combines micro pack size with serious performance.
translation.medium: 这款英国制造的睡袋结合了微型包的尺寸和优秀的性能。
translation.reference: 这款英国制造的睡袋是一款久经考验的最受欢迎的睡袋，它体积小，但性能出色。

translation.en: Many view the Softie 12 Osprey the ultimate four season synthetic fill sleeping bag available.
translation.zh: 许多人认为 Softie 12 Osprey 是四季适用的终极版合成填充睡袋。
translation.source: Many view the Softie 12 Osprey the ultimate four season synthetic fill sleeping bag available.
translation.medium: 许多人认为Softie 12 Osprey是目前最好的四季人造纤维睡袋。
translation.reference: 许多人认为 Softie 12 Osprey 是四季适用的终极版合成填充睡袋。

translation.en: Since 1987, it has been setting the standard for winter pack size performance for others to follow.
translation.zh: 自 1987 年以来，该公司一直在为冬季背包的尺寸性能设定标准，成为其他公司效仿的目标。
translation.source: Since 1987, it has been setting the standard for winter pack size performance for others to follow.
translation.medium: 自 1987 年以来，它一直是其他品牌跟随的标准。
translation.reference: 自 1987 年以来，该公司一直在为冬季背包的尺寸性能设定标准，成为其他公司效仿的目标。

translation.en: Those who know about the Softie 12 Osprey have either used one or wished they had one.
translation.zh: 那些知道 Softie 12 Osprey 的人要么用过它，要么就是希望能拥有一个。
translation.source: Those who know about the Softie 12 Osprey have either used one or wished they had one.
translation.medium: 那些知道 Softie 12 Osprey 的人，都曾使用过它或者渴望拥有它。
translation.reference: 那些知道 Softie 12 Osprey 的人要么用过它，要么就是希望能拥有一个。

translation.en: Used from the heights of the Scottish mountains to the bottom of your snow hole.
translation.zh: 它适合在上至苏格兰山脉高处，下至雪洞底部的众多场合使用。
translation.source: Used from the heights of the Scottish mountains to the bottom of your snow hole.
translation.medium: 从苏格兰高山到雪洞的底部。
translation.reference: 它适合在上至苏格兰山脉高处，下至雪洞底部的众多场合使用。

translation.en: The Softie 12 Osprey like many of our other sleeping bags in the Softie Original Series have been assigned a NATO Stock Number.
translation.zh: Softie 12 Osprey 像 Softie Original 系列的许多其他睡袋一样，都被分配了 NATO 库存编号。
translation.source: The Softie 12 Osprey like many of our other sleeping bags in the Softie Original Series have been assigned a NATO Stock Number.
translation.medium: Softie 12 Osprey 睡袋与我们其他 Softie Original 系列睡袋一样，被分配了一个北约编号。
translation.reference: Softie 12 Osprey 像 Softie Original 系列的许多其他睡袋一样，都被分配了 NATO 库存编号。

translation.en: The quilted top of the bag is tailored, pleated, and fitted with a drawcord so it pulls into shape, rather like a jacket hood.
translation.zh: 这款睡袋的顶部绗缝考究，有褶皱，还配有拉绳，这样它就能拉出形状，有点像夹克的兜帽。
translation.source: The quilted top of the bag is tailored, pleated, and fitted with a drawcord so it pulls into shape, rather like a jacket hood.
translation.medium: 背包的针织顶部是定制的，折叠，并且配有拉链，可以拉出形状，类似于大衣的帽子。
translation.reference: 这款睡袋的顶部绗缝考究，有褶皱，还配有拉绳，这样它就能拉出形状，有点像夹克的兜帽。

translation.en: To prevent the 2-way zip from snagging either the zip baffle or the bag edges, an "anti-snag strip" of webbing is sewn in behind the zip.
translation.zh: 为了防止双向拉链被拉链挡边或包边卡住，在拉链后面缝了一条“防钩带”。
translation.source: To prevent the 2-way zip from snagging either the zip baffle or the bag edges, an "anti-snag strip" of webbing is sewn in behind the zip.
translation.medium: 为了防止拉链卡住拉链罩或袋子边缘，在拉链后面缝上一条防卡条。
translation.reference: 为了防止双向拉链被拉链挡边或包边卡住，在拉链后面缝了一条“防钩带”。

translation.en: Liner Fastening and Hanging Tabs Inner tabs are provided to keep a loose liner in position, corresponding in position with the tabs we provide on our liners.
translation.zh: 内衬紧固件和内里的挂耳可以将松动的内衬固定在合适的位置，与内衬上的挂耳相对应。
translation.source: Liner Fastening and Hanging Tabs Inner tabs are provided to keep a loose liner in position, corresponding in position with the tabs we provide on our liners.
translation.medium: 内衬固定和悬挂卡扣内衬固定和悬挂卡扣用于保持固定不牢的内衬，与我们提供的内衬上的卡扣对应。
translation.reference: 内衬紧固件和内里的挂耳可以将松动的内衬固定在合适的位置，与内衬上的挂耳相对应。

translation.en: External tabs allow you to easily hang the bag for airing and drying.
translation.zh: 外部的挂耳方便晾晒。
translation.source: External tabs allow you to easily hang the bag for airing and drying.
translation.medium: 外部的挂钩可以让你轻松地挂起袋子进行通风干燥。
translation.reference: 外部的挂耳方便晾晒。

translation.en: Tapering the bag to a circle foot creates the "mummy" shape which is easy to warm and minimises the weight of material used.
translation.zh: 睡袋的底部做成圆形，形成“木乃伊”形状，这样既有助于保暖，又能将所使用材料的重量降至最低。
translation.source: Tapering the bag to a circle foot creates the "mummy" shape which is easy to warm and minimises the weight of material used.
translation.medium: 把袋子缩成一个圆形脚，可以创造出“蜡像”的形状，容易保暖，同时也减少了材料的重量。
translation.reference: 睡袋的底部做成圆形，形成“木乃伊”形状，这样既有助于保暖，又能将所使用材料的重量降至最低。

translation.en: Hard to see in the picture, but a zip baffle runs the full length of the bag, behind the zip,to prevent heat escaping through the zip area.
translation.zh: 睡袋有一条从头贯穿到尾的拉链挡边，就在拉链的后面，这是为了防止热量通过拉链区域逃逸，不过这在图中很难看到。
translation.source: Hard to see in the picture, but a zip baffle runs the full length of the bag, behind the zip,to prevent heat escaping through the zip area.
translation.medium: 在照片中很难看到，但是拉链罩整个袋子，在拉链后面，以防止通过拉链区域散发热量。
translation.reference: 睡袋有一条从头贯穿到尾的拉链挡边，就在拉链的后面，这是为了防止热量通过拉链区域逃逸，不过这在图中很难看到。

translation.en: Buy a left and a right hand to make a double (please check when ordering)
translation.zh: 购买一只左开睡袋和一只右开睡袋，可以拼成双人睡袋（订购时请核对）
translation.source: Buy a left and a right hand to make a double (please check when ordering)
translation.medium: 购买左手和右手，组成双手 (请在订购时确认)
translation.reference: 购买一只左开睡袋和一只右开睡袋，可以拼成双人睡袋（订购时请核对）

translation.en: Comes complete with a compression stuff sack, to make the bag smaller when not in use.
translation.zh: 配有压缩袋，可在不使用睡袋里作收纳使用。
translation.source: Comes complete with a compression stuff sack, to make the bag smaller when not in use.
translation.medium: 包括一个压缩袋，可以让袋子在不使用时变小。
translation.reference: 配有压缩袋，可在不使用睡袋里作收纳使用。

translation.en: Can be used with the Snugpak Exanda Panel to make a wider sleeping bag for more comfort.
translation.zh: 可与 Snugpak Exanda Panel 一起使用，睡袋会变得更宽、更舒适。
translation.source: Can be used with the Snugpak Exanda Panel to make a wider sleeping bag for more comfort.
translation.medium: 可以与 Snugpak Exanda Panel 一起使用，制作一个更宽的睡袋，以获得更多的舒适感。
translation.reference: 可与 Snugpak Exanda Panel 一起使用，睡袋会变得更宽、更舒适。

translation.en: This sleeping bag can be made extra long.
translation.zh: 这款睡袋可以做得特别长。
translation.source: This sleeping bag can be made extra long.
translation.medium: 这个睡袋可以加长。
translation.reference: 这款睡袋可以做得特别长。

translation.en: Single profiled sleeping bag with one layer of softie insulation.
translation.zh: 这款单层异形睡袋使用了一层柔软的保温材料。
translation.source: Single profiled sleeping bag with one layer of softie insulation.
translation.medium: 单层软质睡袋。
translation.reference: 这款单层异形睡袋使用了一层柔软的保温材料。

translation.en: Snugpak are based in a listed mill built in the 1800s on the edge of the beautiful Yorkshire Dales.
translation.zh: Snugpak 公司位于美丽的约克郡山谷边缘，这座建于 19 世纪的工厂被列入了文物保护名录。
translation.source: Snugpak are based in a listed mill built in the 1800s on the edge of the beautiful Yorkshire Dales.
translation.medium: Snugpak 总部位于 1800 年代建造的位于英格兰约克郡边缘的一座列入名录的纺织厂。
translation.reference: Snugpak 公司位于美丽的约克郡山谷边缘，这座建于 19 世纪的工厂被列入了文物保护名录。

translation.en: They are very proud to be one of the last manufacturers of quality sleeping bags and insulated clothing not only in the UK but across Europe.
translation.zh: 让他们引以为豪的是，不仅在英国，乃至在整个欧洲，他们都是高质量睡袋和绝缘服装的顶级制造商之一。
translation.source: They are very proud to be one of the last manufacturers of quality sleeping bags and insulated clothing not only in the UK but across Europe.
translation.medium: 他们非常自豪能够是英国和欧洲唯一一家仍在生产高质量的睡袋和保暖衣的制造商。
translation.reference: 让他们引以为豪的是，不仅在英国，乃至在整个欧洲，他们都是高质量睡袋和绝缘服装的顶级制造商之一。

translation.en: We have a dedicated workforce at our West Yorkshire factory in the North of England who are trained to use state-of-the-art machinery and traditional sewing techniques to bring our ideas to life.
translation.zh: 我们在西约克郡工厂的工人都在英格兰北部接受过训练，学习使用最先进的机械和传统的缝纫技术，将我们的想法变成现实。
translation.source: We have a dedicated workforce at our West Yorkshire factory in the North of England who are trained to use state-of-the-art machinery and traditional sewing techniques to bring our ideas to life.
translation.medium: 我们位于英格兰北部的西约克郡工厂拥有一支专业的工作队伍，他们受过专业培训，能够使用最先进的机器和传统的缝纫技术将我们的想法付诸实践。
translation.reference: 我们在西约克郡工厂的工人都在英格兰北部接受过训练，学习使用最先进的机械和传统的缝纫技术，将我们的想法变成现实。

translation.en: Contact Left Limited is an official supplier for Snugpak and carries a large range of their kit in our EBAY shop.
translation.zh: Contact Left Limited 是 Snugpak 的官方供应商，我们的 EBAY 商店有他们的许多套件出售。
translation.source: Contact Left Limited is an official supplier for Snugpak and carries a large range of their kit in our EBAY shop.
translation.medium: 联系左有限公司是 Snugpak 的官方供应商，我们的 eBay 店内有大量 Snugpak 的装备。
translation.reference: Contact Left Limited 是 Snugpak 的官方供应商，我们的 EBAY 商店有他们的许多套件出售。

translation.en: Contact Left LTD is a leading supplier of kit to the Armed Forces and Close Protection Industry
translation.zh: Contact Left LTD 是武装部队和贴身护卫行业的领先供应商
translation.source: Contact Left LTD is a leading supplier of kit to the Armed Forces and Close Protection Industry
translation.medium: 联系左有限公司是为武装部队和保护行业提供装备的领先供应商
translation.reference: Contact Left LTD 是武装部队和贴身护卫行业的领先供应商

translation.en: I do apologise about this, we must gain permission from the account holder to discuss an order with another person, I apologise if this was done previously, however, I would not be able to discuss this with yourself without the account holders permission.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，我们在获得帐户持有人的许可后才能与其他人讨论订单，如果以前这样做过，那么我道歉，但我在没有获得帐户持有人的许可之前，还是不能讨论这个。
translation.source: I do apologise about this, we must gain permission from the account holder to discuss an order with another person, I apologise if this was done previously, however, I would not be able to discuss this with yourself without the account holders permission.
translation.medium: 我向您道歉，我们必须得到帐户持有人的许可才能与另一个人讨论一笔订单，如果之前已经这样做过，我向您道歉，但是，如果没有帐户持有人的许可，我不能与您讨论这笔订单。
translation.reference: 很抱歉，我们在获得帐户持有人的许可后才能与其他人讨论订单，如果以前这样做过，那么我道歉，但我在没有获得帐户持有人的许可之前，还是不能讨论这个。

translation.en: I was buying new tires.
translation.zh: 那次我想买个新轮胎。
translation.source: I was buying new tires.
translation.medium: 我正在买新轮胎。
translation.reference: 那次我想买个新轮胎。

translation.en: I found the ones I wanted on a tire store website.
translation.zh: 我在一家轮胎店的网站上找到了我想要的轮胎。
translation.source: I found the ones I wanted on a tire store website.
translation.medium: 我在轮胎店的网站上找到了我想要的。
translation.reference: 我在一家轮胎店的网站上找到了我想要的轮胎。

translation.en: I printed out the page and took it to my local shop.
translation.zh: 我把网页打印出来，拿到了当地的一家门店。
translation.source: I printed out the page and took it to my local shop.
translation.medium: 我打印了这一页，并带到了我的当地商店。
translation.reference: 我把网页打印出来，拿到了当地的一家门店。

translation.en: It was part of a chain.
translation.zh: 这是一家连锁店。
translation.source: It was part of a chain.
translation.medium: 这是一个链条。
translation.reference: 这是一家连锁店。

translation.en: The guy at the shop checked things out and it turns out that the current price of the tires was more than my printout.
translation.zh: 门店里的人查了一下，结果发现轮胎的当前价格比我打印出来的价格要高。
translation.source: The guy at the shop checked things out and it turns out that the current price of the tires was more than my printout.
translation.medium: 店员检查了一下，原来现在的轮胎价格比我的打印出来的价格还要高。
translation.reference: 门店里的人查了一下，结果发现轮胎的当前价格比我打印出来的价格要高。

translation.en: Don’t know where he got the higher price from.
translation.zh: 不知道他的价格为什么更高。
translation.source: Don’t know where he got the higher price from.
translation.medium: 不知道他从哪里得到了更高的价格。
translation.reference: 不知道他的价格为什么更高。

translation.en: Luckily, the guy was honest and rather than trying to charge the higher price, he sold me the tires for the price I had on my printout.
translation.zh: 幸运的是，这个人很诚实，他没有收取更高的价格，而是按我打印出来的价格把轮胎卖给了我。
translation.source: Luckily, the guy was honest and rather than trying to charge the higher price, he sold me the tires for the price I had on my printout.
translation.medium: 幸运的是，这个人很诚实，而不是试图收取更高的价格，他卖给我的轮胎的价格是我的打印纸上的价格。
translation.reference: 幸运的是，这个人很诚实，他没有收取更高的价格，而是按我打印出来的价格把轮胎卖给了我。

translation.en: He said that because I had the printout, he had to sell me the tires at the printout price.
translation.zh: 他说因为我有打印件，所以他必须按打印件的价格卖给我轮胎。
translation.source: He said that because I had the printout, he had to sell me the tires at the printout price.
translation.medium: 他说，因为我有印刷品，他必须按照印刷品的价格卖给我轮胎。
translation.reference: 他说因为我有打印件，所以他必须按打印件的价格卖给我轮胎。

translation.en: He was gracious about it too.
translation.zh: 他一直彬彬有礼。
translation.source: He was gracious about it too.
translation.medium: 他也很客气。
translation.reference: 他一直彬彬有礼。

translation.en: Been buying tires from them ever since.
translation.zh: 从那以后我就一直从他们那里买轮胎。
translation.source: Been buying tires from them ever since.
translation.medium: 从那以后就一直在购买他们的轮胎。
translation.reference: 从那以后我就一直从他们那里买轮胎。

translation.en: The order was processed as a pick up order that means you chose it to be picked up by you.
translation.zh: 订单被处理为取件订单，这意味着要由您自己取件。
translation.source: The order was processed as a pick up order that means you chose it to be picked up by you.
translation.medium: 该订单处理为自提订单，意味着您选择自行取货。
translation.reference: 订单被处理为取件订单，这意味着要由您自己取件。

translation.en: That's why we are unable to assign a rider for this.
translation.zh: 正因如此，我们无法为您指派骑手。
translation.source: That's why we are unable to assign a rider for this.
translation.medium: 因此，我们无法安排骑手。
translation.reference: 正因如此，我们无法为您指派骑手。

translation.en: As the order has already been accepted, we are unable to cancel the order at this point.
translation.zh: 由于订单已被接受，我们目前无法取消订单。
translation.source: As the order has already been accepted, we are unable to cancel the order at this point.
translation.medium: 由于订单已接受，目前无法取消订单。
translation.reference: 由于订单已被接受，我们目前无法取消订单。

translation.en: I understand, but my colleague explained yesterday that we have to be in touch with the warehouse, this has been done for you - so we are awaiting the reply.
translation.zh: 我理解，但是我的同事昨天解释了，我们必须和仓库联系，现在正在等待回复。
translation.source: I understand, but my colleague explained yesterday that we have to be in touch with the warehouse, this has been done for you - so we are awaiting the reply.
translation.medium: 我明白，但我的同事昨天解释说，我们必须联系仓库，我们已经为您做了这一切 - 所以我们正在等待回复。
translation.reference: 我理解，但是我的同事昨天解释了，我们必须和仓库联系，现在正在等待回复。

translation.en: As soon as we have the information, we can then let you know the whereabouts of your order
translation.zh: 我们一有消息，就会把订单的情况告诉您
translation.source: As soon as we have the information, we can then let you know the whereabouts of your order
translation.medium: 一旦我们收到信息，我们就可以告诉你你的订单在哪里
translation.reference: 我们一有消息，就会把订单的情况告诉您

translation.en: The item was due to dispatch 18.12
translation.zh: 这个商品应该是 12 月 18 日就发货了
translation.source: The item was due to dispatch 18.12
translation.medium: 该商品原定于12月18日发货
translation.reference: 这个商品应该是 12 月 18 日就发货了

translation.en: After that, please delete your authorization
translation.zh: 之后，请删除您的授权
translation.source: After that, please delete your authorization
translation.medium: 之后请删除授权
translation.reference: 之后，请删除您的授权

translation.en: 1) Deauthorize your Ereader
translation.zh: 1) 取消对您的电子阅读器的授权
translation.source: 1) Deauthorize your Ereader
translation.medium: 1) 取消你的电子阅读器授权
translation.reference: 1) 取消对您的电子阅读器的授权

translation.en: Turn on your eReader.
translation.zh: 打开您的电子阅读器。
translation.source: Turn on your eReader.
translation.medium: 打开你的电子阅读器。
translation.reference: 打开您的电子阅读器。

translation.en: Connect your eReader to your computer using a Micro USB cable.
translation.zh: 使用 Micro USB 缆线将您的电子阅读器连接到电脑。
translation.source: Connect your eReader to your computer using a Micro USB cable.
translation.medium: 将你的电子阅读器连接到你的计算机，使用 Micro USB 数据线。
translation.reference: 使用 Micro USB 缆线将您的电子阅读器连接到电脑。

translation.en: On your eReader: Tap Connect.
translation.zh: 在您的电子阅读器上：点击“连接”。
translation.source: On your eReader: Tap Connect.
translation.medium: 在你的电子阅读器上：点击连接。
translation.reference: 在您的电子阅读器上：点击“连接”。

translation.en: On your computer: Open #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 在您的电脑上：Open #PRS_ORG#.
translation.source: On your computer: Open #PRS_ORG#.
translation.medium: 在你的计算机上：打开 #PRS_ORG#。
translation.reference: 在您的电脑上：Open #PRS_ORG#.

translation.en: Under 'Devices', right-click on #PRS_ORG# eReader.
translation.zh: 在“设备”下，右键单击 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器。
translation.source: Under 'Devices', right-click on #PRS_ORG# eReader.
translation.medium: 在“设备”中，右键单击 #PRS_ORG# eReader。
translation.reference: 在“设备”下，右键单击 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器。

translation.en: Click Erase Device Authorization.
translation.zh: 单击“擦除设备授权”。
translation.source: Click Erase Device Authorization.
translation.medium: 点击“删除设备授权”。
translation.reference: 单击“擦除设备授权”。

translation.en: Click OK at the confirmation screen.
translation.zh: 单击确认屏幕上的“确定”。
translation.source: Click OK at the confirmation screen.
translation.medium: 点击确定即可。
translation.reference: 单击确认屏幕上的“确定”。

translation.en: 2) De-authorize #PRS_ORG#
translation.zh: 2) 取消授权 #PRS_ORG#
translation.source: 2) De-authorize #PRS_ORG#
translation.medium: 2) 取消 #PRS_ORG# 的授权
translation.reference: 2) 取消授权 #PRS_ORG#

translation.en: To deauthorize #PRS_ORG#, click Help > Erase Authorization.
translation.zh: 要取消授权 #PRS_ORG#，请单击“帮助”>“擦除授权”。
translation.source: To deauthorize #PRS_ORG#, click Help > Erase Authorization.
translation.medium: 要取消 #PRS_ORG# 的授权，请单击“帮助” > “删除授权”。
translation.reference: 要取消授权 #PRS_ORG#，请单击“帮助”>“擦除授权”。

translation.en: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for the account you used to authorize #PRS_ORG#.
translation.zh: 在弹出窗口中，输入您用于授权 #PRS_ORG# 的帐户密码。
translation.source: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for the account you used to authorize #PRS_ORG#.
translation.medium: 在弹出的窗口中输入授权 #PRS_ORG# 的帐户密码。
translation.reference: 在弹出窗口中，输入您用于授权 #PRS_ORG# 的帐户密码。

translation.en: Click Erase Authorization
translation.zh: 单击“擦除授权”
translation.source: Click Erase Authorization
translation.medium: 点击“删除授权”
translation.reference: 单击“擦除授权”

translation.en: Were the steps helpful?
translation.zh: 这些步骤有用吗？
translation.source: Were the steps helpful?
translation.medium: 这些步骤对你有帮助吗？
translation.reference: 这些步骤有用吗？

translation.en: Sadly I have not received a response for more than two minutes.
translation.zh: 很遗憾，已经两分多钟了，但我没有收到回应。
translation.source: Sadly I have not received a response for more than two minutes.
translation.medium: 令人遗憾的是，我已经等了两分多钟没有回应。
translation.reference: 很遗憾，已经两分多钟了，但我没有收到回应。

translation.en: For quality purposes this chat interaction will be closed, please remember you can always come back and we will be happy to continue assisting you.
translation.zh: 为了提高服务质量，本次聊天互动将关闭，但请记住，您可以随时回来，我们很乐意继续帮助您。
translation.source: For quality purposes this chat interaction will be closed, please remember you can always come back and we will be happy to continue assisting you.
translation.medium: 为了保证质量，此次聊天互动将被关闭，请记住，您可以随时回来，我们将继续为您提供帮助。
translation.reference: 为了提高服务质量，本次聊天互动将关闭，但请记住，您可以随时回来，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: No you wouldn't be able to enter an appointment date, you would need to place the order and we would then we can place the items on hold for you, we can place these on hold initially for three months
translation.zh: 不，您无法输入预约日期，您需要下订单，我们会为您保管商品，可以保管三个月
translation.source: No you wouldn't be able to enter an appointment date, you would need to place the order and we would then we can place the items on hold for you, we can place these on hold initially for three months
translation.medium: 不，您不能输入预约日期，您需要下订单，然后我们会为您保留这些商品三个月。
translation.reference: 不，您无法输入预约日期，您需要下订单，我们会为您保管商品，可以保管三个月

translation.en: Is there anything else I can help with this afternoon for you?
translation.zh: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
translation.source: Is there anything else I can help with this afternoon for you?
translation.medium: 下午还有什么事情需要我帮忙吗？
translation.reference: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。
translation.source: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.medium: 感谢您今天花时间和我聊天，我希望我能够解决您的疑问，如果您不介意评价我的客户服务技能，我真的很感谢您，评价按钮可以在这个聊天窗口中找到。
translation.reference: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。

translation.en: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.
translation.zh: 祝您今天过得愉快，如果您需要其他帮助，请随时联系我们。
translation.source: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.
translation.medium: 我希望您今天过得很好，如果您需要进一步的帮助，请再次联系我们。
translation.reference: 祝您今天过得愉快，如果您需要其他帮助，请随时联系我们。

translation.en: Ok, please do me the favour to follow the next steps>
translation.zh: 好的，请执行以下步骤：
translation.source: Ok, please do me the favour to follow the next steps>
translation.medium: 好的，请继续按照下面的步骤操作>
translation.reference: 好的，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.zh: 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。
translation.source: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.
translation.medium: 插入墙壁充电器（不含）到电源插座，然后将电子阅读器连接到墙壁充电器。
translation.reference: 把充电器（未提供）插到插座上，再把电子阅读器连接到充电器。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button until you see the words "Powered off" at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 按住电源按钮，直到屏幕顶部显示“关机”。
translation.source: Press and hold the power button until you see the words "Powered off" at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 按住电源按钮，直到屏幕顶部出现“关机”字样。
translation.reference: 按住电源按钮，直到屏幕顶部显示“关机”。

translation.en: Continue holding down the power button for 3-4 seconds.
translation.zh: 继续按住电源按钮 3-4 秒。
translation.source: Continue holding down the power button for 3-4 seconds.
translation.medium: 继续按住电源按钮3-4秒钟。
translation.reference: 继续按住电源按钮 3-4 秒。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。
translation.source: Release the power button.
translation.medium: 松开电源按钮。
translation.reference: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。
translation.source: Press and hold the power button on your eReader for 30 seconds.
translation.medium: 按住电子阅读器的电源按钮 30 秒。
translation.reference: 按住电子阅读器上的电源按钮 30 秒。

translation.en: Wait for the 'Restore' screen to appear.
translation.zh: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。
translation.source: Wait for the 'Restore' screen to appear.
translation.medium: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。
translation.reference: 等待“恢复”屏幕出现。

translation.en: Release the power button.
translation.zh: 松开电源按钮。
translation.source: Release the power button.
translation.medium: 松开电源按钮。
translation.reference: 松开电源按钮。

translation.en: After the e-reader has been reset, it will ask you to set your language preferences and a WiFi network.
translation.zh: 重置电子阅读器后，它将询问您是否设置语言首选项和 WiFi 网络。
translation.source: After the e-reader has been reset, it will ask you to set your language preferences and a WiFi network.
translation.medium: 重置电子阅读器后，它会要求你设置语言偏好和 WiFi 网络。
translation.reference: 重置电子阅读器后，它将询问您是否设置语言首选项和 WiFi 网络。

translation.en: After that you will need to sign in with your e-mail address and password
translation.zh: 随后，您需要使用电子邮件地址和密码登录
translation.source: After that you will need to sign in with your e-mail address and password
translation.medium: 然后，您需要使用电子邮件地址和密码登录
translation.reference: 随后，您需要使用电子邮件地址和密码登录

translation.en: I haven’t seen any comments from Australians yet, so I might as well say a few words.
translation.zh: 我还没有看到有澳大利亚人发言，那么我来说几句。
translation.source: I haven’t seen any comments from Australians yet, so I might as well say a few words.
translation.medium: 目前还没有看到澳大利亚人的评论，我也可以说几句话。
translation.reference: 我还没有看到有澳大利亚人发言，那么我来说几句。

translation.en: It’s difficult to find equipment that’s unique or out of the mainstream.
translation.zh: 现在很难找到独特的或非主流的设备。
translation.source: It’s difficult to find equipment that’s unique or out of the mainstream.
translation.medium: 很难找到独一无二或者脱离主流的设备。
translation.reference: 现在很难找到独特的或非主流的设备。

translation.en: Most boards are mass market boards such as sector 9s or Loaded Tan Tien’s … I have both and I’m not hating.
translation.zh: 大多数板子都很大众，比如 sector 9s 或 Loaded Tan Tien……这两种我都有，而且也不讨厌它们。
translation.source: Most boards are mass market boards such as sector 9s or Loaded Tan Tien’s … I have both and I’m not hating.
translation.medium: 大多数滑板都是大众市场滑板，比如 Sector 9 或 Loaded Tan Tien … 我拥有两块，我并不嫌弃。
translation.reference: 大多数板子都很大众，比如 sector 9s 或 Loaded Tan Tien……这两种我都有，而且也不讨厌它们。

translation.en: If I want something out of the ordinary, however, I buy direct from the manufacturer or through Muir.
translation.zh: 不过，如果我想要个性化的板子，我会直接向制造商或通过 Muir 购买。
translation.source: If I want something out of the ordinary, however, I buy direct from the manufacturer or through Muir.
translation.medium: 如果我想要一些特别的东西，我会直接从制造商那里购买，或者通过穆尔。
translation.reference: 不过，如果我想要个性化的板子，我会直接向制造商或通过 Muir 购买。

translation.en: Shipping is always a problem and it’s always expensive.
translation.zh: 然而运输不易，而且运费很贵。
translation.source: Shipping is always a problem and it’s always expensive.
translation.medium: 运输总是一个问题，总是很贵。
translation.reference: 然而运输不易，而且运费很贵。

translation.en: I really wanted the Tortuga but when it was all priced up, it was over AU$500 (incl. shipping and exchange rate).
translation.zh: 我真的很想要 Tortuga，不过它在涨价后超过了 500 澳元（包括运费和汇率）。
translation.source: I really wanted the Tortuga but when it was all priced up, it was over AU$500 (incl. shipping and exchange rate).
translation.medium: 我真的很想买一个海龟，但当我看到价格时，它的价格超过了 500 澳元（包括运费和汇率）。
translation.reference: 我真的很想要 Tortuga，不过它在涨价后超过了 500 澳元（包括运费和汇率）。

translation.en: Shipping alone was approx. US$100.
translation.zh: 单是运费就大约要 100 美元。
translation.source: Shipping alone was approx. US$100.
translation.medium: 运费约为 100 美元。
translation.reference: 单是运费就大约要 100 美元。

translation.en: I understand this isn't something you have control over … I only wanted to illustrate the considerations and trade-offs made from this side of the world.
translation.zh: 我知道这不是你能控制的事情……我只是想说明，在世界的另一边还有各种考虑和权衡。
translation.source: I understand this isn't something you have control over … I only wanted to illustrate the considerations and trade-offs made from this side of the world.
translation.medium: 我明白这不是你能控制的……我只是想说明这边的考虑和取舍。
translation.reference: 我知道这不是你能控制的事情……我只是想说明，在世界的另一边还有各种考虑和权衡。

translation.en: Finally, love your boards!
translation.zh: 最后，好好爱你的板子吧！
translation.source: Finally, love your boards!
translation.medium: 最后，爱你的滑板！
translation.reference: 最后，好好爱你的板子吧！

translation.en: Much respect.
translation.zh: 敬礼！
translation.source: Much respect.
translation.medium: 很敬佩。
translation.reference: 敬礼！

translation.en: This is the thing people don't get.
translation.zh: 人们不明白，
translation.source: This is the thing people don't get.
translation.medium: 这是人们不懂的。
translation.reference: 人们不明白，

translation.en: The math doesn't say you can't get really sick if you're young and healthy.
translation.zh: 统计学并没有说年轻健康的人就不会生病。
translation.source: The math doesn't say you can't get really sick if you're young and healthy.
translation.medium: 数学不会告诉你，如果你年轻健康，就不会很病。
translation.reference: 统计学并没有说年轻健康的人就不会生病。

translation.en: Maybe I'm a pessimist, but that's better than thinking you're invincible.
translation.zh: 我可能有点悲观，但这总比认为自己坚不可摧的人强。
translation.source: Maybe I'm a pessimist, but that's better than thinking you're invincible.
translation.medium: 或许我是一个悲观主义者，但这比以为自己无敌要好。
translation.reference: 我可能有点悲观，但这总比认为自己坚不可摧的人强。

translation.en: That shit will get you killed.
translation.zh: 盲目自信会害死你的。
translation.source: That shit will get you killed.
translation.medium: 那些垃圾会把你杀死。
translation.reference: 盲目自信会害死你的。

translation.en: I think I took it seriously because I've been sick a lot, and I hate it.
translation.zh: 我不敢那么轻狂，是因为我病过很多次，我讨厌这样。
translation.source: I think I took it seriously because I've been sick a lot, and I hate it.
translation.medium: 我觉得我很认真，因为我经常生病，我很讨厌。
translation.reference: 我不敢那么轻狂，是因为我病过很多次，我讨厌这样。

translation.en: I'm healthy in general, but the flu always hits me very hard.
translation.zh: 总体来说，我是健康的，但流感总是给予我重击。
translation.source: I'm healthy in general, but the flu always hits me very hard.
translation.medium: 我的健康状况总体不错，但是每次感冒都会很严重。
translation.reference: 总体来说，我是健康的，但流感总是给予我重击。

translation.en: I was scared that Covid was going to be worse.
translation.zh: 我很害怕新冠病毒会变得更糟。
translation.source: I was scared that Covid was going to be worse.
translation.medium: 我担心新冠病毒会更加严重。
translation.reference: 我很害怕新冠病毒会变得更糟。

translation.en: It wasn't, probably because I didn't get exposed to a lot of the virus, but it was bad enough.
translation.zh: 即使没有，也可能是因为我没有接触到很多病毒，但这已经够糟糕的了。
translation.source: It wasn't, probably because I didn't get exposed to a lot of the virus, but it was bad enough.
translation.medium: 可能是因为我没有接触到很多病毒，所以没有那么严重。
translation.reference: 即使没有，也可能是因为我没有接触到很多病毒，但这已经够糟糕的了。

translation.en: Still took months for my body to return to normal.
translation.zh: 我的身体还要好几个月才能恢复正常。
translation.source: Still took months for my body to return to normal.
translation.medium: 我的身体还需要几个月才能恢复正常。
translation.reference: 我的身体还要好几个月才能恢复正常。

translation.en: I don't know why it affects people differently, but for me it was body pain and headaches that were the worst part.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么它会对不同的人产生不同的影响，但对我来说，身体疼痛和头痛是最难忍受的。
translation.source: I don't know why it affects people differently, but for me it was body pain and headaches that were the worst part.
translation.medium: 我不知道为什么会影响不同的人，但对我来说，身体疼痛和头痛是最糟糕的部分。
translation.reference: 我不知道为什么它会对不同的人产生不同的影响，但对我来说，身体疼痛和头痛是最难忍受的。

translation.en: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine.
translation.zh: 感谢您提供的信息，希望您一切顺利。
translation.source: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine.
translation.medium: 感谢您提供的信息，希望您身体健康。
translation.reference: 感谢您提供的信息，希望您一切顺利。

translation.en: Please let me verify your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.zh: 我允许我验证您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。
translation.source: Please let me verify your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.medium: 请让我核实您的#PRS_ORG#账号。
translation.reference: 我允许我验证您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。

translation.en: I will be happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。
translation.source: I will be happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 我很乐意帮助你。
translation.reference: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Please give me a moment.
translation.zh: 请稍候几分钟。
translation.source: Please give me a moment.
translation.medium: 请给我一点时间。
translation.reference: 请稍候几分钟。

translation.en: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry that your mother hasn't received the egift card, please conform the email that was sent.
translation.zh: 感谢您的耐心等待，很抱歉您的妈妈还没有收到电子礼品卡，请查看发送的邮件。
translation.source: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry that your mother hasn't received the egift card, please conform the email that was sent.
translation.medium: 感谢您的等待，抱歉您的母亲尚未收到电子礼品卡，请确认已发送的电子邮件。
translation.reference: 感谢您的耐心等待，很抱歉您的妈妈还没有收到电子礼品卡，请查看发送的邮件。

translation.en: Russia warned of 'consequences' if Ukraine attacked
translation.zh: 俄罗斯遭警告称，入侵乌克兰将导致“巨大后果”
translation.source: Russia warned of 'consequences' if Ukraine attacked
translation.medium: 俄罗斯警告称，如果乌克兰发动袭击，将有“后果”
translation.reference: 俄罗斯遭警告称，入侵乌克兰将导致“巨大后果”

translation.en: The Group of Seven has warned Russia of massive consequences and severe costs if President Vladimir Putin attacks Ukraine, according to a draft statement.
translation.zh: 根据一份声明草案，七国集团警告俄罗斯，如果俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京 (Vladimir Putin) 进攻乌克兰，将面临巨大后果和严重代价。
translation.source: The Group of Seven has warned Russia of massive consequences and severe costs if President Vladimir Putin attacks Ukraine, according to a draft statement.
translation.medium: 根据草案，七国集团警告俄罗斯，如果俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京对乌克兰发动进攻，将面临巨大的后果和沉重的代价。
translation.reference: 根据一份声明草案，七国集团警告俄罗斯，如果俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京 (Vladimir Putin) 进攻乌克兰，将面临巨大后果和严重代价。

translation.en: US intelligence assesses that Russia could be planning a multi-front offensive on Ukraine as early as next year, involving up to 175,000 troops.
translation.zh: 美国情报机构评估称，俄罗斯可能计划最早于明年对乌克兰发起多线进攻，兵力多达 17.5 万。
translation.source: US intelligence assesses that Russia could be planning a multi-front offensive on Ukraine as early as next year, involving up to 175,000 troops.
translation.medium: 美国情报机构评估称，俄罗斯可能在明年就会对乌克兰发动多线进攻，投入最多 175,000 名士兵。
translation.reference: 美国情报机构评估称，俄罗斯可能计划最早于明年对乌克兰发起多线进攻，兵力多达 17.5 万。

translation.en: The Kremlin denies it plans to invade and says the West is gripped by Russophobia.
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫否认计划入侵乌克兰，并表示西方被俄罗斯恐惧症所控制。
translation.source: The Kremlin denies it plans to invade and says the West is gripped by Russophobia.
translation.medium: 克里姆林宫否认有入侵乌克兰的计划，称西方被俄罗斯妖魔化。
translation.reference: 克里姆林宫否认计划入侵乌克兰，并表示西方被俄罗斯恐惧症所控制。

translation.en: Moscow says the expansion of NATO threatens Russia and has contravened assurances given to it as the Soviet Union collapsed in 1991.
translation.zh: 莫斯科说，北约的扩张对俄罗斯构成威胁，违反了 1991 年苏联解体时向俄罗斯作出的保证。
translation.source: Moscow says the expansion of NATO threatens Russia and has contravened assurances given to it as the Soviet Union collapsed in 1991.
translation.medium: 莫斯科表示，北约的扩张威胁到俄罗斯，违背了苏联解体后给予俄罗斯的承诺。
translation.reference: 莫斯科说，北约的扩张对俄罗斯构成威胁，违反了 1991 年苏联解体时向俄罗斯作出的保证。

translation.en: At a meeting in the northern English city Liverpool, the G7 delegates said they were united in their condemnation of Russia's military build-up near Ukraine and they called on Moscow to de-escalate.
translation.zh: 在英格兰北部城市利物浦举行的会议上，七国集团代表表示，他们一致谴责俄罗斯在乌克兰附近的军事集结，并呼吁莫斯科缓和局势。
translation.source: At a meeting in the northern English city Liverpool, the G7 delegates said they were united in their condemnation of Russia's military build-up near Ukraine and they called on Moscow to de-escalate.
translation.medium: 在英国北部城市利物浦举行的会议上，G7代表表示，他们对俄罗斯在乌克兰附近部署军队表示强烈谴责，并呼吁莫斯科降低紧张局势。
translation.reference: 在英格兰北部城市利物浦举行的会议上，七国集团代表表示，他们一致谴责俄罗斯在乌克兰附近的军事集结，并呼吁莫斯科缓和局势。

translation.en: "Russia should be in no doubt that further military aggression against Ukraine would have massive consequences and severe cost," the draft statement said, confirmed by G7 sources.
translation.zh: 经七国集团消息人士证实的声明草案称:“俄罗斯应该毫不怀疑，对乌克兰的进一步军事侵略将产生巨大的后果，必将付出严重的代价。”
translation.source: "Russia should be in no doubt that further military aggression against Ukraine would have massive consequences and severe cost," the draft statement said, confirmed by G7 sources.
translation.medium: “俄罗斯必须清楚地意识到，对乌克兰的进一步军事侵略将产生巨大的后果和沉重的代价”，草案声明说道，这一声明得到七国集团的证实。
translation.reference: 经七国集团消息人士证实的声明草案称:“俄罗斯应该毫不怀疑，对乌克兰的进一步军事侵略将产生巨大的后果，必将付出严重的代价。”

translation.en: "We reaffirm our unwavering commitment to Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity, as well as the right of any sovereign state to determine its own future," the draft said.
translation.zh: “我们重申对乌克兰主权和领土完整，以及任何主权国家都有权决定自己未来的坚定承诺，”草案说。
translation.source: "We reaffirm our unwavering commitment to Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity, as well as the right of any sovereign state to determine its own future," the draft said.
translation.medium: “我们重申我们对乌克兰主权和领土完整的坚定承诺，以及任何主权国家对自己未来的决定权，”草案中写道。
translation.reference: “我们重申对乌克兰主权和领土完整，以及任何主权国家都有权决定自己未来的坚定承诺，”草案说。

translation.en: For Moscow, the growing NATO embrace of a neighbouring former Soviet republic - and what it sees as the nightmare possibility of alliance missiles in Ukraine targeted against Russia - is a "red line" it will not allow to be crossed.
translation.zh: 对莫斯科来说，北约对这个前苏联邻国的日益接纳——以及北约在乌克兰部署针对俄罗斯的导弹的可能性——是一条它不允许越过的“红线”。
translation.source: For Moscow, the growing NATO embrace of a neighbouring former Soviet republic - and what it sees as the nightmare possibility of alliance missiles in Ukraine targeted against Russia - is a "red line" it will not allow to be crossed.
translation.medium: 对于莫斯科来说，随着北大西洋公约组织对邻国前苏联共和国的拥抱不断加深，以及它所看到的联盟导弹在乌克兰针对俄罗斯的可能性，这是一条莫斯科不会允许被跨越的“红线”。
translation.reference: 对莫斯科来说，北约对这个前苏联邻国的日益接纳——以及北约在乌克兰部署针对俄罗斯的导弹的可能性——是一条它不允许越过的“红线”。

translation.en: Mr Putin has demanded legally binding security guarantees that NATO will not expand further east or place its weapons close to Russian territory; Washington has repeatedly said no country can veto Ukraine's NATO hopes.
translation.zh: 普京要求有法律约束力的安全保证，北约不会进一步向东扩张，也不会在俄罗斯领土附近部署武器；华盛顿一再表示，任何国家对乌克兰加入北约都没有否决权。
translation.source: Mr Putin has demanded legally binding security guarantees that NATO will not expand further east or place its weapons close to Russian territory; Washington has repeatedly said no country can veto Ukraine's NATO hopes.
translation.medium: 普京要求获得法律约束力的安全保证，确保北约不会向东扩张或将武器部署靠近俄罗斯领土；华盛顿多次表示，没有任何国家可以否决乌克兰加入北约的希望。
translation.reference: 普京要求有法律约束力的安全保证，北约不会进一步向东扩张，也不会在俄罗斯领土附近部署武器；华盛顿一再表示，任何国家对乌克兰加入北约都没有否决权。

translation.en: In 2014, Russia seized the Black Sea peninsula of Crimea from Ukraine, prompting the West to slap sanctions on Russia.
translation.zh: 2014 年，俄罗斯从乌克兰手中夺取了黑海半岛克里米亚，促使西方对俄罗斯实施制裁。
translation.source: In 2014, Russia seized the Black Sea peninsula of Crimea from Ukraine, prompting the West to slap sanctions on Russia.
translation.medium: 2014 年，俄罗斯占领乌克兰克里米亚半岛，引发西方对俄罗斯实施制裁。
translation.reference: 2014 年，俄罗斯从乌克兰手中夺取了黑海半岛克里米亚，促使西方对俄罗斯实施制裁。

translation.en: The Kremlin said today that Mr Putin told US President Joe Biden that Russian troops posed no threat and that Moscow was being demonised for moving troops around its own territory.
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫今天表示，普京告诉美国总统乔·拜登，俄罗斯军队不会造成威胁，莫斯科不应因为在自己的领土调动军队而被妖魔化。
translation.source: The Kremlin said today that Mr Putin told US President Joe Biden that Russian troops posed no threat and that Moscow was being demonised for moving troops around its own territory.
translation.medium: 克里姆林宫今天表示，普京向美国总统拜登表示，俄罗斯军队不构成威胁，莫斯科被污名化是因为在自己的领土上调动军队。
translation.reference: 克里姆林宫今天表示，普京告诉美国总统乔·拜登，俄罗斯军队不会造成威胁，莫斯科不应因为在自己的领土调动军队而被妖魔化。

translation.en: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said there were very serious conceptual differences between Russia and the United States on Moscow's "red lines."
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫发言人佩斯科夫 (Dmitry Peskov) 表示，俄罗斯和美国在莫斯科的“红线”问题上存在非常严重的概念分歧。
translation.source: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said there were very serious conceptual differences between Russia and the United States on Moscow's "red lines."
translation.medium: 克里姆林宫发言人德米特里·佩斯科夫表示，俄罗斯和美国在莫斯科的“红线”问题上存在很严重的概念上的分歧。
translation.reference: 克里姆林宫发言人佩斯科夫 (Dmitry Peskov) 表示，俄罗斯和美国在莫斯科的“红线”问题上存在非常严重的概念分歧。

translation.en: The G7 comprises Britain, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Canada and the United States, and includes a representative from the European Union.
translation.zh: 七国集团包括英国、法国、德国、意大利、日本、加拿大和美国，还包括一名来自欧盟的代表。
translation.source: The G7 comprises Britain, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Canada and the United States, and includes a representative from the European Union.
translation.medium: G7包括英国、法国、德国、意大利、日本、加拿大和美国，还包括欧盟代表。
translation.reference: 七国集团包括英国、法国、德国、意大利、日本、加拿大和美国，还包括一名来自欧盟的代表。

translation.en: "We call on Russia to de-escalate, pursue diplomatic channels and abide by its international commitments on transparency of military activities," the G7 said in the draft.
translation.zh: 七国集团在草案中表示:“我们呼吁俄罗斯缓和局势，寻求外交渠道，遵守其关于军事活动透明度的国际承诺。”
translation.source: "We call on Russia to de-escalate, pursue diplomatic channels and abide by its international commitments on transparency of military activities," the G7 said in the draft.
translation.medium: “我们呼吁俄罗斯降低紧张局势，追求外交渠道并遵守其在军事活动透明度方面的国际承诺，” G7 在草案中说道。
translation.reference: 七国集团在草案中表示:“我们呼吁俄罗斯缓和局势，寻求外交渠道，遵守其关于军事活动透明度的国际承诺。”

translation.en: "We reconfirm our support for the efforts of France and Germany in the Normandy Format to achieve full implementation of the Minsk Agreements in order to resolve the conflict in eastern Ukraine," the draft said.
translation.zh: 草案说:“我们重申支持法国和德国在诺曼底模式下为全面实施《明斯克协议》所作的努力，以解决乌克兰东部的冲突。”
translation.source: "We reconfirm our support for the efforts of France and Germany in the Normandy Format to achieve full implementation of the Minsk Agreements in order to resolve the conflict in eastern Ukraine," the draft said.
translation.medium: “我们重申我们对法国和德国在《纽伦堡协议》框架下努力实现《明斯克协议》全面落实，以解决乌克兰东部冲突的支持，”草案中写道。
translation.reference: 草案说:“我们重申支持法国和德国在诺曼底模式下为全面实施《明斯克协议》所作的努力，以解决乌克兰东部的冲突。”

translation.en: China's Xi and Russia's Putin dominate the G7
translation.zh: 中国主席习近平和俄罗斯总统普京成为了七国集团的关注点
translation.source: China's Xi and Russia's Putin dominate the G7
translation.medium: 中国的习和俄罗斯的普京统治着 G7
translation.reference: 中国主席习近平和俄罗斯总统普京成为了七国集团的关注点

translation.en: Pope calls for 'serious international dialogue' to defuse Ukraine tensions
translation.zh: 教皇呼吁进行“严肃的国际对话”来缓和乌克兰的紧张局势
translation.source: Pope calls for 'serious international dialogue' to defuse Ukraine tensions
translation.medium: 教皇呼吁“严肃的国际对话”缓和乌克兰紧张局势
translation.reference: 教皇呼吁进行“严肃的国际对话”来缓和乌克兰的紧张局势

translation.en: Pope Francis, in his first comments on the tensions between the West and Russia over Ukraine, today called for serious international dialogue to resolve tensions and urged both sides to avoid an armed conflict.
translation.zh: 今天，教皇方济各 (Pope Francis) 首次就西方和俄罗斯在乌克兰问题上的紧张关系发表评论，他呼吁进行严肃的国际对话来解决紧张关系，并敦促双方避免武装冲突。
translation.source: Pope Francis, in his first comments on the tensions between the West and Russia over Ukraine, today called for serious international dialogue to resolve tensions and urged both sides to avoid an armed conflict.
translation.medium: 教皇方济各今天首次就西方与俄罗斯之间的乌克兰紧张局势发表评论，呼吁进行严肃的国际对话以解决紧张局势，并呼吁双方避免武装冲突。
translation.reference: 今天，教皇方济各 (Pope Francis) 首次就西方和俄罗斯在乌克兰问题上的紧张关系发表评论，他呼吁进行严肃的国际对话来解决紧张关系，并敦促双方避免武装冲突。

translation.en: He said he was praying for "dear Ukraine, for all its churches and religious communities and for all of its people, so that tensions there are resolved through a serious international dialogue and not with weapons."
translation.zh: 他说，他为“亲爱的乌克兰，为所有的教堂和宗教团体，为所有的乌克兰人民祈祷，让紧张局势通过严肃的国际对话而不是武器得到解决。
translation.source: He said he was praying for "dear Ukraine, for all its churches and religious communities and for all of its people, so that tensions there are resolved through a serious international dialogue and not with weapons."
translation.medium: 他表示，他正为“亲爱的乌克兰、乌克兰的所有教会和宗教社区以及所有人民祈祷，希望通过严肃的国际对话而不是武器来解决当地的紧张局势。”
translation.reference: 他说，他为“亲爱的乌克兰，为所有的教堂和宗教团体，为所有的乌克兰人民祈祷，让紧张局势通过严肃的国际对话而不是武器得到解决。

translation.en: Weapons are not the path to take.
translation.zh: 武器不是我们该做的选择。
translation.source: Weapons are not the path to take.
translation.medium: 武器不是出路。
translation.reference: 武器不是我们该做的选择。

translation.en: May this Christmas bring peace to Ukraine," the pope told thousands of people in St Peter's Square for his noon blessing and address.
translation.zh: 愿这个圣诞节为乌克兰带来和平，”教皇在圣彼得广场对数千人演讲，并在中午进行了祝福和讲话。
translation.source: May this Christmas bring peace to Ukraine," the pope told thousands of people in St Peter's Square for his noon blessing and address.
translation.medium: 我祈祷这个圣诞节能够为乌克兰带来和平，”教皇在圣彼得广场为数千人的中午祈祷和讲话中说道。
translation.reference: 愿这个圣诞节为乌克兰带来和平，”教皇在圣彼得广场对数千人演讲，并在中午进行了祝福和讲话。

translation.en: Ukraine is predominantly Orthodox Christian, with Catholics of either the Latin Rite or Byzantine rite making up about 10% of the population in the former Soviet republic.
translation.zh: 乌克兰的第一大宗教是东正教，信奉拉丁礼或拜占庭礼的天主教徒占这个前苏联共和国人口的 10% 左右。
translation.source: Ukraine is predominantly Orthodox Christian, with Catholics of either the Latin Rite or Byzantine rite making up about 10% of the population in the former Soviet republic.
translation.medium: 乌克兰主要是东正教基督徒，拉丁礼和拜占庭礼的天主教徒占人口的 10%。
translation.reference: 乌克兰的第一大宗教是东正教，信奉拉丁礼或拜占庭礼的天主教徒占这个前苏联共和国人口的 10% 左右。

translation.en: Separately, Mr Biden has said he told Mr Putin that Russia would pay "a terrible price" and face devastating economic consequences if it invaded Ukraine.
translation.zh: 另外，拜登表示，他警告普京，如果入侵乌克兰，俄罗斯将付出“可怕的代价”，并面临毁灭性的经济后果。
translation.source: Separately, Mr Biden has said he told Mr Putin that Russia would pay "a terrible price" and face devastating economic consequences if it invaded Ukraine.
translation.medium: 此外，拜登先生还表示，他告诉普京，如果俄罗斯入侵乌克兰，俄罗斯将付出“惨痛代价”，面临毁灭性的经济后果。
translation.reference: 另外，拜登表示，他警告普京，如果入侵乌克兰，俄罗斯将付出“可怕的代价”，并面临毁灭性的经济后果。

translation.en: Plus Muscle Maintenance to support muscular structure and activity
translation.zh: 外加肌肉保养，为肌肉结构和活动做补充
translation.source: Plus Muscle Maintenance to support muscular structure and activity
translation.medium: 加上肌肉维持，以支持肌肉结构和活动
translation.reference: 外加肌肉保养，为肌肉结构和活动做补充

translation.en: Joint Aid for Dogs is a high specification joint and muscle supplement with glucosamine for dogs, designed to aid freedom of movement.
translation.zh: Joint Aid for Dogs 是一种优质的关节和肌肉补充剂，含有狗狗需要的葡萄糖胺，旨在帮助狗狗自由行动。
translation.source: Joint Aid for Dogs is a high specification joint and muscle supplement with glucosamine for dogs, designed to aid freedom of movement.
translation.medium: Joint Aid for Dogs 是一种高规格的狗狗骨骼和肌肉补充剂，含有葡萄糖胺，用于帮助狗狗自由活动。
translation.reference: Joint Aid for Dogs 是一种优质的关节和肌肉补充剂，含有狗狗需要的葡萄糖胺，旨在帮助狗狗自由行动。

translation.en: Joint Aid for Dogs can be fed to all dogs from any age at the ‘General Support’ level to maintain freedom of movement and muscle condition throughout their lives.
translation.zh: Joint Aid for Dogs 可以按照“一般补充”水平喂给任何年龄的狗狗，帮助它们终生保持行动自由和肌肉状况。
translation.source: Joint Aid for Dogs can be fed to all dogs from any age at the ‘General Support’ level to maintain freedom of movement and muscle condition throughout their lives.
translation.medium: Joint Aid for Dogs 可以给任何年龄的狗喂食，以维持其自由活动和肌肉状态。
translation.reference: Joint Aid for Dogs 可以按照“一般补充”水平喂给任何年龄的狗狗，帮助它们终生保持行动自由和肌肉状况。

translation.en: For elderly and working dogs or those showing reduced muscle mass, Joint Aid for Dogs is recommended to be fed at the ‘Full Support’ level.
translation.zh: 对于上了年纪的狗狗和工作犬，或肌肉萎缩的狗狗，建议按照“完全补充”水平喂养 Joint Aid for Dogs。
translation.source: For elderly and working dogs or those showing reduced muscle mass, Joint Aid for Dogs is recommended to be fed at the ‘Full Support’ level.
translation.medium: 对于老年犬、工作犬或者肌肉量减少的狗狗，建议使用“全面支持”级别的 Joint Aid for Dogs。
translation.reference: 对于上了年纪的狗狗和工作犬，或肌肉萎缩的狗狗，建议按照“完全补充”水平喂养 Joint Aid for Dogs。

translation.en: What are the key benefits of using Joint Aid for Dogs?
translation.zh: 使用 Joint Aid for Dogs 有何重要好处？
translation.source: What are the key benefits of using Joint Aid for Dogs?
translation.medium: 使用 Joint Aid for Dogs 的主要好处是什么？
translation.reference: 使用 Joint Aid for Dogs 有何重要好处？

translation.en: -Maintains flexibility of movement in all working and pet dogs regardless of age, size and level of exercise.
translation.zh: -保持所有工作犬和宠物犬的运动灵活性，无论其年龄、体型和运动水平如何。
translation.source: -Maintains flexibility of movement in all working and pet dogs regardless of age, size and level of exercise.
translation.medium: -保持所有工作犬和宠物犬的任何年龄、体型和运动水平的灵活性。
translation.reference: -保持所有工作犬和宠物犬的运动灵活性，无论其年龄、体型和运动水平如何。

translation.en: -Supports the formation of cartilage, tendons, ligaments, synovial fluid and muscles.
translation.zh: -对软骨、肌腱、韧带、滑膜液和肌肉的形成有益。
translation.source: -Supports the formation of cartilage, tendons, ligaments, synovial fluid and muscles.
translation.medium: -支持韧带、软骨、韧带、关节液和肌肉的形成。
translation.reference: -对软骨、肌腱、韧带、滑膜液和肌肉的形成有益。

translation.en: -Helps maintain the natural anti-inflammatory actions of the dog's metabolism.
translation.zh: -有助于维持狗狗新陈代谢的自然抗炎作用。
translation.source: -Helps maintain the natural anti-inflammatory actions of the dog's metabolism.
translation.medium: ——帮助维持狗的代谢系统的天然抗炎作用。
translation.reference: -有助于维持狗狗新陈代谢的自然抗炎作用。

translation.en: -Provides a unique combination of 22 active nutraceuticals.
translation.zh: -提供 22 种活性保健品的独特组合。
translation.source: -Provides a unique combination of 22 active nutraceuticals.
translation.medium: - 提供 22 种活性营养素的独特组合。
translation.reference: -提供 22 种活性保健品的独特组合。

translation.en: -Contains the unique Oatinol™ Delivery System to maintain a high rate of nutrient absorption.
translation.zh: -含有独特的 Oatinol™ 输送系统，保持营养的高吸收率。
translation.source: -Contains the unique Oatinol™ Delivery System to maintain a high rate of nutrient absorption.
translation.medium: - 含有独特的Oatinol™ 输送系统，确保营养素吸收率高。
translation.reference: -含有独特的 Oatinol™ 输送系统，保持营养的高吸收率。

translation.en: -Contains high levels of Omega 3 to support optimum health and performance.
translation.zh: -含有大量的欧米茄 3，有助于维持最佳健康和性能。
translation.source: -Contains high levels of Omega 3 to support optimum health and performance.
translation.medium: 含有高水平的Omega 3，以支持最佳健康和表现。
translation.reference: -含有大量的欧米茄 3，有助于维持最佳健康和性能。

translation.en: -Manufactured as palatable and easy-to-feed 2mm pellets.
translation.zh: -制造成美味且易于喂食的 2mm 颗粒。
translation.source: -Manufactured as palatable and easy-to-feed 2mm pellets.
translation.medium: - 制作成口感好、容易喂食的 2mm 颗粒。
translation.reference: -制造成美味且易于喂食的 2mm 颗粒。

translation.en: -Can be fed to all dogs regardless of age, size or level of exercise.​
translation.zh: -可以喂给任意年龄、大小或运动水平的所有狗狗。
translation.source: -Can be fed to all dogs regardless of age, size or level of exercise.​
translation.medium: 适合所有年龄、体型和运动水平的狗狗。
translation.reference: -可以喂给任意年龄、大小或运动水平的所有狗狗。

translation.en: -For continued support, Joint Aid is recommended to be fed on a daily basis.
translation.zh: -若要持续补充，建议每天喂食 Joint Aid。
translation.source: -For continued support, Joint Aid is recommended to be fed on a daily basis.
translation.medium: -为了继续获得支持，联合援助建议每天服用。
translation.reference: -若要持续补充，建议每天喂食 Joint Aid。

translation.en: A measure is included in the pack.
translation.zh: 包中含有一个计量器。
translation.source: A measure is included in the pack.
translation.medium: 包含了一项措施。
translation.reference: 包中含有一个计量器。

translation.en: Nutraceuticals are nutritional substances that provide additional health benefits.
translation.zh: 营养药品是可以额外带来健康好处的营养物质。
translation.source: Nutraceuticals are nutritional substances that provide additional health benefits.
translation.medium: 营养药物是提供额外健康益处的营养物质。
translation.reference: 营养药品是可以额外带来健康好处的营养物质。

translation.en: Through the addition of the following nutraceuticals, Joint Aid provides a complementary support for all dogs.
translation.zh: Joint Aid 添加了以下营养药品，可为所有狗狗提供营养补充。
translation.source: Through the addition of the following nutraceuticals, Joint Aid provides a complementary support for all dogs.
translation.medium: 通过添加以下营养补剂，Joint Aid 为所有的狗提供了补充支持。
