translation.reference: 前往贝尔格莱德的当地火车上的乘客被困在雪中 7 个小时后，才被安排乘坐公共汽车前往首都。

translation.en: Emergency services have been assisting authorities in the cleanup operation, while another alert for more snow and ice has been issued.
translation.zh: 紧急服务部门一直在协助当局进行清理工作，同时又发布了有关更多冰雪的警报。
translation.source: Emergency services have been assisting authorities in the cleanup operation, while another alert for more snow and ice has been issued.
translation.medium: 紧急救援人员正在协助当局进行清理工作，另外，又发布了更多雪和冰的警报。
translation.reference: 紧急服务部门一直在协助当局进行清理工作，同时又发布了有关更多冰雪的警报。

translation.en: Meanwhile, in Bulgaria, heavy rains and major floods have been ravaging southern parts of the country over the weekend, forcing authorities there to declare a state of emergency.
translation.zh: 与此同时，保加利亚南部地区周末遭遇暴雨和大洪水，迫使当地政府宣布进入紧急状态。
translation.source: Meanwhile, in Bulgaria, heavy rains and major floods have been ravaging southern parts of the country over the weekend, forcing authorities there to declare a state of emergency.
translation.medium: 同时，在保加利亚，本周末，该国南部地区遭受暴雨和严重洪水袭击，迫使当局宣布紧急状态。
translation.reference: 与此同时，保加利亚南部地区周末遭遇暴雨和大洪水，迫使当地政府宣布进入紧急状态。

translation.en: The worst-hit areas were in the Smolyan region, near the border with Greece, where rivers burst their banks to cause the overflowing of roads and the flooding of homes.
translation.zh: 受灾最严重的地区是靠近希腊边境的斯莫利亚地区，那里的河流决堤，导致道路泛滥，房屋被淹没。
translation.source: The worst-hit areas were in the Smolyan region, near the border with Greece, where rivers burst their banks to cause the overflowing of roads and the flooding of homes.
translation.medium: 受灾最严重的地区位于索菲亚地区，距离希腊边境不远，河流泛滥导致道路淹没，房屋被淹。
translation.reference: 受灾最严重的地区是靠近希腊边境的斯莫利亚地区，那里的河流决堤，导致道路泛滥，房屋被淹没。

translation.en: Several trucks were trapped in a landslide on an intercity road.
translation.zh: 几辆卡车被困在一条发生滑坡的城际公路。
translation.source: Several trucks were trapped in a landslide on an intercity road.
translation.medium: 几辆大货车被埋在城际公路上。
translation.reference: 几辆卡车被困在一条发生滑坡的城际公路。

translation.en: Strong winds disrupted power supply in dozens of villages, authorities said.
translation.zh: 当局称，强风中断了数十个村庄的电力供应。
translation.source: Strong winds disrupted power supply in dozens of villages, authorities said.
translation.medium: 当局表示，强风导致数十个村庄的电力供应中断。
translation.reference: 当局称，强风中断了数十个村庄的电力供应。

translation.en: Further south in Albania, authorities mobilised police, army and emergency forces to cope with floods following three days of continuous rainfall and snow.
translation.zh: 在更远的南部阿尔巴尼亚，当局动员警察、军队和紧急部队应对连续三天的雨雪造成的洪水。
translation.source: Further south in Albania, authorities mobilised police, army and emergency forces to cope with floods following three days of continuous rainfall and snow.
translation.medium: 阿尔巴尼亚南部，当局组织警察、军队和紧急救援力量应对连续三天的降雨和雪崩造成的洪水。
translation.reference: 在更远的南部阿尔巴尼亚，当局动员警察、军队和紧急部队应对连续三天的雨雪造成的洪水。

translation.en: The Vjosa River in the south flooded many areas.
translation.zh: 南部的 Vjosa 河淹没了许多地区。
translation.source: The Vjosa River in the south flooded many areas.
translation.medium: 南部的维约萨河泛滥成灾。
translation.reference: 南部的 Vjosa 河淹没了许多地区。

translation.en: An older couple who had stayed overnight on the rooftop of their house in southwest Albania was rescued by police in the morning.
translation.zh: 一对在阿尔巴尼亚西南部的屋顶上过夜的老夫妇在早上被警方救出。
translation.source: An older couple who had stayed overnight on the rooftop of their house in southwest Albania was rescued by police in the morning.
translation.medium: 在阿尔巴尼亚西南部，一对老夫妻晚上睡在家里的屋顶上，第二天早上被警察救出。
translation.reference: 一对在阿尔巴尼亚西南部的屋顶上过夜的老夫妇在早上被警方救出。

translation.en: Many roads were temporarily blocked by landslides in the south.
translation.zh: 南部的许多道路因山体滑坡而暂时被封锁。
translation.source: Many roads were temporarily blocked by landslides in the south.
translation.medium: 南部多条道路被山体滑坡堵塞。
translation.reference: 南部的许多道路因山体滑坡而暂时被封锁。

translation.en: Elsewhere in the northeast and southeast of the country, heavy snow has hampered or temporarily blocked traffic.
translation.zh: 在该国东北部和东南部的其他地方，大雪阻碍或暂时中断了交通。
translation.source: Elsewhere in the northeast and southeast of the country, heavy snow has hampered or temporarily blocked traffic.
translation.medium: 在东北和东南部的其他地方，暴风雪妨碍或暂时堵塞了交通。
translation.reference: 在该国东北部和东南部的其他地方，大雪阻碍或暂时中断了交通。

translation.en: We had power go out a couple of times.
translation.zh: 我们经历过几次停电的情况。
translation.source: We had power go out a couple of times.
translation.medium: 我们有几次断电。
translation.reference: 我们经历过几次停电的情况。

translation.en: Step 1: Get someone on the door immediately.
translation.zh: 步骤 1：马上派人去守住门口。
translation.source: Step 1: Get someone on the door immediately.
translation.medium: 第一步：立即让人上门。
translation.reference: 步骤 1：马上派人去守住门口。

translation.en: They are security now.
translation.zh: 他们现在就是保安。
translation.source: They are security now.
translation.medium: 他们现在是安全的。
translation.reference: 他们现在就是保安。

translation.en: Don't let anyone in and pay attention to people as they leave (esp kids' hands).
translation.zh: 不要让任何人进来，并注意出去的顾客（尤其是孩子的手）。
translation.source: Don't let anyone in and pay attention to people as they leave (esp kids' hands).
translation.medium: 不要让任何人进来，注意离开的人（尤其是孩子的手）。
translation.reference: 不要让任何人进来，并注意出去的顾客（尤其是孩子的手）。

translation.en: Step 2: Call Store Manager if they aren't there.
translation.zh: 步骤 2：如果门店经理不在现场，那就打电话给他。
translation.source: Step 2: Call Store Manager if they aren't there.
translation.medium: 第 2 步：如果他们不在，请打电话给店长。
translation.reference: 步骤 2：如果门店经理不在现场，那就打电话给他。

translation.en: Step 3: Those that are at tills and anyone else really are free to wait a couple minutes to see if backup generators can get us going again.
translation.zh: 步骤 3：让那些在收银台的顾客和其他人等待几分钟，看看备用发电机能否让电力恢复。
translation.source: Step 3: Those that are at tills and anyone else really are free to wait a couple minutes to see if backup generators can get us going again.
translation.medium: 步骤 3：在收银台和其他任何人都可以等待几分钟，看看备用发电机能否重新启动。
translation.reference: 步骤 3：让那些在收银台的顾客和其他人等待几分钟，看看备用发电机能否让电力恢复。

translation.en: Step 4: Go throughout the store and getting every non employee to leave.
translation.zh: 步骤 4：搜寻全店，让所有非员工人员离开，
translation.source: Step 4: Go throughout the store and getting every non employee to leave.
translation.medium: 第 4 步：走遍整个店铺，让每个非员工离开。
translation.reference: 步骤 4：搜寻全店，让所有非员工人员离开，

translation.en: As well as every cart brought to the front.
translation.zh: 并把每辆购物车都推到前面。
translation.source: As well as every cart brought to the front.
translation.medium: 并且每辆车都被推到了前面。
translation.reference: 并把每辆购物车都推到前面。

translation.en: Step 5: Go through the carts looking for anything cold and produce.
translation.zh: 步骤 5：把购物车里需要冷藏的加工的商品拣出来。
translation.source: Step 5: Go through the carts looking for anything cold and produce.
translation.medium: 步骤 5：在购物车中寻找任何冷冻食品和蔬菜。
translation.reference: 步骤 5：把购物车里需要冷藏的加工的商品拣出来。

translation.en: Step 6: Return said cold/produce.
translation.zh: 步骤 6：把它们送回到冷藏区/加工区。
translation.source: Step 6: Return said cold/produce.
translation.medium: 步骤 6：返回冷却/生产。
translation.reference: 步骤 6：把它们送回到冷藏区/加工区。

translation.en: Step 7: Cover all non-doored cold i.e. cheese/meat/veggies, etc.
translation.zh: 步骤 7：盖好所有不带门冷藏区的商品，如奶酪/肉类/蔬菜等。
translation.source: Step 7: Cover all non-doored cold i.e. cheese/meat/veggies, etc.
translation.medium: 步骤 7：覆盖所有没有门的冷冻食品，如奶酪、肉类、蔬菜等。
translation.reference: 步骤 7：盖好所有不带门冷藏区的商品，如奶酪/肉类/蔬菜等。

translation.en: Step 8: Sign our names on a sheet of paper as we left to be clocked out.
translation.zh: 步骤 8：离开时在纸上签名，代替下班打卡。
translation.source: Step 8: Sign our names on a sheet of paper as we left to be clocked out.
translation.medium: 步骤 8：我们离开时，在一张纸上签上我们的名字。
translation.reference: 步骤 8：离开时在纸上签名，代替下班打卡。

translation.en: (Some were allowed to leave earlier, esp if they weren't comfortable in the dark or didn't still have 6hrs to go).
translation.zh: （有些人被允许提前离开，特别是那些不习惯呆在黑暗中或者不到 6 个小时后就要下班的员工)。
translation.source: (Some were allowed to leave earlier, esp if they weren't comfortable in the dark or didn't still have 6hrs to go).
translation.medium: （有些人被允许提前离开，特别是如果他们不舒服在黑暗中，或者还有 6 个小时要走）。
translation.reference: （有些人被允许提前离开，特别是那些不习惯呆在黑暗中或者不到 6 个小时后就要下班的员工)。

translation.en: It's really dark, even upfront.
translation.zh: 即使门店的前面也很暗。
translation.source: It's really dark, even upfront.
translation.medium: 真的很黑，甚至在前面。
translation.reference: 即使门店的前面也很暗。

translation.en: No way can we let customers just hang out.
translation.zh: 我们不能让顾客随便闲逛。
translation.source: No way can we let customers just hang out.
translation.medium: 绝对不能让顾客闲着。
translation.reference: 我们不能让顾客随便闲逛。

translation.en: I'm not sure why some tills still had some power while others didn't.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么有些收银机仍然有电，有些却没电。
translation.source: I'm not sure why some tills still had some power while others didn't.
translation.medium: 我不知道为什么有些收银台仍然有电力，而其他收银台却没有。
translation.reference: 我不知道为什么有些收银机仍然有电，有些却没电。

translation.en: Not sure, but I don't think we had any way of having them pay.
translation.zh: 我不确定，但我觉得可能没法收银。
translation.source: Not sure, but I don't think we had any way of having them pay.
translation.medium: 我不确定，但我觉得我们没有办法让他们付钱。
translation.reference: 我不确定，但我觉得可能没法收银。

translation.en: I do think items would scan, but no way would we trust the customers to pay later.
translation.zh: 我相信可以扫描商品，但我们不可能相信顾客以后会付款。
translation.source: I do think items would scan, but no way would we trust the customers to pay later.
translation.medium: 我确实认为商品可以扫描，但我们绝对不会让顾客以后付款。
translation.reference: 我相信可以扫描商品，但我们不可能相信顾客以后会付款。

translation.en: One time it took only like 3 hrs for power to go back on.
translation.zh: 有一次 3 个小时后就恢复了供电。
translation.source: One time it took only like 3 hrs for power to go back on.
translation.medium: 一次，电力恢复了大约 3 个小时。
translation.reference: 有一次 3 个小时后就恢复了供电。

translation.en: They had a few of us stay so if it did, as they were told by the power company it should, we could reopen.
translation.zh: 我们当中有些人被留了下来，如果真的像电力公司所说的那样，我们就可以重新营业。
translation.source: They had a few of us stay so if it did, as they were told by the power company it should, we could reopen.
translation.medium: 他们让几个我们留下来，如果停电，就可以重新开门。
translation.reference: 我们当中有些人被留了下来，如果真的像电力公司所说的那样，我们就可以重新营业。

translation.en: I don't mind, as long as we have the choice to stay or not, helping out preserving product as best as we could.
translation.zh: 我不介意，只要我们有留下或离开的选择，我们会尽自己所能保护商品。
translation.source: I don't mind, as long as we have the choice to stay or not, helping out preserving product as best as we could.
translation.medium: 只要我们有选择留下还是离开的权利，尽量帮助保护产品。
translation.reference: 我不介意，只要我们有留下或离开的选择，我们会尽自己所能保护商品。

translation.en: Not having a choice, as well as endangering customers, is where I draw the line.
translation.zh: 但是，没有选择，同时又会危及顾客，就触碰到了我的底线。
translation.source: Not having a choice, as well as endangering customers, is where I draw the line.
translation.medium: 没有选择，以及危害客户，这就是我的界限。
translation.reference: 但是，没有选择，同时又会危及顾客，就触碰到了我的底线。

translation.en: This Arab state plans to boost trade with Russia
translation.zh: 这个阿拉伯国家计划加强与俄罗斯的贸易合作
translation.source: This Arab state plans to boost trade with Russia
translation.medium: 这个阿拉伯国家计划加强与俄罗斯的贸易
translation.reference: 这个阿拉伯国家计划加强与俄罗斯的贸易合作

translation.en: The United Arab Emirates plans to increase its trade turnover with Russia to $20 billion in the next five years, the country's Foreign Trade Minister Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi has announced.
translation.zh: 阿拉伯联合酋长国对外贸易部长萨尼·本·艾哈迈德·阿尔·泽尤迪 (Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi) 宣布，该国计划在未来五年内将与俄罗斯的贸易额提高到 200 亿美元。
translation.source: The United Arab Emirates plans to increase its trade turnover with Russia to $20 billion in the next five years, the country's Foreign Trade Minister Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi has announced.
translation.medium: 阿联酋计划在未来五年内将与俄罗斯的贸易额增加到 200 亿美元，阿联酋外贸部长 Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi 宣布。
translation.reference: 阿拉伯联合酋长国对外贸易部长萨尼·本·艾哈迈德·阿尔·泽尤迪 (Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi) 宣布，该国计划在未来五年内将与俄罗斯的贸易额提高到 200 亿美元。

translation.en: "We are working with the Russian side to increase trade turnover to $20 billion over the next five years and to continue investing in other areas [of economic cooperation]," Al Zeyoudi told RIA news agency on Saturday during a plenary session of the Expo-2020 international forum in the UAE, which had been postponed due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
translation.zh: “我们正在与俄方加强贸易合作，计划在未来五年将贸易额提高到 200 亿美元，并在其他领域（经济合作）继续展开投资合作，”阿尔·泽尤迪于周六在由于新冠疫情而推迟的 2020 年阿联酋国际论坛上对 RIA 通讯社如是说。
translation.source: "We are working with the Russian side to increase trade turnover to $20 billion over the next five years and to continue investing in other areas [of economic cooperation]," Al Zeyoudi told RIA news agency on Saturday during a plenary session of the Expo-2020 international forum in the UAE, which had been postponed due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
translation.medium: “我们正在与俄罗斯方面合作，力争在未来五年内将贸易额增加到 200 亿美元，并继续在其他领域（经济合作）进行投资，”阿兹祖迪周六在阿联酋举行的延期的2020年世博会国际论坛全体会议上告诉俄罗斯通讯社。
translation.reference: “我们正在与俄方加强贸易合作，计划在未来五年将贸易额提高到 200 亿美元，并在其他领域（经济合作）继续展开投资合作，”阿尔·泽尤迪于周六在由于新冠疫情而推迟的 2020 年阿联酋国际论坛上对 RIA 通讯社如是说。

translation.en: According to the official, "relations between Abu Dhabi and Moscow are strategic."
translation.zh: 这位官员表示，“阿布扎比和莫斯科之间建立了战略性关系。”
translation.source: According to the official, "relations between Abu Dhabi and Moscow are strategic."
translation.medium: 据官员介绍，“阿布扎比与莫斯科的关系是战略性的。”
translation.reference: 这位官员表示，“阿布扎比和莫斯科之间建立了战略性关系。”

translation.en: He noted that up to 90% of all Russian investments in the Arab world are made in the UAE.
translation.zh: 他指出，俄罗斯在阿拉伯世界的投资有 90% 在阿联酋进行。
translation.source: He noted that up to 90% of all Russian investments in the Arab world are made in the UAE.
translation.medium: 他指出，俄罗斯在阿拉伯世界的投资中，有 90% 以上都集中在阿联酋。
translation.reference: 他指出，俄罗斯在阿拉伯世界的投资有 90% 在阿联酋进行。

translation.en: The UAE also significantly invests in Russia, making up some 80% of all Arab investments in Russia's economy.
translation.zh: 阿联酋在俄罗斯也有大量投资，占阿拉伯对俄罗斯经济投资的 80% 左右。
translation.source: The UAE also significantly invests in Russia, making up some 80% of all Arab investments in Russia's economy.
translation.medium: 阿联酋还在俄罗斯投资了大量资金，占所有阿拉伯国家在俄罗斯经济中的投资额的 80%。
translation.reference: 阿联酋在俄罗斯也有大量投资，占阿拉伯对俄罗斯经济投资的 80% 左右。

translation.en: "If we are talking about the number of Russian companies in the UAE, it has reached almost 4,000," Al Zeyoudi stated.
translation.zh: 阿尔·泽尤迪说:“阿联酋的俄罗斯公司有将近 4000 家。”
translation.source: "If we are talking about the number of Russian companies in the UAE, it has reached almost 4,000," Al Zeyoudi stated.
translation.medium: “如果我们谈论俄罗斯公司在阿联酋的数量，它已经接近 4,000 家，”阿兹祖迪表示。
translation.reference: 阿尔·泽尤迪说:“阿联酋的俄罗斯公司有将近 4000 家。”

translation.en: According to the minister, the UAE is already investing in several Russian sectors, including the petrochemical industry, oil and gas, the automotive industry and ports, and it plans to broaden this list.
translation.zh: 这位部长称，阿联酋已经在俄罗斯的几个领域进行投资，包括石化工业、石油和天然气、汽车工业和港口，并计划扩大投资范围。
translation.source: According to the minister, the UAE is already investing in several Russian sectors, including the petrochemical industry, oil and gas, the automotive industry and ports, and it plans to broaden this list.
translation.medium: 据该部长介绍，阿联酋已经在几个俄罗斯领域进行投资，包括石油化工、石油和天然气、汽车行业和港口，并计划扩大这个名单。
translation.reference: 这位部长称，阿联酋已经在俄罗斯的几个领域进行投资，包括石化工业、石油和天然气、汽车工业和港口，并计划扩大投资范围。

translation.en: In 2020, the trade turnover between the two states reached $3.3 billion, and in the first 10 months of 2021 its volume exceeded $4 billion, reaching a new record, Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin said last week.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯总理米哈伊尔·米什乌斯廷 (Mikhail Mishustin) 上周表示，2020 年，两国之间的贸易额达到 33 亿美元，2021 年前 10 个月的贸易额超过 40 亿美元，创下了新的纪录。
translation.source: In 2020, the trade turnover between the two states reached $3.3 billion, and in the first 10 months of 2021 its volume exceeded $4 billion, reaching a new record, Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin said last week.
translation.medium: 2020年，两国贸易额达到33亿美元，2021年前10个月贸易额超过40亿美元，创下历史新高，俄罗斯总理米什乌斯丁上周表示。
translation.reference: 俄罗斯总理米哈伊尔·米什乌斯廷 (Mikhail Mishustin) 上周表示，2020 年，两国之间的贸易额达到 33 亿美元，2021 年前 10 个月的贸易额超过 40 亿美元，创下了新的纪录。

translation.en: According to the Ministry of Economics, this year Russia mainly exported mineral products, precious stones and metals to the UAE, while Russian imports from the Arab country included machinery, equipment and vehicles.
translation.zh: 据俄罗斯经济部称，今年俄罗斯主要向阿联酋出口矿产、宝石和金属，而从阿拉伯国家进口的产品包括机械、设备和车辆。
translation.source: According to the Ministry of Economics, this year Russia mainly exported mineral products, precious stones and metals to the UAE, while Russian imports from the Arab country included machinery, equipment and vehicles.
translation.medium: 经济部称，今年俄罗斯主要向阿联酋出口矿产品、宝石和金属，而阿联酋向俄罗斯进口机械、设备和汽车。
translation.reference: 据俄罗斯经济部称，今年俄罗斯主要向阿联酋出口矿产、宝石和金属，而从阿拉伯国家进口的产品包括机械、设备和车辆。

translation.en: Dallas Cowboys bring benches to Washington, rivalry heats up
translation.zh: 达拉斯牛仔队把长凳带到华盛顿，竞争加剧
translation.source: Dallas Cowboys bring benches to Washington, rivalry heats up
translation.medium: 达拉斯牛仔队带着替补席来到华盛顿，竞争加剧
translation.reference: 达拉斯牛仔队把长凳带到华盛顿，竞争加剧

translation.en: The visiting sideline at Washington has a familiar home look for the Dallas Cowboys.
translation.zh: 华盛顿的客场对于达拉斯牛仔队来说就是一个熟悉的主场。
translation.source: The visiting sideline at Washington has a familiar home look for the Dallas Cowboys.
translation.medium: 在华盛顿的客场看台上，达拉斯牛仔队感到很熟悉。
translation.reference: 华盛顿的客场对于达拉斯牛仔队来说就是一个熟悉的主场。

translation.en: After getting word from other teams that the sideline benches at FedEx Field were in major need of an upgrade, the Cowboys brought their own for this showdown game.
translation.zh: 在从其他球队得到消息说联邦快递球场的边线长凳需要升级后，牛仔队自己带来了长凳来参加这场对决。
translation.source: After getting word from other teams that the sideline benches at FedEx Field were in major need of an upgrade, the Cowboys brought their own for this showdown game.
translation.medium: 得知其他球队的替补席需要升级的消息后，牛仔队在这场决赛中带来了自己的替补席。
translation.reference: 在从其他球队得到消息说联邦快递球场的边线长凳需要升级后，牛仔队自己带来了长凳来参加这场对决。

translation.en: When they arrived at the stadium Sunday, they were already decked out in Cowboys logos and wordmarks.
translation.zh: 当他们周日到达体育场时，长凳上已经加上了牛仔队的标志和文字。
translation.source: When they arrived at the stadium Sunday, they were already decked out in Cowboys logos and wordmarks.
translation.medium: 当他们周日抵达体育场时，他们已经穿上了牛仔队的标志和标识。
translation.reference: 当他们周日到达体育场时，长凳上已经加上了牛仔队的标志和文字。

translation.en: The Cowboys heard from the Seahawks, who recently played against Washington on a Monday night and had complaints that the heated benches were malfunctioning.
translation.zh: 牛仔队收到了海鹰队的投诉，海鹰队最近在周一晚上对阵华盛顿队，他们抱怨说加热的板凳出现了故障。
translation.source: The Cowboys heard from the Seahawks, who recently played against Washington on a Monday night and had complaints that the heated benches were malfunctioning.
translation.medium: 牛仔队得到了海鹰队的消息，海鹰队最近在星期一晚上与华盛顿队进行了比赛，他们抱怨热替补席出现故障。
translation.reference: 牛仔队收到了海鹰队的投诉，海鹰队最近在周一晚上对阵华盛顿队，他们抱怨说加热的板凳出现了故障。

translation.en: Earlier in the week, Cowboys running back Ezekiel Elliott actually commented about the benefits of playing outdoors in colder games, because of the heated benches are beneficial to his knee injury.
translation.zh: 本周早些时候，牛仔队的跑锋艾泽基尔·艾略特说到在寒冷的户外比赛时，加热的板凳能让他受伤的膝盖更舒服点。
translation.source: Earlier in the week, Cowboys running back Ezekiel Elliott actually commented about the benefits of playing outdoors in colder games, because of the heated benches are beneficial to his knee injury.
translation.medium: 本周早些时候，牛仔队跑卫埃泽基尔·埃利奥特 (Ezekiel Elliott) 谈到了在寒冷的比赛中在户外比赛的好处，因为加热的替补席对他的膝伤有好处。
translation.reference: 本周早些时候，牛仔队的跑锋艾泽基尔·艾略特说到在寒冷的户外比赛时，加热的板凳能让他受伤的膝盖更舒服点。

translation.en: The Cowboys just made sure Zeke and his teammates got that opportunity.
translation.zh: 牛仔队只是希望齐克和他的队友知道这一点。
translation.source: The Cowboys just made sure Zeke and his teammates got that opportunity.
translation.medium: 牛仔队刚刚确保了泽克和他的队友们获得了这样的机会。
translation.reference: 牛仔队只是希望齐克和他的队友知道这一点。

translation.en: This move is just the latest twist in the Dallas-Washington rivalry, one that got juiced up even more this week when Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy predicted a win for his team, prompting some fireworks back and forth with Washington's Ron Rivera and players.
translation.zh: 这一举动只是达拉斯与华盛顿竞争的最新情况，本周，当牛仔队主教练麦克·麦卡锡预测他的球队会赢时，他们之间的竞争就变得更加激烈，这引发了华盛顿队的罗恩·里维拉和球员之间的激烈争论。
translation.source: This move is just the latest twist in the Dallas-Washington rivalry, one that got juiced up even more this week when Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy predicted a win for his team, prompting some fireworks back and forth with Washington's Ron Rivera and players.
translation.medium: 这一举动只是达拉斯和华盛顿之间的竞争中最新的一次转折，本周，达拉斯队主教练迈克·麦卡锡 (Mike McCarthy) 预测自己的球队会取得胜利，引发了华盛顿队主教练罗恩·里维拉 (Ron Rivera) 和球员之间的一些火花。
translation.reference: 这一举动只是达拉斯与华盛顿竞争的最新情况，本周，当牛仔队主教练麦克·麦卡锡预测他的球队会赢时，他们之间的竞争就变得更加激烈，这引发了华盛顿队的罗恩·里维拉和球员之间的激烈争论。

translation.en: Washington has beaten the Cowboys in consecutive matchups.
translation.zh: 华盛顿队在比赛中连续击败了牛仔队。
translation.source: Washington has beaten the Cowboys in consecutive matchups.
translation.medium: 华盛顿连续击败达拉斯牛仔。
translation.reference: 华盛顿队在比赛中连续击败了牛仔队。

translation.en: It has been more than 30 years since it has defeated Dallas in three straight meetings (1986-88).
translation.zh: 自华盛顿上次在 1986-88 赛季中连续三次击败达拉斯以来，已经过去 30 多年前了。
translation.source: It has been more than 30 years since it has defeated Dallas in three straight meetings (1986-88).
translation.medium: 自 1986 年至 1988 年连续三次击败达拉斯以来，已经过去了 30 多年。
translation.reference: 自华盛顿上次在 1986-88 赛季中连续三次击败达拉斯以来，已经过去 30 多年前了。

translation.en: Cowboys fans made up more than half of the crowd at FedEx field, which was evident based on the blue and white jerseys in the stands.
translation.zh: 在联邦快递球场，牛仔队的球迷占了一半以上，从看台上蓝白相间的球衣就可以看出这一点。
translation.source: Cowboys fans made up more than half of the crowd at FedEx field, which was evident based on the blue and white jerseys in the stands.
translation.medium: 在 FedEx 体育场的观众中，牛仔队的球迷占了超过半数，这可以从看台上的蓝白色球衣上看出来。
translation.reference: 在联邦快递球场，牛仔队的球迷占了一半以上，从看台上蓝白相间的球衣就可以看出这一点。

translation.en: Owner Jerry Jones foreshadowed that earlier this week when he said on 105.3 FM in Dallas, "We have always sold more Cowboys' hats, caps, T-shirts.
translation.zh: 球队老板杰里·琼斯本周早些时候在达拉斯的 105.3 FM 节目中就预告了这一点，他说:“我们总能卖出更多的牛仔帽、帽子和 T 恤。
translation.source: Owner Jerry Jones foreshadowed that earlier this week when he said on 105.3 FM in Dallas, "We have always sold more Cowboys' hats, caps, T-shirts.
translation.medium: 老板杰里·琼斯 (Jerry Jones) 本周早些时候在达拉斯的 105.3 FM 电台上表示：“我们一直都在卖更多的牛仔帽、帽子和 T 恤。
translation.reference: 球队老板杰里·琼斯本周早些时候在达拉斯的 105.3 FM 节目中就预告了这一点，他说:“我们总能卖出更多的牛仔帽、帽子和 T 恤。

translation.en: We've always had our greatest fan support positive coming from Washington, that's outside the Dallas area.
translation.zh: 在达拉斯以外，华盛顿球迷对我们是最热情的。
translation.source: We've always had our greatest fan support positive coming from Washington, that's outside the Dallas area.
translation.medium: 我们一直得到来自华盛顿的最大球迷支持，华盛顿位于达拉斯以外。
translation.reference: 在达拉斯以外，华盛顿球迷对我们是最热情的。

translation.en: Outside the Texas area, Washington is where we have the most support of all when it comes to all the things you might count."
translation.zh: 除了德克萨斯州，华盛顿是我们可以收获最多支持的地方。”
translation.source: Outside the Texas area, Washington is where we have the most support of all when it comes to all the things you might count."
translation.medium: 除了德克萨斯州以外，华盛顿州是我们在所有可以计算的事情上得到最大支持的地方。”
translation.reference: 除了德克萨斯州，华盛顿是我们可以收获最多支持的地方。”

translation.en: Warning of stormy weather as strong winds present 'danger to life'
translation.zh: 暴风天气预警，强风会“危及生命”
translation.source: Warning of stormy weather as strong winds present 'danger to life'
translation.medium: 暴风雨预警：强风可能危及生命
translation.reference: 暴风天气预警，强风会“危及生命”

translation.en: Storm force winds are set to batter northern parts of Scotland with disruption to travel, especially ferry services, expected.
translation.zh: 强风暴将袭击苏格兰北部地区，预计旅游，尤其是轮渡服务将受到影响。
translation.source: Storm force winds are set to batter northern parts of Scotland with disruption to travel, especially ferry services, expected.
translation.medium: 风暴级风力即将袭击苏格兰北部，预计会影响交通，特别是渡轮服务。
translation.reference: 强风暴将袭击苏格兰北部地区，预计旅游，尤其是轮渡服务将受到影响。

translation.en: The northwest, Shetland and Orkney will face gusts of up to 85mph overnight on Sunday into Monday morning.
translation.zh: 从周日到周一早上，西北部的设得兰群岛和奥克尼群岛将遭遇时速 85 英里的大风。
translation.source: The northwest, Shetland and Orkney will face gusts of up to 85mph overnight on Sunday into Monday morning.
translation.medium: 周日晚上至周一早晨，西北部、赫布里底群岛和奥克尼群岛将面临最高 85 英里/小时的大风。
translation.reference: 从周日到周一早上，西北部的设得兰群岛和奥克尼群岛将遭遇时速 85 英里的大风。

translation.en: The Hebrides, and western coast of the Highlands and parts of Argyll and Bute have been warned to be prepared for flying debris presenting a "danger to life" and causing damage to buildings.
translation.zh: 赫布里底群岛、高地西部海岸以及阿盖尔和比特的部分地区已经收到预警，要做好准备应对飘扬的碎片，这些碎片会“危及生命”，并对建筑物造成破坏。
translation.source: The Hebrides, and western coast of the Highlands and parts of Argyll and Bute have been warned to be prepared for flying debris presenting a "danger to life" and causing damage to buildings.
translation.medium: 赫布里底群岛和苏格兰高地西海岸以及阿伯丁郡和阿伯丁郡部分地区已被警告要做好飞溅物“危及生命”的准备，以及对建筑物造成损坏。
translation.reference: 赫布里底群岛、高地西部海岸以及阿盖尔和比特的部分地区已经收到预警，要做好准备应对飘扬的碎片，这些碎片会“危及生命”，并对建筑物造成破坏。

translation.en: Experts are warning that the bad weather could lead to power cuts, road and bridge closures, and cancellations to air and ferry services.
translation.zh: 专家警告说，恶劣的天气可能会导致停电、道路和桥梁关闭、航空和轮渡服务取消。
translation.source: Experts are warning that the bad weather could lead to power cuts, road and bridge closures, and cancellations to air and ferry services.
translation.medium: 专家警告称，恶劣天气可能导致电力中断、公路和桥梁关闭以及航空和渡轮服务取消。
translation.reference: 专家警告说，恶劣的天气可能会导致停电、道路和桥梁关闭、航空和轮渡服务取消。

translation.en: It follows two named storms, Arwen and Barra, that brought widespread disruption to large parts of the country.
translation.zh: 此前，两场命名为“亚文”(Arwen) 和“巴拉”(Barra) 的风暴给该国大部分地区造成了广泛的破坏。
translation.source: It follows two named storms, Arwen and Barra, that brought widespread disruption to large parts of the country.
translation.medium: 它追随阿雷文和巴拉两个命名的风暴，这两个风暴对大部分国家造成了广泛的破坏。
translation.reference: 此前，两场命名为“亚文”(Arwen) 和“巴拉”(Barra) 的风暴给该国大部分地区造成了广泛的破坏。

translation.en: More than 100,000 homes had their power cut off by the extreme damage wrought by Storm Arwen on November 26 and 27.
translation.zh: 11 月 26 日和 27 日，飓风“亚玟”造成的巨大破坏导致超过 10 万户家庭断电。
translation.source: More than 100,000 homes had their power cut off by the extreme damage wrought by Storm Arwen on November 26 and 27.
translation.medium: 11 月 26 日和 27 日，暴风雨阿伦带来的极端破坏导致超过 10 万户家庭断电。
translation.reference: 11 月 26 日和 27 日，飓风“亚玟”造成的巨大破坏导致超过 10 万户家庭断电。

translation.en: Storm Barra disrupted supplies to around 10,000 just 11 days later on December 7.
translation.zh: 11 天 后的 12 月 7 日，飓风“芭拉”中断了约 1 万人的物资供应。
translation.source: Storm Barra disrupted supplies to around 10,000 just 11 days later on December 7.
translation.medium: 11 天后的 12 月 7 日，飓风巴拉拉 (Storm Barra) 破坏了约 10,000 人的供应。
translation.reference: 11 天 后的 12 月 7 日，飓风“芭拉”中断了约 1 万人的物资供应。

translation.en: STV weather presenter Philip Petrie said it was very nearly three in a row.
translation.zh: STV 天气节目主持人菲利普·皮特里 (Philip Petrie) 说，这三次几乎是连着来的。
translation.source: STV weather presenter Philip Petrie said it was very nearly three in a row.
translation.medium: STV 天气预报员菲利普·佩特里 (Philip Petrie) 表示，这几乎是三连冠。
translation.reference: STV 天气节目主持人菲利普·皮特里 (Philip Petrie) 说，这三次几乎是连着来的。

translation.en: The Met Office were keeping an eye on a low pressure system that is skirting along northwestern areas overnight on Sunday bringing with it very strong winds and squally, heavy showers.
translation.zh: 英国气象局 (Met Office) 一直在密切关注周日夜间沿西北地区移动的低压系统，该系统带来了强风和狂风暴雨。
translation.source: The Met Office were keeping an eye on a low pressure system that is skirting along northwestern areas overnight on Sunday bringing with it very strong winds and squally, heavy showers.
translation.medium: 英国气象局在周日晚上盯着一个低压系统，这个低压系统在周日晚上盯着一个低压系统，这个低压系统在周日晚上盯着一个低压系统，这个低压系统在周日晚上盯着一个低压系统，这个低压系统在周日晚上盯着一个低压系统，这个低压系统在周日晚上盯着一个低压系统，这个低压系统在周日晚上盯着一个低压系统，这个低压系统在周日晚上盯�
translation.reference: 英国气象局 (Met Office) 一直在密切关注周日夜间沿西北地区移动的低压系统，该系统带来了强风和狂风暴雨。

translation.en: The Met Office has issued yellow weather warnings for wind with the first coming into force from 9pm on Sunday covering the Western Isles, and parts of the Highlands and Argyll and Bute.
translation.zh: 英国气象局发布了大风黄色天气预警，第一次预警将于周日晚上 9 点开始生效，覆盖西群岛、高地、阿盖尔和比特的部分地区。
translation.source: The Met Office has issued yellow weather warnings for wind with the first coming into force from 9pm on Sunday covering the Western Isles, and parts of the Highlands and Argyll and Bute.
translation.medium: 英国气象局已发布黄色风暴警报，第一个生效时间为周日晚上 9 点，覆盖苏格兰西部群岛、苏格兰高地部分地区和阿伯丁郡。
translation.reference: 英国气象局发布了大风黄色天气预警，第一次预警将于周日晚上 9 点开始生效，覆盖西群岛、高地、阿盖尔和比特的部分地区。

translation.en: "Within this area there is the potential of gusts reaching 80-85mph causing disruption to ferries and also some damage and power cuts," Philip said.
translation.zh: 菲利普说:“在这个地区，风速可能达到每小时 80-85 英里，造成渡轮中断，也会造成一些损坏和电力中断。”
translation.source: "Within this area there is the potential of gusts reaching 80-85mph causing disruption to ferries and also some damage and power cuts," Philip said.
translation.medium: 菲利普表示：“在这个区域内，风力可能达到 80-85 英里/小时，会对渡轮造成干扰，也会造成一些损坏和停电。”
translation.reference: 菲利普说:“在这个地区，风速可能达到每小时 80-85 英里，造成渡轮中断，也会造成一些损坏和电力中断。”

translation.en: A further warning comes into effect at midnight on Sunday covering Orkney and Shetland.
translation.zh: 下一个预警将于周日午夜开始生效，覆盖奥克尼和设得兰群岛。
translation.source: A further warning comes into effect at midnight on Sunday covering Orkney and Shetland.
translation.medium: 周日凌晨，针对奥克尼群岛和夏特兰群岛的进一步警告生效。
translation.reference: 下一个预警将于周日午夜开始生效，覆盖奥克尼和设得兰群岛。

translation.en: "This warning lasts until midday Monday as the centre of the low pressure system moves close to the Northern Isles, again bringing gusts of 80-85mph along coasts and locally in excess of 90mph in some areas," Philip said.
translation.zh: 菲利普说:“随着低压系统中心靠近北岛，这一预警将持续到周一中午，沿海地区再次迎来时速 80-85 英里的阵风，局部地区的风速超过 90 英里每小时。”
translation.source: "This warning lasts until midday Monday as the centre of the low pressure system moves close to the Northern Isles, again bringing gusts of 80-85mph along coasts and locally in excess of 90mph in some areas," Philip said.
translation.medium: 菲利普表示：“这一警告将持续到星期一中午，因为低压系统的中心向北群岛附近移动，再次带来 80-85 英里/小时的风速，并且在沿海地区和部分地区风速超过 90 英里/小时。”
translation.reference: 菲利普说:“随着低压系统中心靠近北岛，这一预警将持续到周一中午，沿海地区再次迎来时速 80-85 英里的阵风，局部地区的风速超过 90 英里每小时。”

translation.en: "It is very fast moving though, so will clear away by Monday afternoon, with things beginning to ease and calm by lunchtime.
translation.zh: “飓风移动速度极快，所以周一下午就会消失，午饭前天气会开始缓和、平静。
translation.source: "It is very fast moving though, so will clear away by Monday afternoon, with things beginning to ease and calm by lunchtime.
translation.medium: “它虽然移动速度很快，但预计周一下午就会消散，中午开始有所缓和。
translation.reference: “飓风移动速度极快，所以周一下午就会消失，午饭前天气会开始缓和、平静。

translation.en: For the rest of the week things will continue to settle ahead of next weekend."
translation.zh: 在本周余下的时间里，下周末前天气将逐步稳定下来。”
translation.source: For the rest of the week things will continue to settle ahead of next weekend."
translation.medium: 在下周末之前，这周剩下的时间还会继续稳定。”
translation.reference: 在本周余下的时间里，下周末前天气将逐步稳定下来。”

translation.en: Yes, I amopening the account
translation.zh: 是的，我正在打开这个帐户
translation.source: Yes, I amopening the account
translation.medium: 是的，我正在开户
translation.reference: 是的，我正在打开这个帐户

translation.en: Please follow the next process
translation.zh: 请按照以下步骤操作
translation.source: Please follow the next process
translation.medium: 请继续操作
translation.reference: 请按照以下步骤操作

translation.en: To repair your account on the android app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.zh: 要在安卓 App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：
translation.source: To repair your account on the android app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.medium: 为了修复您的安卓应用程序帐户，请按照以下步骤进行操作：
translation.reference: 要在安卓 App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Tap the #PRS_ORG# icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。
translation.source: Tap the #PRS_ORG# icon at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。

translation.en: Go to the Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to the Home screen.
translation.medium: 进入主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“菜单”图标。
translation.source: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕顶部的菜单图标。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的“菜单”图标。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 点击设置。
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Scroll to the bottom and tap Repair your account.
translation.zh: 滚动到底部，点击修复帐户。
translation.source: Scroll to the bottom and tap Repair your account.
translation.medium: 滚动到底部并点击“修复你的帐户”。
translation.reference: 滚动到底部，点击修复帐户。

translation.en: Tap Repair.
translation.zh: 点击“修复”。
translation.source: Tap Repair.
translation.medium: 修复键盘。
translation.reference: 点击“修复”。
